We have to buy good items like backpacks, sleeping bags, sleeping pads, pillows, tents, headlamps, and trekking pokes. We also need to purchase all of the elements for the snacks and meals that we'll make and provide. We will need things like a vacuum sealer, food dehydrator, and ingredients. We love the outdoors and this would be the perfect opportunity to share the wilderness with others and through teaching "leave no trace" principals to those we explore with we can ensure the wilderness will stay that way for others to enjoy as well. Check out our website at mrrowley11.wix.com/mysite. Help Lake Tahoe Backcountry Guides create memories and stories that you will love to share with friends and family for years to come.

Risks and challengesOne of the risks and challenges that we could face after my project is funded is not having any customers. We feel that through targeted advertising we will be able to reach new customers. Social media will be great advertising for Lake Tahoe Backcountry Guides. Everyone who goes on a tour with us will have so many pictures and stories to share the buzz will be fantastic. We will have print ads in high end publications like Forbes, Travel and Leisure, Martha Stewart Living, Afar, Global Living Magazine, and Sunset magazines. After the project is funded we can start fulfilling the rewards shortly after as most of them are guided tours. All we need to do is purchase the equipment needed to lead these amazing tours. Another risk and challenge that we could face after the project is funded is competition. By paying attention to the little details that make all the difference, we will set ourselves apart from any other companies that are trying to compete. Our guides will be the best around and our gear will be even better! Our team has decades of local knowledge about the Tahoe backcountry and years of wilderness medicine experience. We pride ourselves in taking care of the details that our guests will absolutely love. We first focused on the weight of the packs overall. At just under 15 pounds, you will be blown away knowing all of your gear is packed away in there. We have also focused on the best, most photogenic routes in the area. We have spent tons of time hiking around in the wilderness of Tahoe and we have put together a list of the perfect treks that will leave you in awe.

story:
Throughout history, innovation and great ideas comes from those who are passionate about what they do and Eco-Alkalines™  is committed and driven to offer consumers a greener Eco-responsible alternative to traditional alkaline and rechargeable batteries. Eco Alkalines™ truly believes that as human beings we only have one Earth, so it is crucial to strive for a healthy planet that has healthy soil, cleaner water and fresher air. We must be proactive in protecting our fragile Eco-systems for future generations through the mass implementation of green technology that eliminates the usage of harmful chemicals, becoming landfill conscious through recycling programs and  offsetting carbon footprints by investing back into the natural landscape that provides life for all of Earth’s inhabitants. According to the Environmental News Network there are over 10 billion cells sold each year worldwide. It is estimated that about 2% of these cells are recycled and about 179,000 tons end up in US landfills alone. We believe those numbers are staggering and unacceptable. While we always encourage recycling throughout our messaging we know if that is not going to happen then at least there should be a better alternative on the market - thus we have launched Eco Alkalines™

By supporting Eco Alkalines™ you are advocating a company that strives for a greener planet and supports the overall reduction of carbon footprints. Our company's commitment to the development of Eco-friendly batteries is broadening the way consumers can lower their environmental impact by using our products to power their everyday devices. Eco Alkalines™ prides itself on delivering affordable products that are proven to be environmentally safe, without sacrificing quality or the needs of our individual customer. Eco Alkalines™ makes going green not only easy, but also the affordable and smart choice. As an Eco-trendsetter, we at Eco Alkalines™ have made sure that our quality is equally impressive as our commitment to raising the acceptable standard in terms of being landfill conscious. Eco Alkalines™ high standards meets Leadership In Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) certifications, prerequisites and credits for building projects and building operations.

Eco Alkalines™ is the world’s first and only battery range to achieve Carbonfree® product certification, demonstrating a wider commitment to environmental responsibility. On top of our unique Carbonfund.org designation in July of 2014 the entire Eco-Alkaline line became the first batteries in the world to meet the carboNZero 's most rigorous requirements and received their highest mark of approval. So what does Carbonfree mean to you?  By becoming a Carbonfree® Product, Eco Alkalines™ Batteries have gone through a detailed process to calculate the carbon footprint associated with the entire "cradle-to-grave" life cycle to gather the product components, manufacture, package, transport, sell, use and dispose of each battery.The carbon footprint of each battery sold is neutralized by purchasing and retiring carbon credits, and supporting the projects that produce these carbon credits by generating renewable energy, reducing energy consumption or preserving forest land that absorbs carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

Eco Alkalines™ batteries provide both impressive power and an incredible life span. This claim is backed up by years of performance and longevity tests that consistently demonstrate that Eco Alkalines™ perform equal to, and in many cases, exceed leading national brands. We are proud to state that our entire product line is free of toxic heavy metals including, mercury, lead and nickel cadmium. Eco Alkalines™ offers an anti-leak casing that we guarantee our batteries will not leak into devices. Despite being green Eco Alkalines™ retail for the same cost as conventional alkaline batteries. Our packaging is manufactured with 80% of recycled materials and through a partnership we offer a battery recycling program that is able to recycle up to 98 percent of our batteries materials, while at no cost for consumers or retailers. This makes going green both the affordable and smart choice for any consumer, organization or company.

The battery industry is dominated by less than a handful of major corporations with major advertising budgets, with no need to pioneer green technology. The biggest challenge for  Eco-Alkalines™ is that it we are a smaller company that is competing against an industry of giants. Also currently most retailers offer aisles of "green" products in other categories but nothing in the battery category - this must change. We know that we have created a great product that consumers will love, but we need to get our message out. Eco Alkalines has turned to Indiegogo in order to finance an advertising campaign that will bring our product into the spotlight for consumers. We will use our Indiegogo funds to invest in a advertising campaign to get our message out to the masses, that promotes both our product and our green agenda. We are confident that through the education of our message that consumers will jump on board and through this process more and more retailers will be motivated to offer this greener choice - Eco-Alkalines™. We plan to educate the public on our green product and remain true to our company's mandate of lowering the world's carbon footprint. We know that we offer an excellent high quality product that will appeal to a wide array of consumers. By creating product awareness Eco Alkalines™ will do its part in helping to preserve its environment and continue to develop and set trends in Eco-friendly alkaline batteries.


For more information on Eco Alkalines™ batteries please visit our website www.ecoalkalines.com

For a chance to win a grand prize of "One year's Supply Of Batteries" take this short survey click here!

story:
Plantation Power.....

Short Summary

The 7th grade Plantation Power travel basketball team was started in 2013 by Andrew Scott (team owner) who had a vision to create a basketball team that not only wins games, but develops it’s players to be the best players they can be. Plantation Power is based out of Plantation, FL and  has 16 aspiring young men who love the game and have the drive, will, and determination to improve and become the best all around players in their age group. 

The Impact

  • Plantation Power focuses mainly on developing each players skills by teaching fundamental basketball skills and honing in on each players strengths along with improving their weaknesses.
  • With your help, we could transform these young men into not only evolved basketball players, but disciplined young teens who know the importance of team work, effort, discipline, and setting goals. 
  • Our coaches have successfully coached in different leagues around the state of Florida. The team is coached by Doug Scott (head coach) along with assistants Chris Maylor, Andre Anderson, and Hiram Diaz

What We Need & What You Get

  • With this fundraiser, our goal is to reach $4,000 with your help. The money will go towards equipment, jerseys, bags, sneakers, and traveling expenses. The more money we raise for the players = more tournaments they get to play in = more exposure = more skill development.
  • With your help, the players will be able to travel throughout Florida and attend different tournaments in Orlando, Melbourne, and possibly even Atlanta!
  • Even if we don't reach our entire goal, something is better than nothing. Whatever money we make will go towards something that can help the players get through this travel season.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute monetarily you can still help!

  • Get the word out! Make some noise about this fundraiser!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! (facebook, twitter, etc.)
  • Let your family, friends and co-workers know about our mission! The more people that know about it, the more we can help these players!
  • Thank you in advance for your support! We look forward to an exciting travel basketball season!

story:
Why MRF Multitools PRYBAR?

1. QUALITY. We use only high quality materials as 440c hardened stainless steel and Titanium grade 5. Every multitool pass quality and hardness test before shipping. Tensile strength for the Prybar is more than 100+Kg

2. DESIGN. Everyone may choose the most suitable variant. From S keychain to L big Prybar. From silver 440c hardened stainless steel to Violet Titanium with exclusive Tattoo design that will show your individuality and your current every day carry mood.

3. PRICE. Just from 12$ for titanium keychain PRYBAR S. We can make such prices because we do everything in our MRF Multitools workshop. We are photographer, designer and metall worker at the same time. We do not spend any dollar for advertisement, expensive collaborations. All funds are invested in materials, multitools and shipping. And we love what we do for You.

4. BACKERS. Everytime we try to design and produce something better, more complex, more innovative and exclusive for YOU OUR DEAR BACKERS AND SUPPORTERS. MRF Multitools are all over the world in different countries, conditions and MRF Multitools work hard and sturdy Every Day.

Sincerely Yours MRF Multitools Team!

YOU MAY CHOOSE COLOUR AND TATTOO DESIGN

FUNCTIONS and TOOLS

Every M size or L size MRF Prybars are supplied with 3 O-rings (2 to carry bit and 1 spare). O-ring is also used to fix your bit inside bit wrench (3 sizes for different bit standarts) and bit not fall out during usage as it shown on photos.

story:
At allGreenup, we seek to change the relationship of people and taking care of the environment, and we do this by encouraging them to recognize and improve their impact on the planet with a entertaining and easy-to-use Mobile App that rewards users..


allGreenup provides a unique experience while jogging, bicycling, recycling, carpooling and reading green tips. With the simple action of just recording them in the app, you win green points that can be exchanged for prizes and discounts in the application.

Behind the idea of ​​giving benefits to people we intend to create a virtuous circle where everyone wins. First the planet and app users, and then brands with a sustainable spirit and small businesses of local commerce. It is they who, through a network of associated businesses, offer their products and services with no associated cost, seeking to position themselves and grow with new audiences.




The story begins with the arrival of KOEE to Chile. When meeting with the Luongo cousins, ​​Andrew and Sebastian, the young and enthusiastic koala realized that aside from belonging to different species they had much in common and above all a cause: unite people to take care of the planet.

This was how they started working on the idea of ​​allGreenup, which stands for something like "all who care about the planet stand up and do something for it. Every action counts. " And two proposals emerged: to integrate technology and encourage people to participate. Shortly after, more people joined the team, which gave more intelligence and vitality. First Sebastián Moreno, who with his programming superpowers gave form to a mobile app which based its development on the feedback from people. Then came Elgueta Fabian, whose unique designer talents, put his abilities to the service of an image that could be close and at the same time very attractive to people.We already had a powerful tool and it looked great, but still lacked spirit. We were missing to transform allGreenup into a community. And it just so happened, by those synchronicities of life, that Javiera Luongo had just finished university and joined this initiative with the goal of creating a network of brands and associated commerce. A circle of sustainable entrepreneurs. And what about the users? And the people? To create a community linked to the cause, Jaime Spinoza joined who used the glue of good intentions and actions of all and called for people to join. All this happened in less than 8 months and since this chance encounter between a koala and two humans, we have managed to create a community of more than 10,000 active users and more than 12,000 followers on social media. Mainly in Chile, but growing rapidly in Argentina and Mexico. Every day more people join, who not only live in the world but also enjoy and take care of it. Individuals who believe that from their personal space can create a collective transformation. People like us who truly believe that every action counts.

What is our next step? Expand our cause and bring more people to join our community.


allGreenup focuses not only on a limited and green audience. It starts from there strengthening  good habits, but also seeks to spread to those who have not yet developed a sustainable lifestyle awareness. For them offers benefits such as free movie tickets, ski tickets or tickets to concerts, among others. And since we understand that many people take care of the planet without wanting to receive anything in return, app users can donate their points to institutions working for the environment. For example, we currently have available the possibility of planting a tree together with the Chilean foundation “Reforestemos la Patagonia” in the allGreenup forest located in the southern part of Chile.







We have a big dream! We want to change the world, we want the world to understand that each of their actions matter! That is why we will implement allGreenup in Argentina, Brazil, Mexico, Colombia, Peru and the rest of the region. For this we need to articular relationships with communities, governments and businesses in each of these places, in addition to further developing our application, adding new features such as a new ways of sharing your car and measuring your physical activity .... besides being able to improve the current performance also ensuring the scalability we must have.


And to fulfill our promise we are dedicated to provide incentives to those who make this change in attitude, giving them rewards for doing so.

Even in countries where recycling is not developed, we will generate a platform where recyclers can freely perform residential collection with accurate and timely information management. On the one hand this will cause an important increase in the amount of recycled waste, neighbors will benefit from them because allgreenup will reward them for doing so and eventually to close the circle, we will give the possibility of recyclers to improve their working conditions and income.










               


Con allGreenup, buscamos cambiar la relación de las personas con el cuidado del medio ambiente, y lo hacemos incentivándolas a reconocer y mejorar su impacto sobre el planeta con una App Móvil entretenida y de fácil uso que las premia.


allGreenup brinda una experiencia única a la hora de salir a correr, andar en bicicleta, reciclar, compartir el auto y leer tips ecológicos, ya que con tan solo registrarlas en la app, se acumulan puntos verdes que pueden canjearse por premios y descuentos en la aplicación.

Detrás de la idea de entregar beneficios a las personas nos proponemos crear un circulo virtuoso donde todos ganemos. En primer lugar el planeta y los usuarios de la app, y luego las marcas ligadas a un espíritu sustentable y pequeñas tiendas de comercio local. Son ellos los que, a través de una red de comercio asociado, ofrecen sus productos y servicios sin costo asociado, buscando posicionarse y crecer dentro de nuevos públicos.


La historia se inicia con la llegada de Koee a Chile. El joven y entusiasta koala al encontrarse con los primos Luongo: Andrés y Sebastián, se dió cuenta de que independiente a pertenecer a especies distintas tenían mucho en común y sobre todo una causa: unir a la gente en torno a cuidar el planeta.

Fue así como se pusieron a trabajar sobre la idea de allGreenup, que quiere decir algo parecido a “todos los que les importe el planeta pónganse de pie y hagan algo por él. Cada acción cuenta”. Y surgieron dos propuestas: Integrar la tecnología e incentivar a las personas a participar. Al poco andar se sumaron más personas al equipo, quienes le darían más inteligencia y vitalidad. Primero Sebastián Moreno, quien con sus superpoderes de programación le dio forma a una app móvil que basara su desarrollo en el feedback con las personas. Luego llegaría Fabían Elgueta, que con su talento único de diseñador, puso su mano al servicio de una imagen que pudiera ser cercana y a la vez muy atráctiva para las personas. Ya teníamos una herramienta poderosa y que lucía muy bien, pero faltaba aún dotarla de espíritu. Faltaba trarnsformar a allGreenup en una comunidad. Y pasó que por esas sincronías de la vida, Javiera Luongo, justo salió de la universidad y se unió a esta iniciativa con la intención de crear una red de marcas y comercio asociado. Un círculo de emprendedores sustentables. ¿Y los usuarios? ¿las personas? Para crear una comunidad ligada a la causa, se unió Jaime Spinoza quien usó el pegamento de las buenas intenciones y acciones de todos y convocó a la gente a unirse. 

Todos esto pasó en menos de 8 meses y desde un encuentro fortuito entre un koala y dos humanos, ya hemos logrado crear una comunidad de más de 10 mil usuarios activos y más de 12 mil seguidores de redes sociales. Principalmente en Chile, pero creciendo a pasos agigantados en Argentina y México. Se suman cada día personas que no sólo viven en el mundo sino que también lo disfrutan y cuidan. Individuos que creen que en desde el propio metro cuadrado se puede crear una gran transformación colectiva. Personas como nosotros que de verdad creen que cada acción cuenta. 

¿Cuál es nuestro siguiente paso? Expandir nuestra causa y unir a más personas a nuestra comunidad.


allGreenup no se enfoca sólo en un público acotado y verde. Parte desde ahí fotaleciendo los buenos hábitos, pero también busca contagiar a quienes aún no han desarrollado una conciencia de vida sustentable. Para ellos ofrece beneficios gratuitos como entradas al cine, ticket para la nieve o entradas a recitales, entre otros. Y como entendemos que muchas personas cuidan el planeta sin querer recibir nada a cambio, los usuarios de la app pueden donar sus puntos a instituciones que trabajan en pro del medio ambiente. Por ejemplo, actualmente se encuentra disponible la posibilidad de plantar un árbol junto a la fundación chilena Reforestemos Patagonia en el bosque allGreenup ubicado al extremo sur de Chile.

En tan sólo 8 meses de existencia, hemos unido a una comunidad de más de 10 mil personas que han encontrado en allGreenup una herramienta para mejorar su impacto sobre el planeta y también una causa donde motivarse día a día a realizar un cambio positivo en el mundo.




Tenemos un sueño grande! Queremos cambiar al planeta, queremos que el mundo entienda que cada una de sus acciones importan! Es por esto que implementaremos allGreenup en argentina, Brasil, México, Colombia, Perú y el resto de la región. Para esto necesitamos articular las relaciones tanto con las comunidades, gobiernos y empresas en cada uno de estos lugares, además de seguir desarrollando nuestra aplicación, incorporando nuevas funcionalidades como una nueva manera de compartir tu auto y de medir tu actividad física….aparte de poder mejorar el actual funcionamiento asegurando también la escalabilidad que debemos tener.

Y para cumplir nuestra promesa nos dedicamos a entregar incentivos a todos aquellos que hagan este cambio de actitud, entregándoles premios por hacerlo.

También en los países en donde el reciclaje no está desarrollado, generaremos una plataforma para que los recicladores bases puedan realizar recolección domiciliaria con manejo de información precisa y oportuna, Por un lado esto provocara un aumento importante en la cantidad de residuos reciclados, los vecinos se verán beneficiados por ellos dado que allgreenup los premiara por hacerlo y finalmente para cerrar el círculo damos la posibilidad de que los recicladores bases mejoren sus condiciones laborales e ingresos.

Buscamos llevar allGreenup a cada rincón del mundo, y según la recaudación que logremos tendremos la posibilidad de hacerlo realidad en las siguientes partes del mundo, apóyanos!:

Expand our cause and bring more people to join our community.
allGreenup focuses not only on a limited and green audience.
It starts from there strengthening  good
habits, but also seeks to spread to those who have not yet developed a
sustainable lifestyle awareness. For them offers benefits such as free movie
tickets, ski tickets or tickets to concerts, among others. And since we
understand that many people take care of the planet without wanting to receive
anything in return, app users can donate their points to institutions working
for the environment. For example, we currently have available the possibility
of planting a tree together with the Chilean foundation “Reforestemos la
Patagonia” in the allGreenup forest located in the southern part of Chile.

We have a
big dream! We want to change the world, we want the world to understand that
each of their actions matter! That is why we will implement allGreenup in
Argentina, Brazil, Mexico, Colombia, Peru and the rest of the region. For this
we need to articular relationships with communities, governments and businesses
in each of these places, in addition to further developing our application,
adding new features such as a new ways of sharing your car and measuring your
physical activity .... besides being able to improve the current performance
also ensuring the scalability we must have.
And to
fulfill our promise we are dedicated to provide incentives to those who make
this change in attitude, giving them rewards for doing so.
Even in
countries where recycling is not developed, we will generate a platform where
recyclers can freely perform residential collection with accurate and timely
information management. On the one hand this will cause an important increase
in the amount of recycled waste, neighbors will benefit from them because
allgreenup will reward them for doing so and eventually to close the circle, we
will give the possibility of recyclers to improve their working conditions and
income.               Con allGreenup, buscamos cambiar la relación de las personas con el cuidado del medio ambiente, y lo hacemos incentivándolas a reconocer y mejorar su impacto sobre el planeta con una App Móvil entretenida y de fácil uso que las premia.allGreenup brinda una experiencia única a la hora de salir a correr, andar en bicicleta, reciclar, compartir el auto y leer tips ecológicos, ya que con tan solo registrarlas en la app, se acumulan puntos verdes que pueden canjearse por premios y descuentos en la aplicación.Detrás de la idea de entregar beneficios a las personas nos proponemos crear un circulo virtuoso donde todos ganemos. En primer lugar el planeta y los usuarios de la app, y luego las marcas ligadas a un espíritu sustentable y pequeñas tiendas de comercio local. Son ellos los que, a través de una red de comercio asociado, ofrecen sus productos y servicios sin costo asociado, buscando posicionarse y crecer dentro de nuevos públicos.La historia se inicia con la llegada de Koee a Chile. El joven y entusiasta koala al encontrarse con los primos Luongo: Andrés y Sebastián, se dió cuenta de que independiente a pertenecer a especies distintas tenían mucho en común y sobre todo una causa: unir a la gente en torno a cuidar el planeta.Fue así como se pusieron a trabajar sobre la idea de allGreenup, que quiere decir algo parecido a “todos los que les importe el planeta pónganse de pie y hagan algo por él. Cada acción cuenta”. Y surgieron dos propuestas: Integrar la tecnología e incentivar a las personas a participar. Al poco andar se sumaron más personas al equipo, quienes le darían más inteligencia y vitalidad. Primero Sebastián Moreno, quien con sus superpoderes de programación le dio forma a una app móvil que basara su desarrollo en el feedback con las personas. Luego llegaría Fabían Elgueta, que con su talento único de diseñador, puso su mano al servicio de una imagen que pudiera ser cercana y a la vez muy atráctiva para las personas. Ya teníamos una herramienta poderosa y que lucía muy bien, pero faltaba aún dotarla de espíritu. Faltaba trarnsformar a allGreenup en una comunidad. Y pasó que por esas sincronías de la vida, Javiera Luongo, justo salió de la universidad y se unió a esta iniciativa con la intención de crear una red de marcas y comercio asociado. Un círculo de emprendedores sustentables. ¿Y los usuarios? ¿las personas? Para crear una comunidad ligada a la causa, se unió Jaime Spinoza quien usó el pegamento de las buenas intenciones y acciones de todos y convocó a la gente a unirse. Todos esto pasó en menos de 8 meses y desde un encuentro fortuito entre un koala y dos humanos, ya hemos logrado crear una comunidad de más de 10 mil usuarios activos y más de 12 mil seguidores de redes sociales. Principalmente en Chile, pero creciendo a pasos agigantados en Argentina y México. Se suman cada día personas que no sólo viven en el mundo sino que también lo disfrutan y cuidan. Individuos que creen que en desde el propio metro cuadrado se puede crear una gran transformación colectiva. Personas como nosotros que de verdad creen que cada acción cuenta. ¿Cuál es nuestro siguiente paso? Expandir nuestra causa y unir a más personas a nuestra comunidad.allGreenup no se enfoca sólo en un público acotado y verde. Parte desde ahí fotaleciendo los buenos hábitos, pero también busca contagiar a quienes aún no han desarrollado una conciencia de vida sustentable. Para ellos ofrece beneficios gratuitos como entradas al cine, ticket para la nieve o entradas a recitales, entre otros. Y como entendemos que muchas personas cuidan el planeta sin querer recibir nada a cambio, los usuarios de la app pueden donar sus puntos a instituciones que trabajan en pro del medio ambiente. Por ejemplo, actualmente se encuentra disponible la posibilidad de plantar un árbol junto a la fundación chilena Reforestemos Patagonia en el bosque allGreenup ubicado al extremo sur de Chile.En tan sólo 8 meses de existencia, hemos unido a una comunidad de más de 10 mil personas que han encontrado en allGreenup una herramienta para mejorar su impacto sobre el planeta y también una causa donde motivarse día a día a realizar un cambio positivo en el mundo.Tenemos un sueño grande! Queremos cambiar al planeta, queremos que el mundo entienda que cada una de sus acciones importan! Es por esto que implementaremos allGreenup en argentina, Brasil, México, Colombia, Perú y el resto de la región. Para esto necesitamos articular las relaciones tanto con las comunidades, gobiernos y empresas en cada uno de estos lugares, además de  seguir desarrollando nuestra aplicación, incorporando nuevas funcionalidades como una nueva manera de compartir tu auto y de medir tu actividad física….aparte de poder mejorar el actual funcionamiento asegurando también la escalabilidad que debemos tener.Y para cumplir nuestra promesa nos dedicamos a entregar incentivos a todos aquellos que hagan este cambio de actitud, entregándoles premios por hacerlo.También en los países en donde el reciclaje no está desarrollado, generaremos una plataforma para que los recicladores bases puedan realizar recolección domiciliaria con manejo de información precisa y oportuna, Por un lado esto provocara un aumento importante en la cantidad de residuos reciclados, los vecinos se verán beneficiados por ellos dado que allgreenup los premiara por hacerlo y finalmente para cerrar el círculo damos la posibilidad de que los recicladores bases mejoren sus condiciones laborales e ingresos.Buscamos llevar allGreenup a cada rincón del mundo, y según la recaudación que logremos tendremos la posibilidad de hacerlo realidad en las siguientes partes del mundo, apóyanos!:

story:
DEUTSCH     ITALIANO      РУССКИЙ      ESPAÑOL      FRANÇAIS     MAGYAR

 

 

 

Using it, roughly is the same as using the conventional rods, except that the body's functioning is ensured by a spring made of stainless steel. We can use interchangeable springs with different mechanical properties depending on the casting weights and the method we use. The spring pole arcs at the same time serve as a line leading ring.

 

 

By using the spring-poles the rod length is radically reduced, this allows you to also go fishing in places where it's not possible to use a longer rod. For example on a bank with dense vegetation, or on a sailing boat where there is no room for our long rod.

 

 

the system: CNC-machined reel seat with removable trigger

Compact: A compact fishing rod - in its field - has the same tasks as a multi-tool, or as a Swiss army knife: to be multifunctional, small and durable. It is certain that most of the tools available in the world are much better suited for the job, than the fold-out tools from the multi-tool. We can choose nowadays between millions of special fishing rods. Most of them are better suited to the fishing style, for what they have been designed for, than their compact companion. Therefore, never expect from a compact device to be the best in any category. However, there are circumstances and locations where it is doing better than a conventional device.

 

 

Its central element it's an aluminum made reel seat - with CNC machining, from which the trigger can be pulled down, making it suitable to receive lower positioned reels besides upper positioned ones.

 


 

The 6 kinds of different flexible spring pole, corresponds to 6 different fishing rod. The mechanical properties are shaped by 3 factors: the diameter of the material they're made of, number of spring-arc bends and the length. All of them can be inserted into the grip into two slots, this way we can use upper and lower positions reel too.

SensorPoles (L=360mm, d=3.0mm):

  • UltraLight:_______________________________________8-coil SensorPole (d:3.0)
  • Light:___________________________________________ 4-coil SensorPole (d:3.0) 

PowerPoles (L=360mm, d=3.5mm):

  • Medium:_________________________________________8-coil PowerPole (d:3.5)
  • Heavy:___________________________________________6-coil PowerPole (d:3.5)
  • ExtraHeavy:______________________________________4-coil PowerPole (d:3.5)

NanoPole (L=250mm, d=3.0mm):

  • Short:___________________________________________6-coil SensorPole (d:3.0)

We designed it in a way that we can enclose the spring-arcs with a rubber ring, minimizing the chances of folding of the line. Using the rubber ring is not a prerequisite for an effective operation, but it's recommended in some cases - depending on the fishing method, the line, the reel, and the casting weight.

 

 

In the lower position: The best operation can be reached with "underspin / triggerspin" reels. Fixed spool (spinning) reels: The smaller the diameter of the spool, the more uniform the winding of the line will be.

In the upper position: You can use the poles without compromises, whether it's a spin cast or a bait cast reel we're speaking of. When we're casting it or winding it up, the line will spin around steadily with bigger reels too, but here it's advisable to use a smaller one.

Casting distance: The short size of the device allows you to cast not only from above but also from the side or bottom. Moving our wrist, we can increase significantly the impetus of the throw. The spring - like a catapult - launches the bait. The casting distance - depending on casting weight - is competing the 2m long traditional rods.

The compact-modular system best suited variations are sold in form of "Packs":

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 example: usage with bait cast reel

 

 

This package would be primarily configured for top position, and for both open and closed face reels, e.g.: "Bait cast" and "level wind" reels and "spin cast” reels. The trigger can be removed from the axis. Without it, we can fish with a lower-positioned reels and a low spring.

When assembled, its length is 60cm/24in. In this package, the MEDIUM PowerPole consisting of 8 arcs is the most sensitive yet powerful spring. Strong, yet sensitive, it's suitable for a versatile use.

 

This package would be primarily configured for low position, and for both open and closed face reels. When assembled, its length is 60cm/24in. The wooden handle is mounted with a long threaded rod, which - secured with lock nut - can be accordingly sized depending on what balance the rod needs. Comes with MEDIUM PowerPole consisting of 8 arcs.

 

 

 

 

 

                              example: usage with - fixed spool - spinning reel

 

 

This package - as its name says - have been compiled with the need to minimize its assembled (48cm/19in) and transportation (25cm/10in) size. Because of its short wooden handle, it's especially suitable for lowercase reels (fixed spool and underspin types), but it can be equipped with uppercase bait casts, raft or ice reels. The package comes with a short spring pole. The short wooden handle is mounted with a long threaded rod, which - secured with lock nut - can be accordingly sized depending on what balance the rod needs. Fully extended, in length it reaches the Spinning grip's length, making it well suited for long spring-poles.

 

 

 

example: usage with - closed face - underspin / triggerspin reel

transporting size of NANO Pack

 

 

 

 

Spring Pole:

  • Color: Bright Steel
  • Surface: Electropolished
  • Diameter: 3.0mm / 3.5mm
  • Material: DIN 17224 CrNi Stainless Steel / ALU socket
  • Rod Tip: Hard Chrome plated Stainless Steel, Ring diameter=12 / 16mm

Reel Seat

  • CNC-machined Reel Seat
  • Surface: Hard Anodized
  • Material: Marine Grade 6061 Aluminum T6
  • Color: Silver (Aluminum)

Handle Grip

  • Ergonomic Handle Grip
  • Material: Steamed Oak / 6061 Aluminum T6
  • Color: Waxed Oak / Silver (Aluminum)

Trigger

  • Removable
  • Material: Die-Cast Aluminium
  • Surface: Polished
  • Color: Silver (Aluminum)

Autumn Catfish: 2750g - SPIN PACK 8-coil PowerPole - Lake Balaton, Hungary
 
Espen L. Mossevik : 1200g - CAST PACK 8-coil PowerPole - Norway
 
Casting technique - CAST PACK - 8-coil PowerPole - River Danube, Hungary
 

 

 

 

 

Full production of the project is done in the EU. The components are made in Budapest, while the surface treatment, assembly and packaging is conducted at our business premise Pomáz, near to the capital. We will ship complete units from here to anywhere around the world. All units will be shipped in a custom, reusable 400x80x80mm slotted carton with form-fitting high-density polyethylene foam for maximum protection. All orders will include Hungarian POST parcel tracking.

European Union: €19. Hungarian POST Priority Mail (0-2kg) 3-4 day delivery

United States: €24. Hungarian POST Prority Mail (0-2kg) 4-10 day delivery

Other Countries: €29. Hungarian POST Priority Mail (0-2kg) 4-21 day delivery

Additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country (ex. EU)

 

 

 

The warranty offered for Packs is 1 year. It is expected that the customer will send back the pack/part to us at their own expense, we will review it and if it is not abnormal usage then it will be replaced and it will be delivered free of charge. The warranty is not applicable to cases other than defects in material, design and workmanship.

 

What is the Coil/Weight ratio?

Ultra Light: 8-coil SensorPole (d:3.0) - for fish up to 1kg 
Light: 4-coil SensorPole (d:3.0) - for fish up to 2kg 
Medium: 8-coil PowerPole  (d:3.5) - for fish up to 3kg 
Heavy: 6-coil PowerPole  (d:3.5) - for fish up to 6kg 
ExtraHeavy: 4-coil PowerPole  (d:3.5) - for fish up to 10kg 
Short: 6-coil SensorPole (d:3.0) - for fish up to 5kg

How is this fishing rod different from other compact fishing rods?

 

Many have asked what the difference is between the commercially available compact fishing rods and the system I have designed. The most significant difference is the REMOVABLE TRIGGER. None of the previously known compact rods had this solution, therefore they can only be used for either casting or spinning methods/reels completely. This is no longer a problem. We do not need to buy further rods again and again. The same spring can be used in both the upper and lower positions. All components of the system can be fit together with the other components. This is what makes this compact rod modular.

What are the optimal casting/lure weights?

The usage of spring fishing rods is very similar to that of traditional rods on the face of it but the mechanical features of steel springs is are of very different nature that those of the classic fishing rod. Therefore it’s difficult to compare it to the normal fishing standard or insert it into this structure. Lure weight of the springs based on our experience:

Ultra Light: 8-coil SensorPole (d:3.0): 10-20g 
Light: 4-coil SensorPole (d:3.0): 15-25g 
Medium: 8-coil PowerPole  (d:3.5): 20-35g 
Heavy: 6-coil PowerPole  (d:3.5): 30-45g 
ExtraHeavy: 4-coil PowerPole (d:3.5): 45g+ 
Short: 6-coil SensorPole (d:3.0): 25-40g

In our enterprise we have gained considerable experience in the area of design and construction, whether it is corporate image building, product design or manufacturing. We are building wide range of contractor relationships, such as printing works, CAD prototype manufacturing and CNC manufacturing technology. We have a contractor background for investment casting works of metal components and structures as well. All of the professional knowledge and manufacturer background is at our disposal for larger series production.

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

    Help Me Spread the Word!    Share with Your Friends and Family!

_____________________________________________________________________________

T H A N K   Y O U !

_____________________________________________________________________________
story_txt:
Fishing for Everyone! Our product is a compact, modular fishing rod (Pat.Pend). Imagine being able to travel anywhere in the world with it, and you don't have to worry about damaging or breaking it. 
You can swap parts according to what method are you using and what fish are you trying to catch. The minimum size of the smallest version for transportation has only 25cm (10in), you can put it even in your pocket. 

Thanks to the removable trigger, you can equip it with all the existing reel types. It weights only 220-240g - depending on the type of spring pole and the handle.
FEATURED ON

  
       DEUTSCH     ITALIANO      РУССКИЙ      ESPAÑOL      FRANÇAIS     MAGYAR
 

Stainless steel spring poles, CNC machined – sea water-resistant 6061 T6 – aluminum reel seat, hardwood handles. No plastics. The result is a truly unbreakable fishing rod, which is made for several decades.

  
 
Using it, roughly is the same as using the conventional rods, except that the body's functioning is ensured by a spring made of stainless steel. We can use interchangeable springs with different mechanical properties depending on the casting weights and the method we use. The spring pole arcs at the same time serve as a line leading ring.
 
 
By using the spring-poles the rod length is radically reduced, this allows you to also go fishing in places where it's not possible to use a longer rod. For example on a bank with dense vegetation, or on a sailing boat where there is no room for our long rod.

Its central element it's an aluminum made reel seat - with CNC machining, from which the trigger can be pulled down, making it suitable to receive lower positioned reels besides upper positioned ones.

story:
**2013-10-16 Update**

Good news! We’ve decided to ship Huku to our supporters in the EU!  (Please add $15 to help us cover the shipping cost)

Can't find the tool when you need it most?

We rely on all kinds of tools to make our lives more convenient. We keep them in tool boxes, drawers, garages, storage areas, or just randomly around the house. We often cannot find the right tool when we need it most, especially if it is one that we do not regularly use. Formosa Treasure (FT) and iThinking are bringing you solutions to this all-too-common problem.

We want to bring you tools that are not only sturdy and practicable, but also modern and fun.

In fact, we are designing frequently-used tools in such a way that can also serve as decorative items and therefore always easy to find. The iThinking design team is bringing you not just ordinary tools, but creatively and thoughtfully designed ones that are convenient, accessible, and aesthetically pleasing.

After more than an year of hard work, we are very excited to present to you: Huku

6 types of commonly used screwdriver heads all hidden within Huku’s body

Huku Design Concept

(Hopefully you can tell by now :) Huku is designed in the shape of an owl.  Huku is similar to “Fukurou”, which is the Japanese name for owl.  Huku has a stylish and slick appearance, yet it is extremely functional. The body is a screwdriver set with a magnetic head, containing enough space to include 6 different types of frequently-used screwdriver bits.  Huku can be a piece of unique desktop decor, or can be readily portable.

In addition, we have tailored our designs for customers who may want even more. We have two advanced models of Huku: one includes a flashlight while the other includes an extension bar with 2 extra bits to enhance usability.

Materials and Construction

All parts of the Huku are expertly selected.  The body of Huku is made of polypropylene(PP), which makes it tough and sturdy. The surface of Huku is coated with thermoplastic rubber (TPR), which makes it comfortable to grip and easy to twist.  The screwdriver bar contained in the Huku is made of chrome vanadium steel (Cr-V), and the screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a silvering finish.

We entrust the manufacturing of Huku to KING TONY, an internationally-known Taiwanese brand that has been specializing in quality professional tools for over 26 years.

More details about the 3 Model types, Color options and Packaging:

1. Huku basic with 6 vibrant color options

Just turn the bottom portion of Huku --> select and remove the bit you need --> latch the bit onto the magnetic tip of the Huku screwdriver

2. Huku with Branch (Flashlight) and 3 elegant color choices

The circular area on top of the tree branch-shaped flashlight is magnetic; it can be used to attach to Huku.

3. Huku with Trunk (with Extension bar and 2 extra bits) and 3 elegant color choices

Pick up Huku --> Push down the extension bar and remove it from the bottom of the tree trunk; the trunk can store a total of 8 bits in addition to the extension bar
Now…The Perks!
**New**  We are now shipping to the EU! (Please add $15 to help us cover the shipping cost)

Project Timeline

We are fully committed to manufacture and deploy Huku in the US.  In fact, we are already in final design/testing stage, parts and molds are being procured, packaging boxes are being printed, and will go into first production on the week of 10/16.  We are also doing our very best to have Huku delivered to you before Christmas if everything goes as planned!

Have More Questions about Huku?

Please leave a Comment or Join the conversations at Crowdfundingforum.com!
story_txt:

find the tool when you need it most?We rely on all kinds of tools to make our lives more
convenient. We keep them in tool boxes, drawers, garages, storage areas, or
just randomly around the house. We often cannot find the right tool when we
need it most, especially if it is one that we do not regularly use. Formosa
Treasure (FT) and iThinking are bringing you solutions to this all-too-common
problem.We want to bring you tools that are not only sturdy and practicable, but also modern and fun.In fact, we are designing frequently-used tools in such a way that can also serve as decorative items and therefore always easy to find. story:
Randy Reisbord AZA #1935 is a chapter in Lonestar Region #73. We support the

TIRR Houston Hotwheels, which is a wheelchair basketball team situated in Houston, Texas. They are one of the best junior wheelchair basketball teams in the nation.

 

 

TIRR Memorial Hermann Hotwheels was founded in 1997, first competing in the 1997-98 basketball season with only five players. As the seasons have continued we have had over 75 wheelchair athletes participate on the Hotwheels basketball team.

Five players from the 2007 TIRR Memorial Hermann Hotwheels team were awarded scholarships to colleges with collegiate wheelchair teams and are continuing to play the sport they love on a college level. One member from the 2009 Hotwheels team continued his basketball career with a scholarship to University of Texas in Arlington and another was selected to the residency program at the US Olympic Training Center in Denver, CO for swimming. A senior on the 2010-2011 team was offered a full athletic scholarship to the University of Texas in Arlington. In 2011-2012, a senior was offered a spot with the University of Illinois fighting Illini Ladies wheelchair basketball team.

story:
****This is my own personal funding for ABM, it is supported by Atomic Bombshells Magazine Editor, Shana Necole, but NOT hosted by her *******

Short Summary

This magazine, Atomic Bombshells, is one of my very favorite publications.  One that I have had to privilege to be published in, and one that I have been honor to contribute to. Due to some major computer issue, ABM has now suffered a MAJOR set back, one that I know it's supporters can remedy!

"In the last couple of weeks, we've suffered some devastating technological issues. The main computer that I use to create the magazine-- with all of the software and files-- had complete driver failure. The more our IT guy tries to fix it, the worse it gets... which is not a good sign. While our files are backed up often, it is a difficult task and the last back-up was done about two to three weeks before the driver crash. 

This means that we lost the majority of our work on three of the newest magazines, and any/all files sent to us by the affiliate staff in the last month. On top of that, we've lost thousands of dollars of software that we use to create the magazine itself.

A simple solution would be to rush to get a new computer, new software, and start from scratch again. Of course, some elements of that will go into motion. However, as some of you are aware, the magazine does not and has never generated a profit. All work is done, knowing that at the present time, not a cent will be made on our end. All of the work is done on personal time, after the completion of my 8-5 day job. This means that, on top of the initial investment to start up the magazine, the business itself will not be able to cover any of these costs.

This leaves me, as the owner and editor-in-chief, solely responsible for trying to come up with a game plan and financial strategy for getting things back on track."

~ Shana Necole, Editor-in-Chief

What We Need & What You Get

ABM Needs:

  • New Computer with software indesign, CS5, illustrator and lightroom.

The Impact

We will get to continue to enjoy a stellar pinup publication.  When magazine have to fold due to technical issue, I think it is unbelievably unfair.  Especially when it has supporters that can, and want, to help.

****This is my own personal funding for ABM, it is supported by Atomic Bombshells Magazine Editor, Shana Necole, but NOT hosted by her *******

story:
It effortlessly provides security with a custom dual-layered RFID film.

 

Unlike traditional passport holders which are far too bulky, the super sleek design makes sure your identity is secure while you're on the move.

 

It'll fit your folded boarding card inside so you can keep all your flying essentials in the same place.

It's slim profile will provide you with seamless security.

 
 

RFID chips are found in contactless credit cards and ePassports. They let you identify yourself quicker, but with a huge compromise in security.

The Wallet II is another product in the minimal collection.
It's made specifically to protect your contactless cards.
 

It's is completely hand made by us from Premium Italian Leather. 

It's super strong, lightweight and water resistant.

 
 

Cocoa Brown or Asphalt Black

 

Vincoe was derived from a collective obsession to make products simple and elegant.

 

Q: How much will shipping cost?
A: We're pleased to offer free shipping worldwide, always.

Q: Which passports are supported?
A: All passports except those with a hardback (eg. German Passport)

story:
Introducing CleanTouch by Advencher 

CleanTouch is an useful EDC (everyday carry) that is ergonomically designed to be used for public doors, locks, touch screens and elevator buttons. Washing hands are extremely important after touching shared surfaces but when you don't have an immediate access to wash your hands, CleanTouch EDC can reduce the point-of-contact area and keep your hands clean!

CleanTouch is machined from antimicrobial brass to stop germ growth! Researchers have discovered that copper and alloys made of it, including brass, can prevent antibiotic resistance in bacteria from spreading. 

CleanTouch is manufactured individually by CNC machine so we can produce it with the beautiful curves and angles.  

Clean Touch Is Great For:

Touchscreens, buttons, door handles, locks, ATM machines and it also works as a can & box opener!

 

Instant Access With FREE Accessories 

Each TouchClean EDC comes with a retractable carabiner, quick release magnetic rings and 10pcs of stylus pen silicone tips.

Use the stylus pen feature with the silicone tip or without it!

Available In Brass and Anodized Aluminum

CleanTouch is available in two different alloys; brass and anodized aluminum. If you prefer your EDC in black color then anodized aluminum is a great option however microbes/viruses live longer on aluminum than brass. 

Please note:

We want to make this clear that we are not offering our reward(CleanTouch) as a medical device. CleanTouch is an every carry item and it is not a medical protection device therefore we can not make any claims to its ability prevent the spread of any microbes and viruses.

CleanTouch is a multi-tool that can be used as a box opener, flat screw driver, scraper, stylus and also it may keep your hands clean on dirty surfaces such as door handles and locks however If you prefer to use CleanTouch in public spaces, we would still recommend wiping it down and washing it with soap after each use.

Compact & Practical Design

Why Brass?

Brass has been used for thousands of years for sterilization.  The Environmental Protection Agency has registered copper, brass and bronze as antimicrobial and is allowing public health claims to be made about their effectiveness against Staphylococcus aureus, MRSA, E. coli O157:H7, Enterobacter aerogenes and Pseudomonas aeruginosa. Copper alloys are a supplement to existing infection control practices and are not a replacement for good hygiene and surface disinfection. (copper.org)

On copper surfaces, bacteria and viruses die. When a microbe lands on a copper surface, the copper releases ions, which are electrically charged particles. Those copper ions blast through the outer membranes and destroy the whole cell, including the DNA or RNA inside. Because their DNA and RNA are destroyed, it also means a bacteria or virus can’t mutate and become resistant to the copper, or pass on genes (like for antibiotic resistance) to other microbes." Michael Schmidt, a professor of microbiology and immunology at the Medical University of South Carolina.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
Hey Thanks for contributing to this campaign but I'm closing this down as of June 2017 and refunding the 3 backers who participated here on Indegogo.  If you are interested in my work and what may be in stock be sure to visit http://www.gamblemade.com

 

 

The design is unconventional, but the Gatekeeper functions beautifully. It's a carabiner. Simply attach your gear, clip it to your belt-loop or bag and you're good to go.  I engineered the Gatekeeper from scratch to be a strong and dependable personal accessory, but my greatest preoccupation has been with the aesthetics of structure.   

I won't try to convince you that you need a Gatekeeper. I didn't spend hundreds of hours designing, troubleshooting and building the prototypes because I thought the world needed another carabiner. I created it because I became obsessed with the idea, and I carry one daily because it works flawlessly. If you back this campaign, do so because you want one. Do so because you appreciate authentic and novel design and care deeply about the build-quality of the things you carry every day.

 

 

Pictured above with the Knox splitring,                                                  Photo credit: Sunny

Carabiners sold as practical personal accessories are a dime-a-dozen, and like the majority of mainstream items, many are designed to fail. The Gatekeeper was designed to endure. Built in layers, it is unlike any other carabiner available. The main assembly consists of 19 pieces machined and cut to strict tolerances, then fastened together with 26 stainless steel machine screws. The final result is a solid piece of personal hardware that looks great and is almost impossible to put down.

 

Pictured above is the full titanium Gatekeeper, along with some of my other pieces.

 

 

 

The Gatekeeper is currently in the mid stages of production. All the discounted units pre-sold via Indiegogo will ship throughout or before July 2016. There is plenty to assemble, obviously, but I have it down to a science and don’t see any trouble hitting my delivery deadline. Overwhelming success would force me to scale up the means of production, but the delivery deadline should still be attainable.  To stay up to date on news from my studio, follow @GambleMade on Instagram.

This is my 4th successful crowdfunded campaign. Rest assured, this unicorn is real!

story:
Wraap it instantly around a bulky sleeve, a handlebar, or a wrist guard, always when it's inconvenient to use your smartwatch or smartphone directly.

We used a prototype for campaign purposes. The final version is going to be thinner with more “minimalistic” display casing design, as well as precise seam and textile finish. The verification process of the current prototype version was focused on improving hardware, mechanical durability, and functionality.

Update 08.2019 - The new final design

We would like to introduce the new design of the display casing. We have heard that many of you prefer more "minimalist" design. We found new technological possibilities to make it much thinner.​

No. 1 in Top 100 Gadgets Trends in June 2019 - Trendhunter

No. 8 in Top 10 Cool Cycling Gadgets & Accessories You Should Buy in 2019​ - TOP10ZONE

“New outdoor smart band designed to fit over your bulky sleeves or even on your handlebar” – Geeky Gadgets

“The 'Wraapit' outdoor smart band is a multifunctional solution for athletes that will provide them with a way to stay connected when enjoying time in the wilderness” – Trendhunter 

 „腕時計にも自転車ナビゲーターにもできる世界初の万能スマートバンド「Wraapit」” Techable

“Wraapit: a smart snap-band for the outdoorsy types” – Gadgets&Wearables 

“Gerade bei Outdooraktivitäten ist es aber umständlich, das Handy aus der Tasche zu kramen oder in Funktionsjacke und Handschuhen einen Blick auf die Smartwatch zu erhaschen. Ein smartes Schnapparmband namens Wraapit soll hier helfen.”- Turn ON Das SATURN Magazin

The first outdoor smart snap wrap band, designed to fit every sleeve or handlebar. Meet the new smartphone controller you can use instantly while performing your favorite activity. “One-second-wrap” enables controlling your devices whenever and wherever you need to act fast. Wraapit saves your time and lets you focus on your activity, without wasting time to pull off the sleeve to check your smartwatch or grab your phone from the pocket. There is no need for taking off winter gloves, you can keep your hands on the handlebar to control phone calls, messages, navigation, music and many more... It's maximum resistant — waterproof and works in low temperatures (-20 °C / -4 °F) when most smartwatches or phones freeze and lose their power fast.

Wraapit was designed to let you control your smartphone while it lies safely in your pocket.

Use compass or azimuth navigation when at off-piste...

or change the song without stopping your activity. 

Check your position and find your way at a glance...​ (turn bt turn or azimuth navi)

...or use it as your bike's computer... it shows your current: time, speed, distance, and altitude​

Answer calls or dial from calls list instantly while you're cycling.​

 

Use a compass or azimuth navigation or read messages at a glance while you enjoy outdoor activities.​

Do you use wrist guards? Worry no more about controlling your phone. Use Wraapit to change a song, answer calls, or check notifications without stopping your activity​.

Flexible construction allows one-second mounting and dismounting. It works like a snap wrap band, simply wrapping around any sleeve, steering wheel, wrist guard, or basically anything! Wraapit whenever you want!​

Specially designed buttons enable using Wraapit even in winter gloves. All you need is your thumb! You can keep your hands on the handlebar while cycling and use Wraapit with one finger. Wraapit is an innovative fusion of comfort and safety! Stay safe and warm!​

Wraapit has an in-built accelerometer and magnetometer. This means you have a compass and navigation system in one! Choose your destination while being active outdoors, or when you're on an off-the-beaten-track adventure, and follow the precise directions to get to the desired spot! Check your speed, and turn the snap wrap on with only one tap! Wraapit is your personal guide!

Thanks to its high-quality hardware, and unique construction, the snap wrap is waterproof and dust-proof (IP65) and works perfectly well in temperature of -20 °C /-4 °F! The OLED screen provides a sharp display and is also energy-efficient, so it maintains a high battery level for hours! Low temperatures tend to drain phone's energy in a blink of an eye, so leave your phone or smartphone in your pocket to keep it warm!

Over 30 days of battery life, in sleep-mode, after one full-charge! The snap wrap works seamlessly for over a week in the regular work mode. Charging Wraapit is a piece of cake: the latest wireless technology makes it suitable for any charger in the QI standard, which is used for other smartwatches as well. Charge your own batteries, Wraapit will run for days!​

Worry no more about the display. The OLED screen provides sharp image and works for hours, even exposed to low temperatures.

Wraapit has its own mini operating system (firmware) and requires a dedicated application in a smartphone (Android & IOS).

Because Wraapit uses the smartphone's CPU, it can boast a low-energy consumption, more stable hardware (especially when it is freezing outside!), and Bluetooth connection that hardly ever fails!

The list of other features we are going to take into consideration for implementing:

  • Action camera controller (we have to analyze the compatibility to such devices)
  • Weather forecast displaying (we have to analyze the access to weather forecast services)

If you have any other suggestions please let us know :)

Easy to love, hard to replace, Wraapit is your #1 outdoors-friendly smart snap wrap that meets expectations of the outdoor and winter-sports enthusiasts, cyclists, skaters, or classic car owners. Maximize your comfort when it is difficult or dangerous to use a smartwatch, phone, or other devices.

Easy to love, hard to replace, Wraapit is your #1 outdoors-friendly smart snap wrap that meets expectations of the outdoor&winter sport enthusiasts, cyclists, skaters or classic car owners. Maximize your comfort when it is difficult or dangerous to use a smartwatch or phone or other devices.

Wraapit is an alternative for many devices – users get a multifunctional snap wrap band which successfully replaces numerous devices at a lower price

The idea of Wraapit primarily was born in June 2017!

"While I was doing outdoor sports, or cycling, I always had a problem with switching the music or checking the missed calls. I had to stop and take the phone out of my pockets or take my gloves off when skiing. I always had to pull  off my sleeves, my hands were  getting terribly cold, and I was wasting time I should be spending on my passion, instead!” - Ludek – the project’s creator,  a skier, cyclist, and fan of outdoor trips. Experienced with electronics, creating concepts and specifying technical requirements of products.

The idea behind Wraapit was embraced with enthusiasm by Karol ( the project manager with experience in sales and logistics.

The responsibility for hardware and firmware of Wraapitlies with highly experienced staff members of the R&D department of the electronics company, Tom and Bart. The person behind the design is Rafael, who has had rich experience in industrial design. On the other hand, software and the smartphone app is handled by the highly-respected software house Neoteric and UI/UX design EFEKT Agency. Our film productions were made with the help of Themontaz.com. HAJDUKSTUDIO is responsible for most of graphics and web creation.

First prototypes were made in 2017 to test the idea of ultra-thin, retractable electric snap wraps and their resistance to bending. The next versions were given new features, such as NFC, microphones, accelerometers, and wireless chargers. The functionality of subsequent components was tested, some of them rather unique in their form. The last version of the prototype, which was created back in October 2018, was given design and software to enhance user experience. All the prototypes were designed and produced with the top-notch components, components of the company Nordic included.

Evolution of Wraapit prototypes

Prehistoric prototype

Checking how it fits on jacket’s sleeve

The latest prototype with different textiles

Our beginnings - the home-made film done with the one of the first prototype... We have been testing it in the wintertime ;)

Fancy watching full movie showing almost all of the features and with info about how we do it? (Watch the full movie down there :) ) 

We continuously work on the final mechanical and product-look design. We consider that high durability is a must, that's why we need to cover OLED display to prevent from possible mechanical damages. However, we plan to create the final design that will be thinnest and more “minimalistic” than it is shown in the latest prototypes on the pictures. Also, the final production version will have accurate textile seams as well as graphics on the textile band...

Choose a design, which speaks to your soul and easily personalize the fabric, color, and overall design of your smart snap wrap! Whether you are all about sports textile, like Condura, prefer jeans, or have a liking for the artificial leather, you will find something to suit your taste! Comfort and style combined? With Wraapit, everything is possible!

The final design concept of Wraapit production version

Wraapit latest prototypes in action

 

Wraapit will be produced in a highly-specialized European electronics factory, which produces components and products for the biggest global companies in automotive, consumer electronics, smart home, smart cities, lightning and wearables industries. Because of it, Wraapit products will meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.
story_txt:
Wraap it instantly around a bulky sleeve, a handlebar, or a wrist guard, always when it's inconvenient to use your smartwatch or smartphone directly.We used a prototype for campaign purposes. The final version is going to be thinner with more “minimalistic” display casing design, as well as precise seam and textile finish. The verification process of the current prototype version was focused on improving hardware, mechanical durability, and functionality.Update 08.2019 - The new final designWe would like to introduce the new design of the display casing. We have heard that many of you prefer more "minimalist" design. We found new technological possibilities to make it much thinner.​No. 1 in Top 100 Gadgets Trends in June 2019 - TrendhunterNo. 8 in Top 10 Cool Cycling Gadgets & Accessories You Should Buy in 2019​ - TOP10ZONE“New outdoor smart band designed to fit over your bulky sleeves or even on your handlebar” – Geeky Gadgets“The 'Wraapit' outdoor smart band is a multifunctional solution for athletes that will provide them with a way to stay connected when enjoying time in the wilderness” – Trendhunter  „腕時計にも自転車ナビゲーターにもできる世界初の万能スマートバンド「Wraapit」” Techable“Wraapit: a smart snap-band for the outdoorsy types” – Gadgets&Wearables “Gerade bei Outdooraktivitäten ist es aber umständlich, das Handy aus der Tasche zu kramen oder in Funktionsjacke und Handschuhen einen Blick auf die Smartwatch zu erhaschen. Ein smartes Schnapparmband namens Wraapit soll hier helfen.”- Turn ON Das SATURN MagazinThe first outdoor smart snap wrap band, designed to fit every sleeve or handlebar. Meet the new smartphone controller you can use instantly while performing your favorite activity. “One-second-wrap” enables controlling your devices whenever and wherever you need to act fast. Wraapit saves your time and lets you focus on your activity, without wasting time to pull off the sleeve to check your smartwatch or grab your phone from the pocket. There is no need for taking off winter gloves, you can keep your hands on the handlebar to control phone calls, messages, navigation, music and many more... It's maximum resistant — waterproof and works in low temperatures (-20 °C / -4 °F) when most smartwatches or phones freeze and lose their power fast.Wraapit was designed to let you control your smartphone while it lies safely in your pocket.Use compass or azimuth navigation when at off-piste...or change the song without stopping your activity. Check your position and find your way at a glance...​ (turn bt turn or azimuth navi)...or use it as your bike's computer... it shows your current: time, speed, distance, and altitude​Answer calls or dial from calls list instantly while you're cycling.​ Use a compass or azimuth navigation or read messages at a glance while you enjoy outdoor activities.​Do you use wrist guards? Worry no more about controlling your phone. Use Wraapit to change a song, answer calls, or check notifications without stopping your activity​.Flexible construction allows one-second mounting and dismounting. It works like a snap wrap band, simply wrapping around any sleeve, steering wheel, wrist guard, or basically anything! Wraapit whenever you want!​Specially designed buttons enable using Wraapit even in winter gloves. All you need is your thumb! You can keep your hands on the handlebar while cycling and use Wraapit with one finger. Wraapit is an innovative fusion of comfort and safety! Stay safe and warm!​Wraapit has an in-built accelerometer and magnetometer. This means you have a compass and navigation system in one! Choose your destination while being active outdoors, or when you're on an off-the-beaten-track adventure, and follow the precise directions to get to the desired spot! Check your speed, and turn the snap wrap on with only one tap! Wraapit is your personal guide!Thanks to its high-quality hardware, and unique construction, the snap wrap is waterproof and dust-proof (IP65) and works perfectly well in temperature of -20 °C /-4 °F! The OLED screen provides a sharp display and is also energy-efficient, so it maintains a high battery level for hours! Low temperatures tend to drain phone's energy in a blink of an eye, so leave your phone or smartphone in your pocket to keep it warm!Over 30 days of battery life, in sleep-mode, after one full-charge! The snap wrap works seamlessly for over a week in the regular work mode. Charging Wraapit is a piece of cake: the latest wireless technology makes it suitable for any charger in the QI standard, which is used for other smartwatches as well. Charge your own batteries, Wraapit will run for days!​Worry no more about the display. The OLED screen provides sharp image and works for hours, even exposed to low temperatures.Wraapit has its own mini operating system (firmware) and requires a dedicated application in a smartphone (Android & IOS).Because Wraapit uses the smartphone's CPU, it can boast a low-energy consumption, more stable hardware (especially when it is freezing outside!), and Bluetooth connection that hardly ever fails!The list of other features we are going to take into consideration for implementing:
Action camera controller (we have to analyze the compatibility to such devices)
Weather forecast displaying (we have to analyze the access to weather forecast services)
If you have any other suggestions please let us know :)Easy to love, hard to replace, Wraapit is your #1 outdoors-friendly smart snap wrap that meets expectations of the outdoor and winter-sports enthusiasts, cyclists, skaters, or classic car owners. Maximize your comfort when it is difficult or dangerous to use a smartwatch, phone, or other devices.Easy to love, hard to replace, Wraapit is your #1 outdoors-friendly smart snap wrap that meets expectations of the outdoor&winter sport enthusiasts, cyclists, skaters or classic car owners. Maximize your comfort when it is difficult or dangerous to use a smartwatch or phone or other devices.
Wraapit is an alternative for many devices – users get a multifunctional snap wrap band which successfully replaces numerous devices at a lower price
The idea of Wraapit primarily was born in June 2017!"While I was doing outdoor sports, or cycling, I always had a problem with switching the music or checking the missed calls. I had to stop and take the phone out of my pockets or take my gloves off when skiing. I always had to pull  off my sleeves, my hands were  getting terribly cold, and I was wasting time I should be spending on my passion, instead!” - Ludek – the project’s creator,  a skier, cyclist, and fan of outdoor trips. Experienced with electronics, creating concepts and specifying technical requirements of products.The idea behind Wraapit was embraced with enthusiasm by Karol ( the project manager with experience in sales and logistics.The responsibility for hardware and firmware of Wraapitlies with highly experienced staff members of the R&D department of the electronics company, Tom and Bart. The person behind the design is Rafael, who has had rich experience in industrial design. On the other hand, software and the smartphone app is handled by the highly-respected software house Neoteric and UI/UX design EFEKT Agency. Our film productions were made with the help of Themontaz.com. story:
At its core, the Crua Modus is a tent.  But it's not just any tent.  This all-in-one camping system by your favorite outdoor Kickstarters is also your sleeping bag, air-mattress, bug mesh, flysheet, picnic blanket, temperature regulator and hammock!  We think you'll find that nearly every piece of the Modus is multi-functional.  You could say that it's modus operandi...

">

We start with the Modus base.  It integrates a self-inflating air mattress and pillow, as well as a zip-on quilt.  Why a zip-on quilt?  When you sleep on a traditional sleeping bag, you are crushing the very fibers that are supposed to be insulating you, making them useless.  The foam and air inside the air mattress are giving you more insulation than you would ever get from the bottom of your sleeping bag, so why have it? And the base is waterproof.

Add the inflatable poles and bug mesh and you have yourself a breezy summer tent. The bug mesh zips straight onto the air mattress giving you 100% coverage from the creepy crawlies.  The inflatable poles are lightweight, pump up in a flash, and attach to the base with Velcro so it's nice and secure.  

 Need more protection from the elements?  Simply add the flysheet.  But this is not just any flysheet, this is a Crua flysheet. So it's tough, waterproof, reversible and reflective to help regulate your temperature in hot or cold weather. Reflect heat away from the tent during the summer, and reflect heat back in during colder days. Now that you have your reflective flysheet paired up with your insulated air-mattress and quilt, your breezy summer tent is now a full-blown insulated one person tent!

 In true 'multi-functionality', your flysheet quickly converts to a hammock, allowing you to relax and swing in the trees. Add the multi-functional porch poles as spreader bars to the hammock or leave them off for the true cocoon 'hammocking' experience. 

Chill out on your comfy air-mattress, but did you know that your quilt can also be your picnic blanket?  One side is super soft to keep you warm and cozy, the other side is tough and waterproof to keep you warm and dry. 

Protect the base of your tent and your 'hangout' porch area with the durable and waterproof footprint. 

We all know that camping isn't just about sleeping.  Whether you're hiking, kayaking, biking or just relaxing in nature, what do you do when you stop?  Sit on a rock?  Not any more.  With Modus, you have loads of lounging options for your downtime. 

Want to keep off the chilly evening breeze or there a threat of some rain?  Add the flysheet and poles over the Modus base and you have yourself a covered porch. 

But what if you don't want to sit on the ground?  Remember, your flysheet is a hammock! 

 Turn your single tent porch into a shared outdoor lounge space.  It's like having your own 'bona-fide' fort!  Who doesn't love a fort? 

Simply connect the two porches at poles and use the waterproof Velcro to keep them sealed up together.   

The extra flysheet can be added for total coverage.  Simply place it on and peg it down to protect yourselves from the elements or just get a bit of privacy.   

 

Meet a few friends on the trail?  Then just set up camp and enjoy the great outdoors! 

Wanna try it out for yourself?  Click the link below to see the Modus in 3D (live AR available for select iPhones).

 

 Crua Modus AR Experience 

 As seen on...

story:
Welcome


Hello stranger, be welcome.

The idea of this project was born a long time ago and now we are ready to present our idea to you. Everything is set and we are ready to take on europe.

 

What's this all about?

It's about us, Steven and Momo, who've known each other since childhood, studying and  living in Berlin, Germanys capital and we are both students. We're also bond by our love for Europe, a love we want to explore futher by experiencing different cultures, discovering unknown places in europe and having an incredible time.

But we also want to bring us Europeans closer together. Therefore we came up with an idea - Letting you guys participate in our journey, animate you to visit unique places, connect Europe a little more and most of all, give all of us a better understanding of what Europe has to offer.


So what will we do in return for you?

Primarily we will share everything through our videoblog. Beyond that, we want to lure you to a fun treasure hunt through Europe. During our travels we are going to leave padlocks at selected locations, locations chosen by you. We will engrave your padlock according to your desire, motive or text, whatever you dig. Maybe you even want to visit a spot in the future to “meet” your sign, or you want to leave a sign in a place where you've already been to!? Maybe some of you will recognize the padlocks of someone else. We will then send you the coordinates and tell you where you can find your personalized padlock. After that it's up to you to go on a treasure hunt, seach and discover you object. (have a look at the perks)



What are our basic conditions for the trip

  •   visiting 14 different countries in 45 days
  •   leaving your signs, at a place chosen by you
  •   making daily video updates about our tremendous adventures 
  •   sending you unique postcards from remarkable places 
  •   bonding people and spots all over Europe 
  •   having an unforgettable trip

Our route

Cities we want to visit:

We are going to start in Berlin and visit then:

Amsterdam            Antwerpen            Lille              London              Le Havre

Paris                      Brest                    Nantes          Bordeaux          Bilbao

Porto                      Lissabon              Sevilla           Barcelona         Marseille

Rom                       Neapel                 Palermo        Athen                Sarajevo

Zagreb                   Graz                     Budapest      Wien                 Warschau


What else can be done?

You wish to help us, but are not in the position to spend some money in this project, because there's a greedy deep black whole in your wallet? You may support us otherwise! 

Spread our campaign all over your communication channels! Like us on Facebook, tweet about us, use whatever you want!


Thank You, you're AWESOME
