story:
ZERO is now officially available on Timekettle Web Store! For those of you who were unable to participate in the campaign, but still want to join us - please visit our official website by clicking HERE to access the site.

 

 

START FROM ZERO

 

Zero was designed to smash language barriers and to end those embarrassing moments. It drastically outperforms existing handheld translators and apps both in price and in user experience.

We hate to rest on our laurels, so we made the Zero both mobile and versatile. It’s a smart mic that’s always at hand for your next business meeting, interview, or to hear yourself practice the language you want to learn.

 

 
 

 

Ultra-small and super portable

At a diminutive 4cm x 1.5cm x 7mm (1.6 x 0.6 x 0.3 inches), Zero is barely there. Slip it into a streamlined card case, and you can fit it into pockets, wallets or purses for maximum accessibility

Natural and easy

face-to-face communication

Top-notch translation technology has never been so accessible. The Zero works together with the other device you carry everywhere: your phone.

Just plug the Zero in and let it take care of the rest.

 

No need to charge it separately or fiddle with buttons. The Zero knows who is speaking and reads aloud what they say in the other person’s language. And just in case, the text appears on both sides of the screen to help clear up any potential misunderstandings.

Enjoy all the little things that make conversations great, like eye contact and smiles.

 

More than just a translator

Your everyday companion

 

MEETING MODE:

Zero records and separates the voices of up to 4 speakers simultaneously, so you don’t have to worry about who said what. The log will conveniently show who’s talking as well as what they said, and you can play it back whenever you want. The microphone array is also set up to cover all angles so that you can just place the Zero on the table and let it do its thing!

 

INTERVIEW MODE:

There’s nothing worse than worrying whether your handheld device has picked up everything, particularly when you’re conducting an interview! Stop going back and listening to the recordings a hundred times over because it’s barely audible. Focus on the relationships you’re building and forget that there’s a tiny device in front of you!!

 

Stretch Goals

you've helped unlocked

 

Memo Extraction

Your conversations and experiences not only recorded within the app, but you will also be able to save the logs to your phone or send it in an e-mail to the business partner you just had your meeting with.

40+ Languages & 90+ Accents

We will add more languages on top of the already amazing 36! They are Persian, Icelandic, Ukrainian, Urdu, etc. 9 more accents will be available by the time we ship in September in September! And connect you to 200 million more people!

Global Chat

Zero now goes beyond just face-to-face conversation - thanks to all your amazing support we managed to unlock the Global Chat; where you can chat with anyone across the world in any language you choose! 

Offline Mode

No matter if you are on a plane; travel without internet connection on your phone; or maybe just the network isn’t working correctly - Zero will keep you safe and secure from all the hassles, and utilize every bit of Zero anywhere, both latitude and longitude!

 

40+ languages & 90+ accents

ALL around the world

It’s become more and more apparent that no company – no matter how large – can optimize the recognition or translation of every single language. So instead of reinventing the wheel, we spent our days and our nights on finding which algorithms work the best for specific languages and only integrating those into our app. What did we get as a result? A service that always outperforms every single-engine translation app or hardware out there.

Chatting with local hawkers in the historical markets of Istanbul? Going to a crazy cool pool party atop Singapore’s iconic Marina Bay Sands Hotel? Interviewing that big exec you’ve been dying to talk to at her Stockholm headquarters? Wherever you go, Zero can follow.

Watch the Zero in Action

The Swedish Lad, Martin, testing Zero on the streets of  Stockholm!
 
 

Behind the Scenes Part 1  -

How we made it so versatile

We developed the world’s smallest quad-microphone array. Sized at only 0.59 inches/ 1.5cm in diameter, it provides performance that is magnitudes beyond your own smartphone mic. 

Advanced voice recognition technology offers performance so sophisticated and powerful that the Zero is second to none in noisy environments. Zero picks up your sentences and recognizes your voice much more clearly and accurately than any other handheld device or smartphone.

0 buttons necessary with the Zero, not even 1! 

Besides, we have also developed a neural network algorithm that enables the Zero to understand when you start talking and when you stop. No more ‘Hey Siri’ or ‘OK Google’.

And last but not least, we made the Zero able to do speech pickup in four directions, allowing up to four people to chat simultaneously. In the past, this was only possible on much larger products, such as smart speakers, but we managed to make it 95% smaller and lighter!

 

 

Behind the Scenes Part 2  -

How we made it so affordable

Because we spent a lot of time on developing this product and put so much cutting-edge technology into a thumb-sized device, we wanted to make sure that none of it goes to waste.

The larger handheld devices ask that you pay for all those extra bells and whistles, so we decided we’d bring down the cost of hardware, DRAMATICALLY. Using your favorite smartphone is just one of the reasons why the price for our hardware is so low: we decided to make a truly accessible device for everyone.

We love when innovation isn’t expensive; that’s what makes it all-around smart.

 

 

Lend us your ears

Maybe you’ve heard of our previous hit, the WT2 in-ear translator! On Kickstarter, the project was fully funded and managed to rack up a total of $276,869 from 1,640 backers!

 

After we fulfilled ALL of our pledges, we launched the WT2 on Amazon (US), and in less than a month, the WT2 became the #1 bestseller in the Translator category.

 

 

We listened to customers’ feedback and used our experience from designing the WT2 to launch an even more accessible translation experience: Zero.

 

 

We've also designed a variety of different cases for Early Bird Specials and a super unique design for our Limited Edition Backers! 

 

 

Who Is Zero For? 

 

"I work for a Refugee Foster Care program, and we deal with young people ages 10 to 24 years old. They come from refugee camps from numerous parts of the world, and meeting their language needs is one of our biggest challenges. It’s wonderful to be able to translate in real-time without the costly use of a hired translator. Your product is a godsend to us here at RFC.”


“There’s nothing quite like being able to chat with people in their native tongue all around the world. As we frequent a lot of hostels during our travel, Zero is the perfect way to chat with people without having to fuss with earphones and handheld devices.”

 

 

“My EYFS classes LOVE the Zero. Working in an International School and being a mother of bilingual children, this is a great opportunity for both them and me to improve our language skills in a fun and nurturing environment.”

 

 

“Going through long audio files is one of the biggest downsides of my job, being able to just do a quick text search for a particular quote has saved me tons of time.”

 

“The large number of refugees that came into Germany were at a massive disadvantage due to language barriers. Thanks to the Zero, we are now able to help children in need and make a difference by helping their parents navigate difficult government administrations.”

 

“My wife is Japanese, her English is great, but communicating with the in-laws can be like treading on eggshells. The Zero has totally changed that and finally have a nice chat with them without the need for my wife to translate everything all the time.”

 

 

How far are we all ready? 

You'll be happy to know that the Zero is ALMOST ready to launch.

Our little cases passing Quality Assurance ! 

It is the last push for the Zero to enter the market, we thank all of our backers' help to get there, we've already got everything ready, and we're raring to go! 

 

 

REFERRAL CONTEST WINNERS!

We would like to say thank you to everyone who helped make this campaign a success by sharing it with friends and family. Together, we have accomplished the goal of enlarging our community, and this level of accomplishment must be rewarded! Announcing the top 10 referrers:

For more details about our referral contest, click HERE.

 

Meet the Team

Since being founded in 2016, our vision and ambition have never changed – to provide the most fluent and immersive communication experience in different languages.

We believe in products that encourage people to reach out and explore, so immersive that the device itself disappears from the user experience.

 

We Believe Communication is Connection

We enjoy the joint collaboration with VecSense Technology for their leading neural network algorithms, particularly their voice-separation technology. Without their help, Zero would not have made possible and completed this well.

Finally, we’d like to thank all users who have supported us all along the way. It is due to you and your trust in Timekettle that we’re continually pushing the envelope as a company.
story_txt:
ZERO is now officially available on Timekettle Web Store! For those of you who were unable to participate in the campaign, but still want to join us - please visit our official website by clicking HERE to access the site.  
START FROM ZERO
 
Zero was designed to smash language barriers and to end those embarrassing moments. It drastically outperforms existing handheld translators and apps both in price and in user experience.
We hate to rest on our laurels, so we made the Zero both mobile and versatile. It’s a smart mic that’s always at hand for your next business meeting, interview, or to hear yourself practice the language you want to learn. 
 
 
 


 
Ultra-small and super portable
At a diminutive 4cm x 1.5cm x 7mm (1.6 x 0.6 x 0.3 inches), Zero is barely there. Slip it into a streamlined card case, and you can fit it into pockets, wallets or purses for maximum accessibility

Natural and easy
face-to-face communication
Top-notch translation technology has never been so accessible. The Zero works together with the other device you carry everywhere: your phone.

Just plug the Zero in and let it take care of the rest.
 
No need to charge it separately or fiddle with buttons. The Zero knows who is speaking and reads aloud what they say in the other person’s language. And just in case, the text appears on both sides of the screen to help clear up any potential misunderstandings.
Enjoy all the little things that make conversations great, like eye contact and smiles.
 

More than just a translator
Your everyday companion
 
MEETING MODE:
Zero records and separates the voices of up to 4 speakers simultaneously, so you don’t have to worry about who said what. The log will conveniently show who’s talking as well as what they said, and you can play it back whenever you want. The microphone array is also set up to cover all angles so that you can just place the Zero on the table and let it do its thing!

 
INTERVIEW MODE:
There’s nothing worse than worrying whether your handheld device has picked up everything, particularly when you’re conducting an interview! Stop going back and listening to the recordings a hundred times over because it’s barely audible. Focus on the relationships you’re building and forget that there’s a tiny device in front of you!!

 
Stretch Goals
you've helped unlocked
 
Memo Extraction
Your conversations and experiences not only recorded within the app, but you will also be able to save the logs to your phone or send it in an e-mail to the business partner you just had your meeting with.
40+ Languages & 90+ Accents
We will add more languages on top of the already amazing 36! They are Persian, Icelandic, Ukrainian, Urdu, etc. 9 more accents will be available by the time we ship in September in September! And connect you to 200 million more people!
Global Chat
Zero now goes beyond just face-to-face conversation - thanks to all your amazing support we managed to unlock the Global Chat; where you can chat with anyone across the world in any language you choose! 
Offline Mode
No matter if you are on a plane; travel without internet connection on your phone; or maybe just the network isn’t working correctly - Zero will keep you safe and secure from all the hassles, and utilize every bit of Zero anywhere, both latitude and longitude!
 
40+ languages & 90+ accents
ALL around the world
It’s become more and more apparent that no company – no matter how large – can optimize the recognition or translation of every single language. So instead of reinventing the wheel, we spent our days and our nights on finding which algorithms work the best for specific languages and only integrating those into our app. What did we get as a result? A service that always outperforms every single-engine translation app or hardware out there.

Chatting with local hawkers in the historical markets of Istanbul? Going to a crazy cool pool party atop Singapore’s iconic Marina Bay Sands Hotel? Interviewing that big exec you’ve been dying to talk to at her Stockholm headquarters? Wherever you go, Zero can follow.

Watch the Zero in Action


The Swedish Lad, Martin, testing Zero on the streets of  Stockholm!

 
 
Behind the Scenes Part 1  -
How we made it so versatile
We developed the world’s smallest quad-microphone array. Sized at only 0.59 inches/ 1.5cm in diameter, it provides performance that is magnitudes beyond your own smartphone mic. 

Advanced voice recognition technology offers performance so sophisticated and powerful that the Zero is second to none in noisy environments. Zero picks up your sentences and recognizes your voice much more clearly and accurately than any other handheld device or smartphone.

0 buttons necessary with the Zero, not even 1! 
Besides, we have also developed a neural network algorithm that enables the Zero to understand when you start talking and when you stop. No more ‘Hey Siri’ or ‘OK Google’.
And last but not least, we made the Zero able to do speech pickup in four directions, allowing up to four people to chat simultaneously. In the past, this was only possible on much larger products, such as smart speakers, but we managed to make it 95% smaller and lighter!
 


 
Behind the Scenes Part 2  -
How we made it so affordable
Because we spent a lot of time on developing this product and put so much cutting-edge technology into a thumb-sized device, we wanted to make sure that none of it goes to waste.
The larger handheld devices ask that you pay for all those extra bells and whistles, so we decided we’d bring down the cost of hardware, DRAMATICALLY. Using your favorite smartphone is just one of the reasons why the price for our hardware is so low: we decided to make a truly accessible device for everyone.
We love when innovation isn’t expensive; that’s what makes it all-around smart.
 

 
Lend us your ears
Maybe you’ve heard of our previous hit, the WT2 in-ear translator! On Kickstarter, the project was fully funded and managed to rack up a total of $276,869 from 1,640 backers!

 
After we fulfilled ALL of our pledges, we launched the WT2 on Amazon (US), and in less than a month, the WT2 became the #1 bestseller in the Translator category.
 


 
We listened to customers’ feedback and used our experience from designing the WT2 to launch an even more accessible translation experience: Zero.
 

 
We've also designed a variety of different cases for Early Bird Specials and a super unique design for our Limited Edition Backers! 
 


 
Who Is Zero For? 
 

"I work for a Refugee Foster Care program, and we deal with young people ages 10 to 24 years old. They come from refugee camps from numerous parts of the world, and meeting their language needs is one of our biggest challenges. It’s wonderful to be able to translate in real-time without the costly use of a hired translator. Your product is a godsend to us here at RFC.”

“There’s nothing quite like being able to chat with people in their native tongue all around the world. As we frequent a lot of hostels during our travel, Zero is the perfect way to chat with people without having to fuss with earphones and handheld devices.” 
 

 
“My EYFS classes LOVE the Zero. Working in an International School and being a mother of bilingual children, this is a great opportunity for both them and me to improve our language skills in a fun and nurturing environment.”
 

 
“Going through long audio files is one of the biggest downsides of my job, being able to just do a quick text search for a particular quote has saved me tons of time.”


 
“The large number of refugees that came into Germany were at a massive disadvantage due to language barriers. Thanks to the Zero, we are now able to help children in need and make a difference by helping their parents navigate difficult government administrations.”
 

“My wife is Japanese, her English is great, but communicating with the in-laws can be like treading on eggshells. The Zero has totally changed that and finally have a nice chat with them without the need for my wife to translate everything all the time.” 
 

 
How far are we all ready? 
You'll be happy to know that the Zero is ALMOST ready to launch.

Our little cases passing Quality Assurance ! 
It is the last push for the Zero to enter the market, we thank all of our backers' help to get there, we've already got everything ready, and we're raring to go! 
 
 
REFERRAL CONTEST WINNERS!
We would like to say thank you to everyone who helped make this campaign a success by sharing it with friends and family. Together, we have accomplished the goal of enlarging our community, and this level of accomplishment must be rewarded! Announcing the top 10 referrers:

For more details about our referral contest, click HERE.
 
Meet the Team
Since being founded in 2016, our vision and ambition have never changed – to provide the most fluent and immersive communication experience in different languages.
We believe in products that encourage people to reach out and explore, so immersive that the device itself disappears from the user experience.
 
We Believe Communication is Connection
We enjoy the joint collaboration with VecSense Technology for their leading neural network algorithms, particularly their voice-separation technology. Without their help, Zero would not have made possible and completed this well.

Finally, we’d like to thank all users who have supported us all along the way. It is due to you and your trust in Timekettle that we’re continually pushing the envelope as a company.

story:
Featured on. 

The PRVKE Pack is a backpack with a purpose. We are passionate photographers, travelers, commuters, creators, and explorers, and needed a pack that could keep up with our adventurous lifestyle. What we've created is a bag that can flow from photography shoots to commutes, from the airport to interstellar travel effortlessly, all while being ridiculously good looking and standing up to the inevitable beating we dish out along the way.

When we set out our goal wasn’t just to make a great photography and travel bag. We wanted to encourage others to stop focusing on the monotony of daily live and to really live.

A great bag does more than carry your stuff. A great bag evokes action and facilitates adventure, all while being so intuitive, you forget it's even there.

Versatile

We get it. Your life is in constant motion and your carrying needs are ever changing. Your life isn't stagnant and your bag shouldn't be either. Whether you are heading to a photo shoot, traveling across the globe, or commuting to work, the PRVKE pack was designed to adapt to your lifestyle.

 Magnetic Tote Handles

Trifold Laptop Sleeve 

Our laptop sleeve adjusts to fit the size of your laptop. Oh, and no need to take it out when going through security. The sleeve is FAA approved so just open the clam shell, put it through the scanner, and be on your way.

A set of our versatile accessory straps are included with every bag, and they're here to make your life easier. You can also order an extra pair of accessory straps with your pack by adding $12 to your pledge amount. 

Incredibly Accessible

There's nothing more frustrating than needing your camera, a book, a pen, headphones, etc., out of your bag, and it taking 5 minutes to do so. Great design is seamless, intuitive, and accessible, so all of your gear is at your fingertips.

Clamshell Opening

 Roll Top

 Side Access

Top Pocket

 Secure Documents Pocket

Front Pocket 

 Side Pocket

We hate neck straps – they are uncomfortable and always seem to get in the way. So we designed a camera sling that integrates with the PRVKE Pack to make your camera easy to carry and accessible so you never miss a shot. The best part – it's included with every pack!

 Lens Cap Holder

 SD Card/Battery Pocket

Sexy

Let's be honest, most camera and travel bags are like cargo pants, they're functional, but you lose all dignity wearing them (sorry dad). When we set out to make the PRVKE pack, we knew that it had to look incredible. 

Sleek and minimal urban design so that you feel good wherever you are. 

Bomb Proof

Each material in the pack has been carefully chosen for its performance characteristics as well as aesthetic quality. We're perfectionists and obsessed over every detail – both in looks and function.

Tarpaulin and Nylon Dobby are weather resistant and extremely durable to ensure your gear stays safe from the elements. The seams of the bag aren't completely waterproof, but you certainly won't have to worry about a little rain.

We've included a rainfly with dedicated storage – so you're ready for those torrential downpours.

 YKK Zippers

 Photographers

Travelers

Commuters

Creators

Explorers

 This bag is for the adventurous, and molds to any situation they find themselves in.


Because sometimes you need a little more organization for your cords, pocket sized Tabasco, chapstick, small electronics, and throwing knives. The WANDRD Pouch is just as sexy and bombproof as the PRVKE Pack, because it's made out of the same high-quality tarpaulin and YKK zippers. 

PRVKE Pack Features:

  • 3 Points of access: Roll Top, Side Quick Camera Access, and Clamshell Opening
  • Modular, removable camera cube that fits a DSLR and up to 8 lenses
  • Integrated side camera sling 
  • FAA approved adjustable laptop sleeve 
  • Two, dual hook cinch straps with 4 connection points for external gear attachment (front or bottom) 
  • Extra secure passport pocket built into the molded back panel 
  • Rainfly with dedicated storage
  • Expandable water bottle/tripod pocket

PRVKE Pack Construction:

  • Tarpaulin and Nylon Dobby
  • YKK Zippers

PRVKE Pack Dimensions:

  • 19" x 12.5 " x 8"
  • 38 Liters

WANDRD Pouch Features:

  • Internal and external pocket
  • Fleece lining

WANDRD Pouch Construction:

  • Tarpaulin
  • YKK Zippers

WANDRD Pouch Dimensions

  • 9" x 7.5"

When it comes down to it, we are just a couple of dudes that really don’t want to work in an office, at a desk, 9-5. As you watch our video you are peeking into a big part of our lives. We have been lucky enough to grow up in Utah where we have access to some of the greatest landscapes in the world within a couple hours drive and we try to take full advantage of it. We are both avid travelers, adventurers, photographers, creators, complainers, and explorers - and yes we are brothers. I (Spencer) consider myself the style of this duo and Ryan is the function - anyone who knows us will not disagree. We grew up traveling a lot with our family and have continued to do so as we’ve gained our independence and much of our life revolves around the next adventure. 

Now that you know who we are you probably want to know why this bag? The honest truth, as cliche as it sounds, we both wanted a solid bag that was sexy yet functional. We both made several purchases trying to fulfill this need. We both were extremely frustrated with we what we found on the market.
story_txt:
Featured on. The PRVKE Pack is a backpack with a purpose. We are passionate photographers, travelers, commuters, creators, and explorers, and needed a pack that could keep up with our adventurous lifestyle. What we've created is a bag that can flow from photography shoots to commutes, from the airport to interstellar travel effortlessly, all while being ridiculously good looking and standing up to the inevitable beating we dish out along the way.Designed to be everything you need in a bag, and nothing more.Custom molded back panel and cushioned, breathable shoulder straps for maximum comfortAvailable in any color you want... as long as it's black.With the PRVKE Pack you get the removable cube system, two accessory straps, and a camera sling. With the WORKS, you get all of that plus the WANDRD Pouch.When we set out our goal wasn’t just to make a great photography and travel bag. We wanted to encourage others to stop focusing on the monotony of daily live and to really live.A great bag does more than carry your stuff. A great bag evokes action and facilitates adventure, all while being so intuitive, you forget it's even there.VersatileWe get it. Your life is in constant motion and your carrying needs are ever changing. Your life isn't stagnant and your bag shouldn't be either. Whether you are heading to a photo shoot, traveling across the globe, or commuting to work, the PRVKE pack was designed to adapt to your lifestyle.The removable foam cube and internal bag divider make it easy to seamlessly organize your gear in a customizable way that makes the most sense for you.The cube is designed to fit a DSLR body and up to 8 lenses – or any similar combination of cameras, lenses, accessories, and gear you can think of.Not taking your camera? Remove or change the layout of the dividers and use the cube to organize your clothes, toiletries, etc. when you travel. Easily unpack your clothes by removing the packed cube and use your PRVKE pack as a day bag.With the cube out, you can leave the bag's internal divider up so you have two separate compartments for more organized packing......or fold the divider down so you can fit bigger items such as textbooks, sketchpads, or jazz instruments. Magnetic Tote HandlesMagnetic tote handles make it easy to carry the bag when getting on and off of trains, buses, or planes.The magnetics tote handles are strong enough to hold together when you need them to, but quickly pull apart when you need to access your gear.Trifold Laptop Sleeve The tri-fold laptop sleeve will adjust to fit your 13"–17" (up to 11"x16" dimensions) laptop snugly, so you don't have to worry about it moving around in your bag.Our laptop sleeve adjusts to fit the size of your laptop. Oh, and no need to take it out when going through security. The sleeve is FAA approved so just open the clam shell, put it through the scanner, and be on your way.Adjust the tri-fold system to your laptop once, then easily slide your laptop in and out forever more.A set of our versatile accessory straps are included with every bag, and they're here to make your life easier. You can also order an extra pair of accessory straps with your pack by adding $12 to your pledge amount. And yes, they are also black.Attach the accessory straps to the bottom of the bag to carry a tripod, blanket, beach towel, puppy, or anything else you need to bring along.You can also use the accessory straps to latch all sorts of crap to the front of the bag.The accessory straps also hook to the inside of the clamshell so you can use the bag like a tray. No need to fumble with two lenses, four lens caps, and a camera body when changing lenses. You can also use it to sell peanuts at a baseball game.Every bag also comes with a removable waist strap to help carry the load when you need it......and easily take it off and keep that minimal look when you don't.Incredibly AccessibleThere's nothing more frustrating than needing your camera, a book, a pen, headphones, etc., out of your bag, and it taking 5 minutes to do so. Great design is seamless, intuitive, and accessible, so all of your gear is at your fingertips.Clamshell OpeningLay flat packing makes all of your gear accessible when you need it – and this is just one of the main access points on the PRVKE Pack.Each compartment zips closed so everything stays in place and looks super clean. Mesh lining for the upper pocket, so you can see your gear when closed. Lining for the camera compartment to keep dust out, even when the clamshell is open. Roll TopThe roll top gives you quick access to your bag without opening the clam shell.It also allows you to expand and contract the bag depending on how much gear you are packing. Side AccessThe side pocket gives you quick access to your camera or whatever else you may be carrying, without taking off the pack. And works seamlessly with the removable foam cube.Side camera access view from clamshell opening.Top PocketFleece lined top pocket for those items you need most accessible. Secure Documents PocketThe secure documents pocket is built into the molded back panel so you have a safe place for your passport and cash. Good luck to the thieves who try and pick this pocket while your pack is on.Front Pocket The front pocket is a catch all – great for magazines, documents, cords, and the WANDRD Pouch. Side PocketThe side pocket unzips and expands to accommodate a travel size tripod or water bottle. When not in use, the pocket zips flat in adherence with the minimalist style.Easily fits both large and small water bottles.We hate neck straps – they are uncomfortable and always seem to get in the way. So we designed a camera sling that integrates with the PRVKE Pack to make your camera easy to carry and accessible so you never miss a shot. The best part – it's included with every pack!The camera sling gives you quick access to your camera when you need it...fits cameras of all sizes, by attaching to the tripod mount screw...and is much more comfortable than a neck strap.
The side camera sling is made with high-quality webbing and locking clips so your camera is secure.Unlike with a neck strap, your camera won't bounce around as you walk with the side camera sling. Lens Cap HolderElastic lens cap holder on right shoulder strap easily catches most lens cap sizes. SD Card/Battery PocketElastic pockets on left shoulder strap for SD cards and smaller batteries – so you are always ready. SexyLet's be honest, most camera and travel bags are like cargo pants, they're functional, but you lose all dignity wearing them (sorry dad). When we set out to make the PRVKE pack, we knew that it had to look incredible. Sleek and minimal urban design so that you feel good wherever you are. Bomb ProofEach material in the pack has been carefully chosen for its performance characteristics as well as aesthetic quality. We're perfectionists and obsessed over every detail – both in looks and function.Custom molded, oversized buckle for ease of access and distinct style.Tarpaulin and Nylon Dobby are weather resistant and extremely durable to ensure your gear stays safe from the elements. The seams of the bag aren't completely waterproof, but you certainly won't have to worry about a little rain.Yes, there really was camera gear in the bag. But please remember that this bag is not waterproof, just highly water resistant.We've included a rainfly with dedicated storage – so you're ready for those torrential downpours.The rainfly is fitted to the pack, but leaves enough room for the accessories you have strapped to the outside of bag to fit under there as well.The rainfly tucks away into its own bottom pocket so you are always ready for any weather.It also straps around the back, so you can ride your motorcycle without fear of it ripping off in the wind. YKK ZippersYKK zippers are the industry standard for a reason. The documents and side camera pocket also have a zipper garage to keep you comfortable and your gear safe.
 PhotographersTravelersCommutersCreatorsExplorers This bag is for the adventurous, and molds to any situation they find themselves in.
Because sometimes you need a little more organization for your cords, pocket sized Tabasco, chapstick, small electronics, and throwing knives. The WANDRD Pouch is just as sexy and bombproof as the PRVKE Pack, because it's made out of the same high-quality tarpaulin and YKK zippers. Internal and external pocket to organize gear.Fleece lined to snuggle your valuables.It was designed to fit perfectly inside the front pocket of the PRVKE Pack, but of course you can use it anywhere.PRVKE Pack Features:

Modular, removable camera cube that fits a DSLR and up to 8 lenses
Integrated side camera sling 
FAA approved adjustable laptop sleeve 
Two, dual hook cinch straps with 4 connection points for external gear attachment (front or bottom) 
Extra secure passport pocket built into the molded back panel 
Rainfly with dedicated storage
Expandable water bottle/tripod pocket

YKK Zippers

We have been lucky enough to grow up in Utah where we have access to some of the greatest landscapes in the world within a couple hours drive and we try to take full advantage of it. We are both avid travelers, adventurers, photographers, creators, complainers, and explorers - and yes we are brothers. story:
My name is Carlyle Potter, and I invented the ProTouch® Wedge Design known as Sole Channel Technology®...

 

the ONLY design that Reduces Resistance in sand & rough!

 

THE RAKE EFFECT MAKES A HUGE DIFFERENCE! 

The "sole channels" give recreational golfers the option to hit green-side bunker shots the same way they do a regular pitch shot - i.e. square stance, square face - and aim directly at the pin.  It's SO SIMPLE the ProTouch Way,

 

Green-side Bunker Shots are NO LONGER the Most Dreaded Shot in Golf!!!

 

With your help, we hope to raise $50,000 in funding, which will then be used to create a DRTV commercial to be aired on The Golf Channel.  And, because we already have products ready to sell, early adopters who donate $70 will receive their own ProTouch 56º Sand Wedge or 60º LOB Wedge. That's OVER 50% off the retail price!!! 

 

Soon you’ll be playing the best golf of your life with a ProTouch Wedge!

All funds raised over the next 60 days will be used to promote this game-improvement club to the golfing world.  We feel that advertising on the golf channel, although not cheap, will give us the best chance of finding the exact people who need our club… which is basically 95% of all golfers...  because Green-side Bunker Shots are the MOST DREADED SHOT in golf!

THESE CLUBS WORK REALLY WELL!

If you have read this far, thank you!  I promise you that if you will give this club an honest try, your golf game will change forever. 

Still not sure?  Then please visit our website that goes into greater detail about how and why ProTouch Wedges, with Sole Channel Technology, will change the golf world as we know it. 

www.ProTouchGolfWedges.com

FYI - We have the inventory to ship today!  You will start lowering your score the first time you use the ProTouch Wedges... WE GUARANTEE IT or we'll refund your donation!

story:
click here to order hifold online > 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

say goodbye to big bulky highback boosters that are difficult to carry around.
hifold folds down to fit into its small carry bag for even easier travel.

 

 

 

with a range of height and width settings and patented adjustable lap and shoulder guides, the hifold booster provides a safe and secure belt fit.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

designed, engineered and tested to meet regulatory standards worldwide* while being comfortable enough for even the most sensitive of children.

 

Height Folded: 225mm
Full height: 770mm
Length Folded: 350mm
Full height: 435mm
Width Folded: 390mm
Full height: 465mm
Weight less than 4kg
Materials hifold has a unique 4 layer design: Layer 1: Ultra-light weight EPP (Expanded Polyproplyene) foam for superior impact resistance. Layer 2: A dense energy absorbing EVA (Ethylene-vinyl acetate) layer for added protection. Layer 3: A comfortable PU (polyurethane) foam and airflow™,washable fabric. Layer 4: A tough PP (Polyproplyene) shell.

 

 

* hifold by mifold is a highback booster that has been designed and engineered to comply with all worldwide regulatory standards. On delivery, hifold will comply with UN ECE R44/04 for most countries. NHTSA standard FMVSS 213 for the USA. RSSR CMVSS 213 for Canada. CCC for China and various local standards for Australia, Chile, South Korea, and Taiwan. “3x smaller and just as safe” Safety claim based on the hifold seat’s complying with these regulations.

 

 

 

The mifold team is led by Jon Sumroy, founder and CEO. Jon was inspired by the need to provide protection for children in every car journey including those where a suitable child restraint was not readily available (for example when carpooling, taxis, car rentals, grandparents, vacations etc.). The whole mifold team are equally committed to child passenger safety and are passionate about bringing consumer friendly solutions for modern day on-the-go families.

hifold is our second product delivering our vision of a child restraint for every child in every car for every journey every time.

 

 

 

we ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs.
Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

 

Latest update:

 

- Having started manufacturing earlier this month, we’re ramping up and thankfully, everything has been moving very smoothly. 

- We have started cutting and sewing the seat covers

- The first containers of hifold seats from the factory will ship out on Monday, July 29.

- Delivery will be chronological, so your order will be shipped out depending on when you placed it.

- Delivery can take 10 - 30 days, depending on your location.

- We will post a detailed timetable the week of Monday, July 22 - we’ll remind you to check it by posting an update like this one.

- You may only receive a tracking number for the last segment of the 3-step shipping process, which could mean you don’t receive a tracking number until 2-3 weeks after shipping has started.

 

By backing now you will enjoy significant pre-order discounts. These discounts will be reduced as we approach the shipping dates.

 

hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member or
coworker who needs this!

 

 

 


What is it?

 

hifold is the grab-and-go highback booster seat.  It's more than 3x smaller than a regular booster and just as safe.  hifold is the most advanced, compact, portable and adjustable HBB ever invented.
Who created it? Jon Sumroy is the founder and CEO of mifold. Jon's vision is a child restraint for every child, in every car, for every journey, every time.
Why should we use it? hifold keeps your child safe on every car adventure. hifold is compact and can be quickly folded down for easy transfer between cars and convenient storage. hifold is lightweight and small for portability - it even fits into a back pack! hifold is fully adjustable - it grows as your child grows.
Why should I use hifold instead of mifold? The mifold range of car seats will always be the most compact and portable child restraints that we produce.  They are so convenient and it's easy to keep one in every child's school bag and glove-box so children can always be safe, no matter whose car they are in!  hifold is our new addition to the world of ultra-compact car seats.  hifold offers the added support, comfort and perceived protection that some parents are looking for in a highback booster.  hifold folds so small that it solves all the storage and portability problems that make traditional highbacks so cumbersome and inconvenient.
How much does it cost?  The recommended retail price for hifold is $179
Where can we buy it? Pre-order exclusively on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order? hifold the grab-and-go highback booster seat.
Why are you crowdfunding? The first mifold campaign was the most successful crowdfunding ever for a juvenile product. Through this campaign we want to offer an exclusive opportunity to be the first to share in the success of hifold.

 

What features are available? hifold is foldable - hifold is the first ever foldable high back booster seat. It can fold down to fit in a small carry bag.  
hifold is also the most adjustable booster seat - the height, lap and shoulder width and head rest can easily be adjusted as your child grows.
What colors do you offer? The first hifold will be a Slate Grey and Black combination. We also offer a Racing Red, unlocked here as a stretch goal. 
What sizes do you offer? hifold is fully adjustable and is suitable for children between 33-100 lbs, and 36-59" inches for the USA.  While for the rest of the world, it is for children from 15kg-45kg and up to the height of 90-150cm.
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? hifold is designed to offer the highest levels of comfort and safety. hifold has a unique 4 layer design: 
Layer 1: Ultra-light weight EPP foam for superior impact resistance.
Layer 2: A dense energy absorbing memory form layer for added protection. 
Layer 3: A comfortable PU foam and airflow™,washable fabric. 
Layer 4: A tough Polyproplyene shell.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology? foldable - hifold is the first ever foldable highback booster seat. It can fold down to fit in a small carry bag. 
portable - hifold is the lightest high back booster on the market. Its weight is half that of other high back boosters. 
adjustable - hifold is the most adjustable booster seat - the height, lap and shoulder width and head rest can easily be adjusted as your child grows.
What are the dimensions and weight? When hifold is folded down it's size is: width 390mm, height 225mm, length 350mm
When hifold is at its largest size: width 465mm, height 770mm, length 435
How does it work? When hifold is folded down it's size is: width 390mm, height 225mm, length 350mm
When hifold is at its largest size: width 465mm, height 770mm, length 435
Will there be updates to it in the future? We constantly innovate and introduce improved version of our products.
Is it washable? hifold uses an airflow™ washable fabric that can be easily removed and washed.
Where is it manufactured?     hifold is manufactured in China. Our manufacturing partners are world renowned manufacturers that are ISO approved and operate at the highest level of manufacturing and quality control standards. They already manufacture child restraint products for several other well known companies.
Does hifold work with a latch system or the European Isofix? No, it is not compatible with Latch or Isofix
Is hifold treated with chemical based flame retardants?  hifold will comply with the car seat booster seat flammability tests required under the NHTSA regulation FMVSS213 for the USA, Transport Canada regulation CMVSS213 for Canada, and under the UN regulations: UN ECE R44.04. This flame retardancy is achieved only using compounds where necessary and that comply with California Proposition 65 and other state requirements in the USA and with the European Community Regulation REACH (EC/1907/2006).
Will hifold fold when in use? When being used by a child in a vehicle, all the folding components lock securely in place. These folding and locking mechanisms have been created and tested to be strong and secure so that they are not affected by the forces of a collision. hifold has been through rigorous testing with the most advanced computer simulations to ensure this and will comply with the following regulations - NHTSA FMVSS 213 in the United States, RSSR CMVSS 213 in Canada and UN ECE R44/04 in most other countries.

 

How do I set it up? hifold can be easily set up from folded to open in less than 10 seconds.  hifold is easily held in position by the car seatbelt.
What is the care and cleaning of it? hifold uses an airflow™ washable fabric that can be easily removed and washed.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? hifold uses an airflow™ washable fabric that can be easily removed and washed.
Does it have an expiry date? Seven years from the date of manufacture.

 

What are the recommend ages? Recommended for ages 4 to 6. hifold is fully adjustable and is suitable for children between 33-100 lbs, and 36-59" inches for the USA.  While for the rest of the world, it is for children from 15kg-45kg and up to the height of 90-150cm.. 
Where can I use it? hifold is designed for use exclusively in cars that have a lap and shoulder belt seat belt system.
Is it safe? Safety is always our number 1 priority. hifold is designed and tested to meet the regulatory requirements of every country on earth.
What certifications do you have?

hifold has been designed and engineered to meet or exceed the regulatory standards for every country on earth including: UN ECER44/04 for most countries; NHTSA FMVSS 213 for the USA; RSSR CMVSS 213 for Canada; CCC for China and various local versions for Australia, Chile, South Korea and Taiwan.  Sophisticated computer simulated crash tests were used during the development to optimise hifold prototypes.  We expect to complete regulatory processes later this year with the first production seats as soon as they are assembled.  We keep the mifold website updated with regulatory information. 
What happens if you do not comply with these regulatory standards?

We are confident that this will not happen as hifold has been designed and engineered to meet or exceed the regulatory standards mentioned above.

However, it is definitely our intention to provide refunds if we are prevented from launching hifold in a particular region due to the regulatory approvals process.
How secure is it? Safety is always our number 1 priority. hifold is designed and tested to meet the regulatory requirements of every country on earth.
Are there any risks associated with use?     It reduces the risk of injury and death in a collison or deceleration event.

 

When does shipping begin? Our intention is to ship hifold by April 2019.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? April 2019
Where does it ship? Worldwide
How much is shipping? Early bird one pack - free shipping to US and Canada, $15 shipping rest of world; Early bird 2 pack free shipping to US and Canada, $25 rest of world; Early bird 3 pack - free shipping to US and Canada, $35 rest of world; Early bird 6 pack - free shiping to US and Canada, $65 rest of world; Early bird 12 pack - free shipping to US and Canada, $125 rest of world.  Please note that shipping charges may increase at any time during the campaign.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please contact us at: distribution@mifold.com
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? From our experience so far, we have discovered that certain countries can and will charge a local tax. It is the purchaser's responsibility to pay all local taxes where applicable (including but not limited to sales tax, VAT, GST, duties, etc.).
Can I receive it today? It will not be available till Q1 2019

 

Is there a warranty? Yes, hifold has an industry standard warranty for car seats and depending on the country, the warranty may be better than this.
What is your refund policy? Orders made through indiegogo are not refundable.  Indiegogo is not a traditional eCommerce store and when you contribute to the Indiegogo campaign, you are supporting us in the development of hifold.  We use the funds to make hifold a reality.  As a "thank you" for supporting the campaign, we offered you hifold at a significant discount.  This is the nature of crowdfunding and this was set out in the Indiegogo terms and conditions when you placed your order.
What is your return / exchange policy? See above
How can I check the status of my pre-order? We will contact you closer to your shipping date.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping us to bring hifold, a highly innovative product to market. We need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: press@mifold.com
Investment Inquiries: invest@mifold.com
Support: support@mifold.com

less than 4kg

story:
PITSTOP area
  Unfold the backpack to create a portable workspace.


PITSTOP area to build, repair and perfect your quad quickly. Place the quad in the central area and have easy access to your tools and spare parts.

 

  MAGNETCASE
  This magnetized pocket makes sure metal objects stay perfectly in place.

Never lose your screws again. The magnetic surface inside the pocket prevents metallic objects to slip away.


  CLEANSEAT
  Keep your pants clean while repairing your drone.


This surface gives you a comfortable area to build or repair your gear and keep you clean.

Modular divider set
Manage the space inside the backpack based on your needs. With this set of dividers, you can create the ideal compartments for your quads and all your accessories. Each divider has a mesh pocket for additional space.


 


 

  • 2 adjustable external quad straps
  • Quick release side straps for a tripod and a folding chair
  • Top pocket for personal items (keys, passport, etc.)
  • 2 organizer pockets on both sides
  • Stretchy mesh pockets on both sides
  • Comfortable back padding
  • Adjustable hip and sternum straps for a sturdy fit
  • Extendable rain cover to fit externally fitted quads
  • Puncture proof organizer pockets inside
  • A big laptop pocket for 15-inch and some 17-inch models
     

 

We fit a minimum of 4 quads, goggles, controller, 15 LiPo’s, 40 props, laptop, tools, spare parts, personal items, tripod, foldable chair and a water bottle. With the flexibility of the modular dividers, other items might fit as well.







This spacious, padded pouch holds around 15 LiPo's. It is designed to have a snug fit inside your Quad PITSTOP Backpack PRO. The LiPo Safe Pouch is made of high quality, fire retardant fiberglass and treated polyester shell. The big top opening gives easy access to your LiPo’s. The accessible handle ensures the pouch can be pulled out of the backpack quickly.

 



Every quad pilot is unique. A pilot with the Quad PITSTOP Backpack PRO deserves to show the name proudly and visibly. Hence you get your personalized pilot tag with the purchase of every Quad PITSTOP Backpack PRO.




 


 

 


 

 








Torvol is a ridiculously fresh drone brand. The past year, we have worked hard to develop a product line-up of drone accessories. Each and every one of our products is designed with you, the pilot, in mind.


We work together with top global FPV quad pilots, with whom we test and optimise our products. The end result? The best drone and quad accessories today. We support world-class pilots in international races, all to guarantee the best solutions for you.







EAN: 3700693500739
Color: black/green
External dimensions in cm (LxDxW): 52x27x33
Internal dimensions in cm (LxDxW): 50x22x24
Weight: 2780g
Materials: durable 840D polyester outside, soft cotton velvet lining, durable zippers and buckles.







 

We are young and close to consumer’s needs. We work hard to solve their carrying problems in a smart way. We are real people. From our vegan product designer to our online specialist with a sneaker fetish. We all have our very own oddities and preferences. And most probably, so do you.

______

PRODUCT WARRANTY
We stand for the quality of our Torvol products. We offer a 1-year warranty on all products sold. Your local consumer protection laws may provide additional rules on warranty. For detailed information please consult the general terms on torvol.com.  

SHIPPING POLICIES
This campaign is in the prototyping phase. Which means we are still making small adjustments and optimizations to the Quad PITSTOP Backpack PRO to make it even better. As we are getting close to production phase we will inform every backer on the progress regularly. We will do all we can to deliver the final product as soon as possible to you. Regarding the shipping process, we will let you know specifics based on your country.

story:
Danver is the answer to many needs in just one Bag. The Danver Bag was conceived out of necessity. We wanted to create a duffle bag design that could be used by anyone, all the time, and be an essential item to take with you to the office, gym and in all of your adventures. We want Danver Bag not to only be used for its functionality, but to match your personal style and be perfect for any occasion.

It rapresents a unique sport and travel bag with its stylish design and highly-functional features. This is the fitness and daily travel packable bag that finally meets the needs of the modern and active lifestyle. The market for highly-functional and attractive athletic/travel bags is non-existent. DANVER is a brand that aims to fill this much needed space in the fitness and travel industry.

With DANVER BAG we want to give wide importance to sports and travel bag, we do not want to consider the bag only a necessity, an accessory, but we want to make it stylish, the protagonist of your style, cared in the design and in every detail, we want you to be the first to be proud to show to all your friends this fantastic every day companion. We want you to feel just cool!

The DANVER BAG certainly stands for many details, but first we want to explain about the quality of its components because we believe it is always the key feature when we talk about a bag. We made the bag with 600D polyester or with PU because they are more durable and lighter materials at the same time. We used the most durable nylon handles and nylon padded shoulder strap, and we chose the strongest wires for the seams. In particular D-ring holders have been reinforced precisely to avoid breakage in the point where the bag undergoes more efforts. The interior of the bag is fullylined. Coming to the zippers, fundamental for the success of a good bag, we chose them carefully for their practicality but also for their consistence. Quality zippers are very expensive, consider that DANVER BAG has a total length zip up to 430 cm (169").

Now you understand why the DANVER BAG has a U-zip opening for easy access to the main compartment where you can carry your clothes, shoes and travel necessities. You also have one interior zipped net pocket and two interior velcro pockets to better organize your stuff. It offers also two outside zipped pockets and two big round side pockets to quickly access to your essentials, such as business cards, smartphone, passport, wallet and travel tickets. 

Your necessities should be separated and accessible. For the everyday traveler, organization is a must. You will never have to rummage through the bottom of a bag again.

And here is the strong point of DANVER BAG! How many times have you emptied the bag coming home from a workout session and then you got it in the way? Or how many times have you bought a bag during a trip because you had not a chance to take it with you because of luggage ever closer? Or how many times has increased considerably the volume of your luggage and you were in difficulty to carry the stuff in excess during the journey back home?

From now on, these problems no longer exist because your DANVER BAG can be reducedup to 80% with the zippered cutback system we devised (patent pending). So you can easily put it in a drawer, or you can take with you in your luggage.


  • Zippered cutback system 100% designed in Italy
  • Ultra high quality Polyester 600D or Carbon PU 
  • 10 mm U-zip main opening for easy access 
  • Metal hardware 
  • 360° swivels 
  • Dual grab handles to top 
  • Strong nylon side handle 
  • Adjustable premium quality nylon padded quick release shoulder strap 
  • Wraparound rivet reinforced carry handles with padded velcro grip 
  • 4 Inner pockets 4 outer pockets 
  • 5 Sizes: from 20 to 60 liters, choose your favorite size 
  • 5 Patterns: camouflage, metal, fantasy, basic or metal, choose your style 
  • Duffle bag redesigned for modern and active lifestyle

Be active and train hard with your DANVER BAG! It will accompany you on your workouts and you will be surprised for its efficiency. Choose the size of your bag, its pattern and you will feel definitely the coolest of the locker room!

Remember... pack it after your work session!

DANVER BAG is an adaptable bag designed around the weekend adventurer, well-seasoned traveler and never-too-organized commuter. For where ever your weekend trips, travels and adventures take you, Danver has made a organized accomplice to keep up with you every step of the way.

Whether it’s a short stroll or a long journey, Danver adapts and will be your trusty accomplice every step of the way. Two trips are never the same. With this in mind, we have created a bag for every excursion!

Supporting DANVER BAG you will not buy a simple object, but you will have in your hands hundreds of hours of experiments, failures, retries and achievements. You buy days, weeks and months of frustration and moments of pure joy, you're funding a piece of soul, moments of our life, our time taken to realize our passion, our dream.

Our team spent countless grueling hours, coming up with a duffel bag that is able to accommodate your everyday lifestyle. We had to consider a design that was not only for the gym and the trip, but also perfect for the office, city life, outdoors and anywhere. We looked into every single detail!

As already said, we want each of you can distinguish and we also want each of you can choose the DANVER BAG to suit your needs. For this reason we have created 5 sizes and 5 patterns, to guarantee the maximum choice! After assigning colors to the side pockets that identify the capacity of the bags, we chose different patterns for the central body that create original and unique bags.

Here the 5 different sizes:

  • 20 Liters - ø 25 cm x L 44 cm / ø 9,84" x L 17,32" 
  • 30 Liters - ø 28 cm x L 50 cm / ø 11,02" x L 19,68" 
  • 40 Liters - ø 30 cm x L 56 cm / ø 11,81" x L 22,04"
  • 50 Liters - ø 32 cm x L 62 cm / ø 12,60" x L 24,41" 
  • 60 Liters - ø 34 cm x L 66 cm / ø 13,39" x L 25,98"

All bags are 15 cm lengthy when they are shortened.

Once you've chosen the right size for your needs, you can choose the pattern of the central body:

  • BLACK 600D polyester

  •  CAMOUFLAGE 600D polyester

  •  FANTASY 600D polyester

  •  METAL 600D polyester

  •  CARBON PU + 600D polyester

The idea of creating Danver was born a long time ago, but only in July 2014 we had the courage to get involved. After the first prototype phase, with our economic potential we were able to finance the first trips to professional and reliable supplier, visit important exhibitions and pay countless samples. We also managed to buy 200 bags with our strength and we were able to sell them on the road with a red Ape Car in a single month.

To enable our dream realized, we need your support. We guarantee the will to fight and we assure you that we will not waste even an euro that will be given to why we are here to finance our dream!

Danver is so close to becoming a reality and we just need your help in funding the first round of main production. With the samples ready to go and a trustworthy, quality manufacturer already secured, we are just around the corner from introducing the modern world the packable DANVER BAG.

Indiegogo = crucial funds for main production run. Additional capital from crowd-funding ensures that we can continue making this a reality.

We don't want to make just one bag. We want to build a long-term business that truly cares about the sport and travel experience - and you, the committed sporting traveller. We will be more and more attentive to your needs and together with our ideas we always will try to give the best products.

Funding allows us to continue sourcing the highest-quality materials, while also giving us the opportunity to seek out innovative textiles and hardware to expand our product line.

We are Daniele and Veronica, two guys who are trying to finance their dream. Our bags don't include employees, rent and advertising expenses. And of course, the retail markup is not considered, too. Therefore we want to be honest and have the right revenue giving you the best competitive prices. Our success is not only to deliver to you one of our bags, but we are confident that we will gain a lot more when you will show your DANVER BAG to your friends with a lot of enthusiasm and they will have to pay an higher price to get it! And you will say, "We were the first to believe in DANVER BAG!"

We are working directly with our manufacturers, allowing us to eliminate unnecessary costs while maintaining an affordable price. In addition, we are allocating our funds towards the highest quality materials possible for the DANVER BAG.

We are Daniele and Veronica from Italy, we met at the high school and from that date many things happened! We got married and from 2 years we have a beautiful boy (Romeo, the boss of our team!). 

Daniele is passionate about developing ideas, business growth, and entrepreneurship. From his past work for LEONE1947 as executive sales manager he brings great experience in all aspects of business. He has developed the ability to positively impact and influence others with his positive energy. Combining his sensational positivity with dedication, will and interests in design, innovation and functionality Daniele has a keen eye on design essentials.

Veronica, after completing a degree in Business Communication at Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore of Milan worked as marketing manager. Veronica has also considerable experience in design, development, manufacturing, and public relations. She brings her ambitions, ideas and beliefs to life. 

We love to travel and in ten years we have traveled the world far and wide, from Europe to Asia, the US to the Emirates. And of course, we love to play sports, kickboxing, crossfit and football. The idea of creating the Danver Bag was actually born in one of these our travels. Why not design a bag that would meet all our needs? And here we are.

In January 2015 we decided to leave our jobs to focus on this exciting project because you know, we live once!

Backers: info@danver.it

Business Enquiries: info@danver.it

Press Enquiries: info@danver.it

Risks and challenges

We have a trusted, long-term relationship with a quality manufacturer overseas and a production schedule ready as soon as our goal has been met. The manufacturer is skilled and professional and we do not foresee any issues in the production process. 
Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. If any delays are to arise during production, we will be transparent and keep backers informed on updates. 
Indiegogo campaigns regularly fulfill orders worldwide without any 
issues, and we expect this to be the case with ours, too. However, we don't pretend to have intimate customs knowledge of the entire world. We'll work hard to avoid your rewards getting held up at customs, 
We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to have all DANVER bags to you on time so that you can go out and enjoy them as soon as possible!

story:
Know when cars are approaching, so you can make better decisions on the road.

Cameras (front & back) scan the environment. This info is interpreted by our algorithm and communicated to you, using our visor interface. A non-disruptive light under the visor blinks in your peripheral vision as cars are approaching from behind. Light intensity is adjustable.

 

Intuitive Turn Signals: Gesture sensors read your natural movements and activate the turning lights.

Indicate which way you are turning simply by using your hand signals. The sensors read your movement and activate your turning lights on the right or left side. Turn lights are located in the front and back of the helmet, ensuring that you are visible to others.

 

Brake lights turn on automatically when you reduce speed. 

Let those behind you know your intentions just by doing what you would normally do. The integrated accelerometer detects when you are braking and a red light turns on at the back of the helmet.  

 

Set your destination and the CLASSON Helmet ​will guide you there.   

Get step-by-step navigation guidance in the simplest way. ​Our proprietary interface is simple and doesn't require you to take your eyes off the road. Use the Classon App and your phone communicates with the helmet. A series of directional lights under your visor tell you whether to go left, right or straight.

 

A hole to lock your helmet with your bike.

This lock opening allows you to secure your CLASSON helmet to your bike.

 

The "Classon Club" is a subscription service that allows you to experience the CLASSON Helmet to the fullest.

The CLASSON Helmet without the subscription, comes with the following features: 

  • Blind Spot Detection
  • Gesture Turn Lights
  • Automatic Brake Lights
  • Safety Lights 
  • Classon App

When you pledge during this campaign, you automatically get a 6-month "Classon Club" subscription with your helmet. 

 
With the "Classon Club" subscription, these features/benefits are added:
  • Helmet Replacement: If your helmet gets damaged in an accident, we will send you a new one. For free!
  • Video Access: Get access to the video you record with your helmet. Edit, share with friends and it could also be useful in the event of an accident.
  • GPS Navigation: Access the guided navigation features though the App. Input your destination and your CLASSON Helmet will guide you through a series of non-disruptive lights under your visor.
  • New Features and Updates: Access to all new features that will be released with future updates.
  • Join Our Community: Connect with other riders who are using The CLASSON Helmet.
 
When in production the "Classon Club" Subscription will be $99 a year or $9.99 a month.
 
 

The Classon App is included with your pledge and will be available for download when you receive your helmet.

 

Your support enables us to reach the numbers required to place our first production order at a reduced cost per unit. 

CLASSON HELMET INDIEGOGO SPECIAL $149

This gets you the awesome CLASSON Helmet!  It comes with the five main features (see below) and 6 months of free "Classon Club" access.

With these rewards you get:

  • The awesome Classon Helmet 
  • Blind spot detection
  • Gesture signals
  • Safety lights
  • Automatic brake light
  • Video access
  • 6 months free "Classon Club" Subscription

Estimated Shipping Charges:

  • USA Single Helmet $20
  • USA Double Helmet $30
  • Canada Single Helmet $30
  • Canada Double Helmet $40
  • Europe Single Helmet $35
  • Europe Double Helmet $50
  • Rest of the World Single $45
  • Rest of the world Double $70

When in production the CLASSON Helmet will retail starting at $299

 

 

 

 

The shell of the Classon Helmet comes in 5 awesome colors so that your helmet can reflect your personality. Orange, blue and yellow also help make you more visible to those around you.  We wanted to have something for everyone, you can get your CLASSON in black or white as well.

We will contact our backers after the campaign to confirm what color you want your CLASSON Helmet to be.

 

Sizing for the CLASSON Helmet starts at Junior (about 12 years and up) and is also available in medium and large. To determine the size of your CLASSON Helmet see the chart below.  To measure your head please use one of the methods below.

  • Method 1: Wrap a flexible tape measure around your head above your eyebrows and in the middle of your forehead.
  • Method 2: Wrap a piece of string around your head in the same manner as method 1. Determine length of the string with a ruler.
We will reach out to our backers after the campaign for size information. The CLASSON Helmet will also have an adjuster to make sure your helmet fits properly.
 

 

 

We’ve come to INDIEGOGO to share our idea with you and the awesome community of bikers and bike commuters around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster.

Our design for the helmet is almost ready for tooling and mass production, and the app is in development, but only your help will get us to the finish line.

We have 15 years experience in developing and manufacturing products and have already brought to market more than 50 products.  For the helmet we have partnered with a top tier manufacturer that works with top brands like (GIRO-BELL, Melon, Specialized) and for the electronics we enlisted a long time supplier to Yamaha and Panasonic. We have a great team and together, we can make this happen.

We’re hoping to raise funds that will be spent on initial tooling for mass production and sourcing of materials.

 

 

We are designers and entrepreneurs. We wanted to create a brand that would represent all the beautiful things associated with living in the city. At the same time we wanted to solve a real issue that our cities face; Urban Mobility. That is why we created BROOKLYNESS. Our first product is the “CMYK Folding Electric Bike” designed to bridge the gap between the first and last mile <from home to the subway/train and from there to the office>

We are not new to crowd funding, actually we did two successful campaigns already. The first was the CMYK 2.0 on KICKSTARTER in 2012 where we delivered the products and had very happy costumers. This helped us to start making the bikes in larger numbers. 
 
Based on customer feedback we made improvements to the bike and in 2015 we launched the CMYK 4.0 on INDIEGOGO, where we are on schedule to deliver the first bikes in August 2016.
 
In these past years we've learned that Safety is the number one issue why people do not ride bikes in the city on a regular basis. That is why we focused our efforts on addressing safety with our newest product, The CLASSON Helmet. 
 
Here are some pictures of this awesome journey and the people that are making it possible. We thank you for being part of this.
 

 

 

 

Special Thanks to INDIEGOGO for helping us get this project to you!

If you’re ready for an urban mobility revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!

We will contact our backers after the campaign to confirm what color you want your CLASSON Helmet to be.

 

Sizing for the CLASSON Helmet starts at Junior (about 12 years and up) and is also available in medium and large. To determine the size of your CLASSON Helmet see the chart below.  To measure your head please use one of the methods below.

Method 1: Wrap a flexible tape measure around your head above your eyebrows and in the middle of your forehead.
Method 2: Wrap a piece of string around your head in the same manner as method 1. Determine length of the string with a ruler.

We will reach out to our backers after the campaign for size information. The CLASSON Helmet will also have an adjuster to make sure your helmet fits properly.
 

 


 

We’ve come to INDIEGOGO to share our idea with you and the awesome community of bikers and bike commuters around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster.
Our design for the helmet is almost ready for tooling and mass production, and the app is in development, but only your help will get us to the finish line.
We have 15 years experience in developing and manufacturing products and have already brought to market more than 50 products.  For the helmet we have partnered with a top tier manufacturer that works with top brands like (GIRO-BELL, Melon, Specialized) and for the electronics we enlisted a long time supplier to Yamaha and Panasonic. We have a great team and together, we can make this happen.
We’re hoping to raise funds that will be spent on initial tooling for mass production and sourcing of materials.

 

 

We are designers and entrepreneurs. We wanted to create a brand that would represent all the beautiful things associated with living in the city. At the same time we wanted to solve a real issue that our cities face; Urban Mobility. That is why we created BROOKLYNESS. Our first product is the “CMYK Folding Electric Bike” designed to bridge the gap between the first and last mile <from home to the subway/train and from there to the office>

We are not new to crowd funding, actually we did two successful campaigns already. The first was the CMYK 2.0 on KICKSTARTER in 2012 where we delivered the products and had very happy costumers. This helped us to start making the bikes in larger numbers. 
 
Based on customer feedback we made improvements to the bike and in 2015 we launched the CMYK 4.0 on INDIEGOGO, where we are on schedule to deliver the first bikes in August 2016.
 
In these past years we've learned that Safety is the number one issue why people do not ride bikes in the city on a regular basis. That is why we focused our efforts on addressing safety with our newest product, The CLASSON Helmet. 
 
Here are some pictures of this awesome journey and the people that are making it possible. We thank you for being part of this.
 
 

 

 
 
Special Thanks to INDIEGOGO for helping us get this project to you!
 
If you’re ready for an urban mobility revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!

story:
ORDER NOW AT WWW.ANGRYLANE.COM

 

The world's best Anti-theft riding bags. Designed by motorcycle riders to keep the gear safe when not riding, but built for everyone.
The Rider Daypack is the perfect all-weather backpack featuring the ultimate in securing your gear on the go. Using the patented anti-theft Pacsafe Technology™, the Rider's Daypack is a must have for active commuters, travelers, movers and doers.

 

WE MADE IT IN BLACK CORDURA!

LIMITED SUPPLY

GRAB ONE HERE WHILE YOU CAN

CLICK HERE BELOW

https://bit.ly/2S5G2Ew

 

 

 

 

 

Project Featured in:

 

 

The Rider Daypack is the perfect all-weather backpack featuring the ultimate in securing your gear on the go. Using the patented anti-theft Pacsafe Technology™, the Rider's Daypack is a must have for active commuters, travelers, movers and doers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Helmet Safe Bag keeps your helmet dry and the full slash proof eXomesh® 360 stainless steel cage with locking system allows you to safely attached it to your motorcycle when you stop riding, so that you can focus on what's important and stop worrying about your gear. 

  

 

The carrying pouch attached to your bike allows you to store the Helmet Safe Bag.

 

 

 

 

THE 3 DIGITS TSA APPROVED PADLOCK IS INCLUDED WITH EACH BAG

 

 

Angry Lane meets Pacsafe®

The motorcycle heritage of Angry Lane meets the patented technology of Pacsafe®.

We first met Phil Hayes, EVP of Product at Pacsafe®, a few years ago when he first moved to Hong Kong. We connected through a mutual love of bikes, surfing and art. 

We share the same values and entrepreneurial spirit and demand for high quality. 

With our insights on design from riding experience coupled with Pacsafe’s amazing technology and willingness to try new things, we created these two bags that we are really excited to bring to market. 

THE RIDER DAYPACK

 Slim and compact, the Rider Daypack is a light perfect companion for an active lifestyle.

 The MOLLE webbing system allows you to attach a wide range of accessories.

 

 

 

 

  

THE HELMET SAFE BAG AND ITS CARRYING POUCH

 

Carrying your helmet around is no fun so with Pacsafe® we have worked on a new design as well as a special waterproof carrying pouch with straps to attach to your motorcycle frame or handlebar.

The Helmet Safe Bag features a full eXomesh® 360 locking system with locking device and 3 digits TSA included approved padlock. The sheathed stainless steel cable won’t scratch your helmet, the bag lining is made of 100% Polyester 180grm fleece for full protection and the outer shell is water resistant with a reflective print to protect from outside conditions.

 

     

 

THE RIDER DAYPACK

 

 

THE HELMET SAFE BAG AND ITS CARRYING POUCH

 

 

Production has already started following our successful campaign on Kickstarter.

To pre-order the bag of your choice, click on the button below and pick a reward that contains the bag of your choice. If you want more and order another bag, or if you want more stuff that isn’t in your reward, then follow the instructions in our Add-On Menu (scroll down). 

Once you have pledged, you are in and we will take care of everything else. We’ll collect your shipping/fulfillment information when this project is complete and production well underway, in late November / early December.

SHIPPING COST IS NOT INCLUDED, we will get the best possible deal (more backers means better deal) and communicate individually with every backer.

    

 

 

 

We worked on some add-ons for the bags that could be very useful: we made some extra straps and some gear ties as you can see here below. 

Straps are 60 cm total length, and gear ties 20cm. They can be very useful to attached anything to the MOLE webbing system on the Rider Daypack.

 

ADD-ON INSTRUCTIONS AND HOW TO ORDER ANOTHER PRODUCT. 

To add an add-on or any additional product to your original perk, follow this steps:

1) Click the pink BACK IT button located at the top of the page.

2) In the text box that pops up enter the amount required for the items you are purchasing then click the pink CHECK OUT button.

3) After you finish with the checkout process, e-mail via the contact form on our website to confirm the items purchased and we will contact you at shipping time to ship everything at once.

There will be no added shipping cost for add-ons items. 

 

You can use them as shown here below on this black bag sample:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Guillaume Barras (on the left), 43, Managing Director, compiles many years of experience in the fashion industry in Asia, covering all aspects of management including brand development, manufacturing, marketing, as well as international sales and distribution.

Benoit Barras (on the right) 40, Creative Director, has always been in the design industry following a classic marketing formation. His strong visual approach led him to work with numerous major international brands as creative director. Apparel has always been his passion leading him naturally to think about developing his own brand.

 

 

All bags are manufactured by Pacsafe, in their own factory, along with their other products, managed by their Hong Kong Team of materials specialist, processes gurus and dedicated Quality Check controllers.

The manufacturing process of the bags is quite long due to the complexity of embedding the eXomesh® 360 locking system, especially for the Rider Daypack, the production process has just started on September 22nd, and the bags will be ready for shipping by the end of January 2018.

If we can ship them before of course we will.
