story:
Short Summary

The San Francisco Yellow Bike Project is a grassroots, pop-up, do-it-yourself, community-building machine that brings dead bikes back to life and puts more city dwellers on two wheels. We’ve had our lives changed by bicycles, and we want to share that passion with others. Our main objective is to get bikes into the hands of community members who need them for day-to-day life. The average cost of a new bike can often be double the list price, something many people can’t afford. Even the cost of bicycle repair can often be more than the value of the bicycle itself. We empower people through education, allowing them to get their bikes back in rideable condition at the fraction of a bike shop’s repair cost, with the knowledge of repair for the future. 

Yellow Bike offers a range of activities and services for the community, including:

  • Build a Bike workshops where we teach people how to build and repair bikes
  • Open shop hours where people can buy bikes at lower prices than retail
  • Courses in basic safety and urban cycling skills
  • Community outreach where we build bikes and deliver them to schools and parks
  • Recycling & refurbishing bike parts, making them easily accessible
  • Special projects with local organizations

What We Need 

We love what we do and we want to do even more, including:

  • Prepare the front of the shop for retail sales, fixtures, hooks & bike storage
  • Keep the shop open a wider range of days and hours for easier accessibility
  • Buy initial inventory to stabilize our finances and help to better serve our community
  • Acquire more volunteers and generate community awareness
We'd also like to aid the city of San Francisco in their goal to have 20% bicycle transportation road share by 2020. 
..... But, as we mentioned, our MOST IMPORTANT GOAL OF ALL is to get bikes to as many people as possible and help the city of San Francisco become a bigger cycling community!


    How You Can Help

    Donate!

    Donate Time:

    The San Francisco Yellow Bike Project thrives off the generosity of its volunteers. Any amount of time you can offer your help for is appreciated, and there is no donation of your time or services too little or too large!

    Donate Money:

    We need funding for shop upkeep, materials, stability... basically, what we listed above. Your generosity is greatly appreciated, which brings us to our next point.

    Share the Cause:

    Help us get the word out! Sharing our campaign with your friends, family and community to raise awareness is an invaluable contribution to our cause. You can use the indiegogo share tools listed on this page to get the word out on the world wide web.


      What You Get

      We offer a range of perks for donations, from a simple spoke card to a guided bike tour of anywhere you choose. Check 'em out here to the right and see our perk images below for reference:

      The SFYBP Spoke Card (Front & Back)


      The SFYBP "I'm a part" t-shirt choice #1

      The SFYBP t-shirt Choice #2

      The SFYBP/Speakeasy pint glass:



      The bike tire earrings and necklace:


      *these are the jewelry items pending final touches


      The Sphyke security combo: 

      http://www.sphyke.com/products/set-02/

      The SFYBP Rickshaw bag:

story:
Flashes of inspiration are always unexpected. However, normal sketching tools are large in size and not easy to be used in public occasions like café. Therefore, Yuan is inspired to craft 4 pieces of rulers in a moderate size for ideas drafting at any time anywhere.

Each Hexagonal Ruler is only 72x62mm with diverse functions like compass, protractor and template ruler... Tailor-made case carries a set of professional tool along your design journey.

Design

The deeper you look into the underpinnings of the universe, the more complex and interesting hexagons you will find, like honeycomb and bubbles. This is why Yuan creates the ruler based on the absolute symmetrical polygon - Hexagon. 

Compare to traditional rulers, hexagon allows more functions to be built on. You will find multiple functions in a particular Hexagonal ruler. Apart from that, users can easily put them in pocket and use instantly owing to the special shape of hexagon, .

By taking the advantage of size, Yuan believes Hexagon ruler can assist users and their wonderful creations.

Material

Precise etching presents on 2 different metals to form the ‘Hexagonal Ruler’

Matte black and white painted graduations marked on Electroplated Stainless Steel. The contradiction between two extreme colors makes your work sharper and more remarkable ever. 

 Wire drawn Brass gives the ruler a nice premium look, while the aging effects of this material will change the look and feel of every single piece. As time goes by, Hexagonal ruler will become your personalized stationery. 

 

Each ruler comes with different functions, you can choose your own combination based on your needs. 

There are 4 of them:

Line - Protractor, Circle 1mm-5mm in diameter, Straightedge, Line in 0.75mm-2mm 

Point - Protractor, Circle 5mm - 120mm in diameter, Spirograph pattern, Straightedge 

Curve - Protractor, Corner rounder 5mm - 50mm in diameter, 12 & 24 hours Watch Design

Polygon - Protractor, Five to sixteen-sided Polygon

 

Functions

Quick sketches only with Hexagonal ruler but no other tools.

Line Ruler-Straightedge

Curve Ruler -Corner rounder 5mm - 50mm in diameter

Point Ruler -Spirograph pattern

Point Ruler -hexagon pattern

 Polygon Ruler-Five to sixteen -sided Polygon

 

Designer 

I’m Ken, an independent designer who focuses on furniture and lighting design. In 2015, I have established Yuan Design Studio which mainly provides 3D printing and Laser cutting services for independent designers like me. 

And now, I am devoting my effort to stationery production as well. As we all know how idea comes and goes, we can hardly portrait our ideas on papers by cumbersome drafting tools.

Therefore, my ultimate goal is to create a tool that is simple, elegant, functional, and easy to use. Hexagonal Rule brings us freedom, quick edits and free flow of ideas that are hard to reach in computers.

Risks and challenges

This is the very first campaign launched by the Yuan Design Studio. So human resource is the biggest challenge in this project. I have to make sure all design, prototyping, production and marketing go smoothly before carrying out the plan.

From initial concept to the latest prototype, I went through more than 10 iterations of the rejects. Over 1-year trial period, the quality of Hexagonal ruler stands up to expectation. I am confident that the manufacturing process is under control and cause no interruption to delivery schedule. I promise to keep everyone update on the progress and any issues that may arise.

Thanks for all the support!

Apart from that, users can easily put them in pocket and use instantly owing to the special shape of hexagon, .By taking the advantage of size, Yuan believes Hexagon ruler can assist users and their wonderful creations.MaterialPrecise etching presents on 2 different metals to form the ‘Hexagonal Ruler’Matte black and white painted graduations marked on Electroplated Stainless Steel. The contradiction between two extreme colors makes your work sharper and more remarkable ever.  Wire drawn Brass gives the ruler a nice premium look, while the aging effects of this material will change the look and feel of every single piece. As time goes by, Hexagonal ruler will become your personalized stationery.  Each ruler comes with different functions, you can choose your own combination based on your needs. There are 4 of them:Line - Protractor, Circle 1mm-5mm in diameter, Straightedge, Line in 0.75mm-2mm Point - Protractor, Circle 5mm - 120mm in diameter, Spirograph pattern, Straightedge Curve - Protractor, Corner rounder 5mm - 50mm in diameter, 12 & 24 hours Watch DesignPolygon - Protractor, Five to sixteen-sided Polygon FunctionsQuick sketches only with Hexagonal ruler but no other tools.

Line Ruler-Straightedge

Curve Ruler -Corner rounder 5mm - 50mm in diameter


Point Ruler -Spirograph pattern
Point Ruler -hexagon pattern
 Polygon Ruler-Five to sixteen -sided Polygon Designer I’m Ken, an independent designer who focuses on furniture and lighting design. In 2015, I have established Yuan Design Studio which mainly provides 3D printing and Laser cutting services for independent designers like me. And now, I am devoting my effort to stationery production as well. As we all know how idea comes and goes, we can hardly portrait our ideas on papers by cumbersome drafting tools.Therefore, my ultimate goal is to create a tool that is simple, elegant, functional, and easy to use. Hexagonal Rule brings us freedom, quick edits and free flow of ideas that are hard to reach in computers.Risks and challengesThis is the very first campaign launched by the Yuan Design Studio. So human resource is the biggest challenge in this project. I have to make sure all design, prototyping, production and marketing go smoothly before carrying out the plan.From initial concept to the latest prototype, I went through more than 10 iterations of the rejects. Over 1-year trial period, the quality of Hexagonal ruler stands up to expectation. I am confident that the manufacturing process is under control and cause no interruption to delivery schedule. I promise to keep everyone update on the progress and any issues that may arise.Thanks for all the support!

story:
THE HASSLES OF A BARBECUE

Listen to Martin's "barbecue experience", and how it resulted in the invention of the FORQ. It is the worlds simplest, smallest and smartest barbecue accessory!

 

Imagine one of the following familiar situations: you and your best friend decide to indulge in a spontaneous beer-and-grill session at a nearby park. Alternately, you are taking your kids to the woods for an adventurous bonfire with many treats to barbecue. Or you are simply on a hiking trip, wanting to prepare a grilled meal over the flames of your campfire.

Up to now all of these situations were a huge drain on logistics and preparation, or ended up in poor results, right? Imagine the inconvenience of packing your bulky Weber Grill and the barbecue utensils, or a fire pit and bag of charcoal, or a stinky disposable grill pack.  Even roasting your food on a stick over the open flames is difficult! In that case, you must definitely have encountered one of these infamous three problems: you stick catches on fire, your food drops into the campfire, or splinters from the stick end up in your freshly barbequed food.

 

 

THE FORQ

SIMPLE, SMALL, SMART

FORQ is your simple, small, and smart solution to enjoying bonfire barbecues spontaneously and safely. 

Reduced to the max! With two integrated functions, it is a laser cut, stainless steel design, and with barely the size of a credit card, it fits into any wallet or pocket. 

USE IT to OPEN BOTTLES, and within 10 seconds easily fold it into a BARBECUE SKEWER! It helps prepare your food safely and hygienically, on the tip of any stick!

 

FOR ANY MEAT & VEGAN BARBECUE

The FORQ is equipped with a stainless steel barbed skewer tip that holds vegetables just as securely as sausages and steaks.

 

LIFE TIME & CARE

The ’FORQ’ is made with German High Tech engineering and manufacturing quality. It’s fabricated of stainless steel (V2A 1.4301), crafted with love and incredible detail, for a high-quality product. When treated with care, the foldable FORQ design can be reused many times. Simply clean your FORQ with pure water, or place it in the dishwasher and use it again. You can even fold the FORQ back into its original flat design, and put it back to work a dozen times before the material wears out.

 

THE FORQ ON TV

The FORQ was tested by German television station Mitteldeutscher Rundfunk (MDR) in the show "Einfach Genial" from Mai 30st 2917. Replay the episode about THE FORQ here!

 

PRODUCTION & DELIVERY

You may be surprised, but the FORQ is already a "ready to ship" product. We are capable of immediately sending out the first 1000 samples from our direct stock. For high volume orders of up to 100.000 pieces, we can ship within 4 weeks after the order has been placed.

 

WHO IS BEHIND THE FORQ

The FORQ was invented, designed and developed by Martin Finkbeiner and Wolfgang Heisel from the lovely state of Baden-Wuerttemberg in Southern Germany. Martin and Wolfgang then teamed up with serial entrepreneur Jens Thieme. Jens is the business mind behind the well-known Indiegogo and Kickstarter crowdfunding successes Scrooser and The Swiss Protection Sock.

 

WHY CROWDFUNDING ON INDIEGOGO?

We love the FORQ, and we love CROWDFUNDING on Indiegogo. The FORQ is an innovative and great quality product that is ready to ship. All we need is for you to find out and learn more about it. What better way to discover new innovative products than on Indiegogo? With your help and backing, we will introduce the FORQ to a much broader audience. With your order on Indiegogo, we will reduce production costs, produce your FORQ, and spread the word for all to see!

 

LOVE, SHARE & BACK FORQ!

The timing has never been better! Barbecue season has just started, and your high-quality FORQ is ready to ship! We offer you perks of a great value, that beat every in-store price tag. 

LOVE the FORQ, SHARE this project , and BACK your FORQ NOW!

story:
The ShockStop Seatpost is an adjustable-stiffness suspension seatpost that will dramatically improve your ride by smoothing out the road. It is equally suited for an epic gravel adventure or just dealing with potholes on your daily commute.

You can adjust the spring rate and pre-load to match your specific riding style.

And with 35 mm of suspension travel, it's perfect for all types of riding: gravel / CX, e-bike, commuter, city, road, and even mountain. 

 

Rough roads and trails are everywhere - you'll encounter them no matter where you ride. Modern bikes are designed for speed and efficiency, not comfort. Bumps and impacts are passed straight to the rider, leading to fatigue, pain, and even injury.

 

The ShockStop Seatpost suspends your body, isolating you from the imperfections of the road and trail. We optimized the travel and suspension kinematics to provide a plush, bottomless feel.

Typically, adding comfort to your bike meant sacrificing performance. The ShockStop Seatpost lets you ride faster and more efficiently by keeping you stable and allowing the bike to absorb rough terrain. This means you spend more time putting power to the pedals and less time bracing for impacts.

The ShockStop Seatpost is the rare product that increases comfort AND performance.

 

The ShockStop has an internal spring which applies force on the seatpost's four-bar linkage, which in turn suspends the saddle and rider. As you ride, the seatpost allows the bike to move under you as it encounters uneven terrain, which reduces the accumulated effects of bumps and vibrations by up to 60%. The four-bar linkage ensures that your saddle angle remains constant through the full travel of the suspension.

Using accelerometers in the lab and on the trail, we were able to accurately measure the direction and magnitude of impact forces transmitted to the rider. With that data, we optimized the travel of the ShockStop suspension mechanism to absorb as much of this impact energy as possible while minimizing the influence on the pedal stroke.

 

The suspension mechanism of the ShockStop Seatpost can be precisely tuned to match your riding style. First, a user-selectable in-line coil spring means a wide range of riders can take full advantage of the shock-absorbing benefits. 

 

Then with the right spring in place, the adjustable preload allows fine tuning of the responsiveness without sacrificing any suspension travel. 

 

The ShockStop Seatpost uses advanced manufacturing techniques, such as 3D forging, to integrate the suspension into a sleek design that fits compactly below the saddle.

Whether you're looking to just take the edge off the cracks in the road, or completely mute the gravel, the ShockStop Seatpost is the perfect solution.

What makes the ShockStop Seatpost different from other suspension seatposts? The short answer: A Lot! For the long answer, check out this blog post we put together.

Yes, you can! It takes just a couple minutes and requires only standard bike tools.

 

The ShockStop Seatpost will fit any bike that has a round seatpost 27.2mm in diameter or greater (the vast majority of bikes). If your bike has a seatpost that is larger than 27.2mm in diameter, inexpensive shims can be used to make it fit perfectly.

Bikes that have non-round seatposts (some triathlon or aero road bikes) or seatposts smaller than 27.2mm (rare) are not compatible.

At 350mm length, the ShockStop can be inserted with as little as 90mm exposed above the seat tube collar, or as much as 275mm exposed. 

We designed the ShockStop Seatpost to be the perfect complement to the ShockStop Stem. They both take what was previously a rigid connection between the rider and the frame and add just the right amount of compliance without sacrificing control or efficiency. Together, they create a suspension system that will have you cracking a smile and choosing the cobble stone route - just because you can. But as much as we love the stem, we think our backers say it best...

 

 

We're mechanical engineers with a passion for cycling and a tendency to ask "how could this be better?" Five years ago, we started Redshift Sports to create innovative products that elegantly address real problems faced by cyclists. With the incredible support of our backers through two crowdfunding campaigns, we've been able to turn our ideas into a sustainable company. Today, there are tens of thousands of riders in over 65 countries riding with Redshift components on their bikes.

 

We have extensive product development and manufacturing experience, and we've built Redshift on a foundation of delivering the highest quality products. We've spent years building strong relationships with key suppliers and manufacturers and have a proven production and fulfillment infrastructure. 

The best part about our job? We get to ride our bikes whenever we want ... all in the name of research and development.

Interested in writing about the ShockStop Seatpost? You can find Hi-Res images, press release content, and much more in our PRESS KIT. And please feel free to email us at info@redshiftsports.com if you need any assistance.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Thank you so much for backing us, sharing our project with your friends, or just rooting for us! If you have a question, check out the FAQ, and if you don't find the answer there (or if you just want to provide feedback) please post a comment or contact us. We'd love to hear from you!

The ShockStop Seatpost is an adjustable-stiffness suspension seatpost that will dramatically improve your ride by smoothing out the road. It is equally suited for an epic gravel adventure or just dealing with potholes on your daily commute.You can adjust the spring rate and pre-load to match your specific riding style.And with 35 mm of suspension travel, it's perfect for all types of riding: gravel / CX, e-bike, commuter, city, road, and even mountain.  
QUESTIONS? Keep reading below. Still can't find answers - contact us through Indiegogo or email us directly at support@redshiftsports.com.

 
 Rough roads and trails are everywhere - you'll encounter them no matter where you ride. Modern bikes are designed for speed and efficiency, not comfort. Bumps and impacts are passed straight to the rider, leading to fatigue, pain, and even injury. The ShockStop Seatpost suspends your body, isolating you from the imperfections of the road and trail. We optimized the travel and suspension kinematics to provide a plush, bottomless feel.Typically, adding comfort to your bike meant sacrificing performance. The ShockStop Seatpost lets you ride faster and more efficiently by keeping you stable and allowing the bike to absorb rough terrain. This means you spend more time putting power to the pedals and less time bracing for impacts.The ShockStop Seatpost is the rare product that increases comfort AND performance. 
 The ShockStop has an internal spring which applies force on the seatpost's four-bar linkage, which in turn suspends the saddle and rider. As you ride, the seatpost allows the bike to move under you as it encounters uneven terrain, which reduces the accumulated effects of bumps and vibrations by up to 60%. The four-bar linkage ensures that your saddle angle remains constant through the full travel of the suspension.Using accelerometers in the lab and on the trail, we were able to accurately measure the direction and magnitude of impact forces transmitted to the rider. With that data, we optimized the travel of the ShockStop suspension mechanism to absorb as much of this impact energy as possible while minimizing the influence on the pedal stroke. The suspension mechanism of the ShockStop Seatpost can be precisely tuned to match your riding style. First, a user-selectable in-line coil spring means a wide range of riders can take full advantage of the shock-absorbing benefits.  Then with the right spring in place, the adjustable preload allows fine tuning of the responsiveness without sacrificing any suspension travel.  The ShockStop Seatpost uses advanced manufacturing techniques, such as 3D forging, to integrate the suspension into a sleek design that fits compactly below the saddle. 
Whether you're looking to just take the edge off the cracks in the road, or completely mute the gravel, the ShockStop Seatpost is the perfect solution.L to R: Suntour, BodyFloat, ShockStop, Thudbuster, CG-RWhat makes the ShockStop Seatpost different from other suspension seatposts? The short answer: A Lot! For the long answer, check out this blog post we put together. 
Yes, you can! It takes just a couple minutes and requires only standard bike tools. The ShockStop Seatpost will fit any bike that has a round seatpost 27.2mm in diameter or greater (the vast majority of bikes). If your bike has a seatpost that is larger than 27.2mm in diameter, inexpensive shims can be used to make it fit perfectly.Bikes that have non-round seatposts (some triathlon or aero road bikes) or seatposts smaller than 27.2mm (rare) are not compatible.At 350mm length, the ShockStop can be inserted with as little as 90mm exposed above the seat tube collar, or as much as 275mm exposed.  

The ShockStop System: Full Suspension for Your Rigid BikeWe designed the ShockStop Seatpost to be the perfect complement to the ShockStop Stem. They both take what was previously a rigid connection between the rider and the frame and add just the right amount of compliance without sacrificing control or efficiency. Together, they create a suspension system that will have you cracking a smile and choosing the cobble stone route - just because you can. But as much as we love the stem, we think our backers say it best...
  We're mechanical engineers with a passion for cycling and a tendency to ask "how could this be better?" Five years ago, we started Redshift Sports to create innovative products that elegantly address real problems faced by cyclists. With the incredible support of our backers through two crowdfunding campaigns, we've been able to turn our ideas into a sustainable company. Today, there are tens of thousands of riders in over 65 countries riding with Redshift components on their bikes. We have extensive product development and manufacturing experience, and we've built Redshift on a foundation of delivering the highest quality products. We've spent years building strong relationships with key suppliers and manufacturers and have a proven production and fulfillment infrastructure. The best part about our job? We get to ride our bikes whenever we want ... all in the name of research and development. 

 
PRESS KITInterested in writing about the ShockStop Seatpost? You can find Hi-Res images, press release content, and much more in our PRESS KIT. And please feel free to email us at info@redshiftsports.com if you need any assistance.THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!Thank you so much for backing us, sharing our project with your friends, or just rooting for us! If you have a question, check out the FAQ, and if you don't find the answer there (or if you just want to provide feedback) please post a comment or contact us. We'd love to hear from you! 

 
Frequently Asked Questions:
Is the stiffness adjustable?
Absolutely - We designed the ShockStop Seatpost so that you can adjust it to perfectly match your weight and riding style. Before your order ships, we’ll send out a BackerKit Survey to collect information about your order. In that survey, you’ll select a specific spring installation based on your body weight (don’t worry, we’ll provide plenty of guidance). The selected spring will be come pre-installed in the seatpost. Next, you’ll use the preload adjustment knob at the bottom of the seatpost to adjust the spring preload - the amount of force required to cause the saddle to start moving. Together, the stiffness and preload allow you to dial in the feel to your exact preference.
Will the spring need to be replaced?
No, the spring is designed to last the lifetime of the seatpost. We’ve tested the performance of the springs extensively and selected the geometry and material of the spring specifically to withstand the rigors of daily riding without degradation.
How many springs do I get?
The seatpost ships with one spring of your choice. Before your order ships, we’ll send out a survey to collect information about your order. In that survey, you’ll select a specific spring installation based on your body weight (don’t worry, we’ll provide plenty of guidance). The selected spring will be come pre-installed in the seatpost. If, in the future, you decide that you want to try a different stiffness spring, we will have other spring stiffnesses available for purchase at a substantial discount for backers.
What is the minimum installation height?
The ShockStop Seatpost requires at least 90mm from the top of the seat tube collar (the part on your bike that holds the seatpost in place) to the center of the saddle rail in the saddle clamp.
What is the warranty?
We stand behind every product that we sell, and we pride ourselves on the quality of our products, as well as the support that we provide to our customers. Redshift Sports warrants that all of our products are free from defects in material and workmanship for two years from the date of original retail purchase.
How is the product tested?
The seatpost is tested to the latest ISO 4210 standard for Racing & Mountain Bicycles. These standards typically specify "Static Strength" tests (i.e. one-time application of force) as well as "Fatigue" tests (i.e. repeated application of force) for different bicycle components. We also run our own independent tests to better understand lifespan which typically involve cycling well beyond the specifications in the ISO 4210 standard.
How does it hold up to mud and sand? Will you offer a rain/dirt cover?
The internal mechanism uses custom SKF seals to provide a robust barrier to mud, grit and water. They come from the same family of seals that you see on mountain bike front fork suspensions. While we expect these to hold up to heavy off-road usage, this will be a user-serviceable part if the need should arise.
We are confident in the seal design, but we have receive enough questions about a cover that we will consider offering this an add-on option.

Will my saddle bag fit with the ShockStop Seatpost?
Most standard strap-based saddle bags will fit the ShockStop Seatpost without issue. If your saddle bag uses rigid clips, clamps, or some other inflexible attachment method, it's possible that your bag may not be compatible.
Do you plan to offer a carbon fiber version?
Currently we do not have plans to release a carbon version. We’re keeping our efforts focused on delivering a fantastic product as soon as possible. If we get enough interest in a carbon version, we will consider adding it to our development roadmap once we’ve fulfilled all orders.
Will this work for bikes with 25.4mm seat tubes like the Cannondale Synapse?
Unfortunately, no, the ShockStop Seatpost will only fit bikes that have seatpost diameters of 27.2mm or larger.
Will this work for aero seatposts/Trek seat mast?
Unfortunately, no, the ShockStop Seatpost only fits standard round seatposts that are 27.2mm or larger in diameter.
Will the seatpost work with 7mm x 9mm carbon saddle rails?
Yes, we will offer a 7mm x 9mm compatible saddle clamp as an add-on option that will be available in BackerKit after the campaign completes.
Is the ShockStop compatible with a Di2 battery BT-DN110?
Yes, the seatpost is compatible with mounting a Di2 battery - we're developing a ShockStop-specific mounting option and that will be offered as an add-on option in BackerKit after the campaign is complete.
Will the ShockStop fit in bikes with seatpost diameters larger than 27.2mm?
Yes! The ShockStop will fit any bike with a seatpost diameter of 27.2mm or larger. We will be offering inexpensive shims as an add-on option in BackerKit after the campaign is complete. Shim sizes include 28.6, 29.8, 30.9, 30.9, 31.6, and 31.8 mm.
Is the ShockStop Seatpost compatible with my folding bike?
The ShockStop Seatpost is 27.2mm in diameter and 350mm long. Typically, folding bikes use very long seatposts in larger diameters. But, many folding bikes come with and can work with telescopic seatposts. These allow you to use a standard seatpost like the ShockStop by adding an extension that fits into the bike and accepts the standard seatpost. Check with you local bike shop or bike manufacturer to see if one of these is available and if it accepts 27.2mm seatposts. An example of one that accepts 27.2mm seatposts is the Tern telescopic seatpost: https://www.ternbicycles.com/us/gear/471/telesc...
If I order the ShockStop System, when will I get the Stem?
Your ShockStop Stem will ship with the Seatpost. If you’d like to get the ShockStop Stem earlier, we will offer an add-on shipping fee option through BackerKit.
Is there any damping in the System?
Damping is important for MTB because you're trying to absorb larger amplitude impacts. For high-frequency, small amplitude perturbations, it's better to have a very lightly damped system to maximize responsiveness. The plunger seals provide enough damping to prevent unwanted movement of the post, but otherwise, the system is free to respond quickly.
How does international shipping work? Will I be responsible for VAT?
All international rewards will be shipped from the US and will have a declared value of the amount that you pledged, including shipping costs.
We will offer a prepaid option for those who would prefer to pay the taxes & duties up front. The shipping provider charges a fee of €10 for the prepaid VAT service (in addition to the tax and duty amount). We will continue to look for even easier and cheaper options to prepay VAT after the campaign ends. If you don't choose the prepaid service you will be responsible for any taxes, duties, and fees that are due on import.

story:
Last summer, the Spearhead Huts Society broke ground on the first of 3 modern alpine huts linking the Spearhead Traverse and creating a year round adventure that will rival the classic hut-to-hut experiences offered in the Alps. The Kees and Claire memorial hut is located at Russet Lake near the foot of the iconic Fissile Peak and is set to open in 2019. Each hut location will offer dramatic views and excellent recreation opportunities in both winter and summer. 

The second hut will be located at Mt Macbeth and plans are progressing all thanks to the generous donation and commitment from Vancouver philanthropists Brian Hill and Andrea Thomas Hill. As founder and CEO of Aritzia, Brian brings a wealth of knowledge to this project and has brought on designer Vincent Chan to collaborate on this special edition merchandise funding initiative. These pieces are a limited run and will be sure to become a collectors item in the years to come. 

We've posted images of the designs to ensure we print just the right amount of clothing so that every dollar is used to support the Spearhead Huts Society. We'll print the designs on high quality cotton garments and we are working with local print shops. With Vincent's talent and eye for style, you can be sure these pieces will make you look good while doing good! 

On behalf of the Spearhead Huts Society, thank you for your support. Please share this video and a link to the campaign so that we can achieve the funding goal and continue building a world class hut to hut experience in the Whistler Backcountry.

story:
CMAA University of Akron Student Chapter

We are the Construction Management Association of America (CMAA) Student Chapter at the University of Akron, in Ohio.  We are comprised of many well rounded traditional, non-traditional and veteran students in the Construction Engineering Technology program.  This fundraiser is to help fund our trip to Rockaway, NY to rebuild homes that were affected by hurricane Sandy.  We will be spending our spring break there to help the community recover.

2014 Recap

Last year with your help we raised $2590 for our trip to Joplin, MO to rebuild after the devastating tornadoes. This year we're going to try for a bit more. The added amount is needed due to the higher costs in New York.  Last year we accomplished over $20,000 worth of work in 5 days. This year we'd like to do the same but we need help with travel and lodging funds. In the gallery is a recap of last years work and the work donated. Check out the website below for a link to pictures from last years trip.

Thanks from all of us at the University of Akron CMAA Student Chapter. 


What We Need & What You Get

We have already raised a sound portion of the required expenses to complete this mission.  What we still need is $3250 for travel & housing expenses for our 20+ volunteers.  This will be the next in a long line of disaster relief programs where the University of Akron Construction Engineering Technology program mobilizes an army of students that will use their construction skills, during their spring breaks, to help folks get back into their homes.

All donations will be deposited into the CMAA Ohio regional chapter account and transferred to the University of Akron CMAA student chapter for travel, food, materials, tools, and lodging expenses incurred during the New York rebuilding trip.  If surplus funds are received that exceed our expenses, they will be deposited into the CMAA student chapter account and earmarked for future service projects.

**All Donations are Tax Deductible**

rounded traditional, non-traditional and veteran students in the 
Construction Engineering Technology program.  This fundraiser is to help
 fund our trip to Rockaway, NY to rebuild homes that were affected by hurricane Sandy.  We
 will be spending our spring break there to help the 
community recover.2014 RecapLast year with your help we raised $2590 for our trip to Joplin, MO to rebuild after the devastating tornadoes. This year we're going to try for a bit more. The added amount is needed due to the higher costs in New York.  Last year we accomplished over $20,000 worth of work in 5 days. This year we'd like to do the same but we need help with travel and lodging funds. In the gallery is a recap of last years work and the work donated. Check out the website below for a link to pictures from last years trip.Thanks from all of us at the University of Akron CMAA Student Chapter. What We Need & What You GetWe have already raised a sound portion of the required expenses to complete this mission.  What we still need is $3250 for travel & housing expenses for our 20+ volunteers.  This will be the next in a long line of disaster relief programs where the University of Akron Construction Engineering Technology program mobilizes an army of students that will use their construction skills, during their spring breaks, to help folks get back into their homes.All donations will be deposited into the CMAA Ohio regional chapter account and transferred to the University of Akron CMAA student chapter for travel, food, materials, tools, and lodging expenses incurred during the New York rebuilding trip.  If surplus funds are received that exceed our expenses, they will be deposited into the CMAA student chapter account and earmarked for future service projects.**All Donations are Tax Deductible**

story:
Barracuda Carry-on Features:

    1. A uniquely distinctive design.
    2. Ability to be collapsed into fraction of the size for easy storage when not in use.
    3. Built-in Tray big enough to fit a full sized laptop.
    4. A removable* 10,000 mAh battery pack sufficient to charge your iPhone five times over.
    5. A storage bag to keep your Barracuda dust free and allowing you to hang it in any closet.
    6. Ergonomic pivot handle.
    7. Portable Stainless Steel Digital Scale
    8. Proximity sensor and location tracking module (optional add-on for only $50)
    9. Manufactured using highest quality materials like Cordura fabric.
    *Many airlines do not allow anything with li-ion batteries to be checked-in, this removable design allows you to remove the battery pack if you need to check-in your Barracuda. Also allows you to use the battery pack while the bag is stowed away. The location tracking module has a different smaller battery that can be checked-in.

    **Multiple Patents Pending

    NOTE: We will send out an email survey where you will have the opportunity to pick the color of your Barracuda. We will also make product pictures with the color options available to you before shipment so to help you finalize your color preference.

    It’s important to stand out in today’s increasingly competitive marketplace. That’s why we set out to design a one-of-a-kind suitcase to reflect the needs and desires of the individual modern go-getter. Barracuda’s distinctive design comes complete with exclusive benefits included to enhance all your trips to the airport.

    We will send out an email survey where you will have the opportunity to pick the color of your Barracuda. We will also include product pictures with the color options so it is easier for you to make your selection.

    The Barracuda’s bonus features weren’t included simply to make your luggage stand out amongst the crowd; we’ve added these features to make your travel time easier, smoother, and altogether more convenient.

    Storing your luggage away when you aren’t using it can be an uphill battle—especially if you don’t have a lot of space where you’re staying or where you’re living. That is why we’ve designed Barracuda with a collapsible function. The Barracuda will easily transform from its rugged, hard-side state to a collapsed and folded state. Within 10 seconds, you can collapse the Barracuda and slip it under the bed or behind a couch. It’s as quick and easy as folding up and putting away a beach towel.

    Life doesn’t stop and start at the convenience of the hustle-and-bustle of airports. When you find yourself with several hours to spare between flights, you may still need to send out that important work e-mail or find a way to keep the kids entertained. All you have to do is pull out the Barracuda’s built-in, height-adjustable tray so you can pop your laptop down in a safe place. Whether you’re still working or you’re kicking back to watch a movie, use the tray to keep your laptop safe and sturdy—and simply fold up the tray into the handle when you no longer need it.

    When you find yourself in a hurry to arrive at the gate before takeoff, dragging your luggage along isn’t always easy. We envisioned a brand-new, revolutionary, ergonomic handle, giving the Barracuda added accessibility and convenience. Now, your carry-on will move wherever you move without a stiff handle cramping your movement or risking an injury when you’re pulling your bags in a hurry. Our ergonomic handle provides elegance and ease to all your airport trips.

    If your phone is low on battery in the middle of a lengthy layover, you may need to charge it ASAP—especially if you need to stay in touch with friends, family, or work colleagues. With our built-in USB charger, you can refill the battery in no time, keeping you connected and providing you on-the-go access to your e-mails, apps, music, and games.

    Barracuda uses advanced GSM-GPRS technology for location tracking. Any connected device can then be used to track the location of your Barracuda.

    Along with location tracking this feature comes with Bluetooth Smart/Bluetooth Low Energy technology allowing you to track the location of your Barracuda when in range so you don't have to crowd around the baggage carousel. Our app is compatible with iOS and Android smart phones that support BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy).

    This feature is available as an upgrade which is sold separately for USD $50. Add an additional USD $50 while making your pledge.

    It shouldn’t be a struggle to grab your laptop from your carry-on. The Barracuda comes with an easy-open flap, making it simpler than ever to slip open your luggage and grab the items most important to you when you’re killing time on a long flight.

    The Barracuda is not only simple, elegant, and unique—it’s also strong. A good suitcase should last you a lifetime, especially if you’re a regular traveler. That is why we spared no expense in constructing the Barracuda out of materials like ballistic nylon and aircraft grade aluminum. The Barracuda has been built to withstand the harsh weathers of any traveling experience, keeping you sane and serene during the most stressful times of any journey.

    Do you want to guarantee the smoothest and simplest traveling experiences of your life? Wouldn’t you like your luggage to come with a lexicon of convenient, helpful features such as collapsibility and an ergonomic handle? Can you see yourself with a suitcase powered to provide you with on-the-go USB charging capabilities and the convenience of a built-in adjustable tray?

    Then help us bring the Barracuda to you today. Every little pledge helps. Share the Barracuda with your friends and watch the revolution happen.

    * Shipments may be subject to import duties and other local taxes.

    For more information, go to http://barracuda.co. If you have a question or want to give us feedback, please email us at support@barracuda.co

    For business inquiries, email us at partners@barracuda.co

    Risks and challenges

    The challenges and risks that are ahead of us as we finalize the development and delivery of Barracuda are related to manufacturing and logistics.

    • There may be slight variations in the colors based on our transition from the prototypes used in the photos and video to the final manufactured product. Some color options might not be available if demand for the color is below factory minimum quantities or due to unavailability of material in that color. 
    • There may be changes to the final dimensions or specifications of some of the parts as we optimize the design for mass production and or adhere to airline carry-on luggage standards. 
    • There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen product changes that require additional development or addition to the scope of our manufacturing time line. 
    • There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances in international shipping and logistics. 
    • Shipments may be subject to import duties and other local taxes. 
    • Final product specifications might change based on optimization for mass production and partner constraints.

    If there are any changes to Barracuda, we will communicate these changes to our contributors in a timely manner.

    Thank you for your interest in Barracuda!

The color is picked later on via a separate survey email we will send out within a few days of placing the pre-order.We are now shipping. Here's an up-boxing video of the final product.

story:
PERKS

 

The Modern Drawstring Backpack

Daniel is 6 ft.(183 cm) tall and is wearing the Mid-size.

 

Introducing the Action Series

Waist straps when not in use.

Black Camo Front Panel Option

 

 

 

 

 

THE FRONT PANEL THAT PACKS AND PROTECTS

 

 

TWO SIZE AND THREE ROPE COLOR OPTIONS

 

 

SIZING GUIDE

 

 

DESIGNED TO ORGANIZE LIKE NEVER BEFORE

Side zip-pockets are on both sides, tucked away slightly on the back panel with all-weather zips. A jersey style zip-pocket sits against the lower back and is also weather-proof, and the waist straps that double as accessory straps can be used to carry stuff externally.

 

The Front Panel is designed to provide top protection and is a large carry-all compartment. It is also a compression lid for your stuff, if needed.

 

DESIGNED TO PERFORM

The Action Cam Strap as well as the Sternum Strap will keep your shoulder loops from sliding, and the Built-In waist straps will keep your Action DB Pro stable even during your hardest sprints.
 

DESIGNED TO FUNCTION

 

Channel-Anchored Drawstrings™

 
Our patented Channel-Anchored Drawstrings™ will keep the lengths of the cords that form the shoulder loops to stay even and balanced 100% of the time, even after repeated opening and closing. Learn More.
 

 

Easy Pull-Open Handles™

The top carrying handle unbuckles as Easy Pull-Open Handles™ for pulling apart a closed bag. It's effortless opening. Learn More.

 

ACTION CAMERA READY

Free your hands when skateboarding, snowboarding, skiing, biking, running, or strolling.  It's perfect for any activity where you want, more immersive, more engaging, lower-than-helmet view of the action.

 

 

FEATURES

Securely mounts action cameras to any drawstring backpacks.

 

 

HYDRATION READY

We searched far and wide for the perfect snap-hook. Its wide mouth and gentle round edges will work with any gym sack, and the centering drinking tube holder will keep the water flowing freely.

Strong magnet on the Drinking Tube Clip snaps back into place for easy access to your water. Pair them with the Sternum Strap for a complete hydration system.

 

UPGRADE YOUR SACK

 

THE ULTIMATE SUMMER FESTIVAL GEAR

Get the gear you need to survive to tell the stories of your epic summer. #musicfestivals

 

 

DESIGNED TO GO EVERYWHERE

Based on Mid size. Full size packs down slightly bigger.

 

 

 

 

 

 

DESIGNED WITH THE BEST MATERIALS

 

EXCLUSIVE FEATURES

 

MORE FEATURES

 

MORE ORGANIZATION

 

TAKE IT EVERYWHERE

 

SUMMARY

Key Features:

  • CHANNEL-ANCHORED DRAWSTRINGS™  
  • EASY PULL-OPEN HANDLES™ 
  • LOAD BEARING CENTER O-RING™ 
  • ALL-WEATHER SIDE ZIP-POCKETS 
  • JERSEY STYLE LOWER BACK ZIP-POCKET
  • NON-SLIP LOCK SIDE RELEASE BUCKLE 
  • BUILT-IN ACCESSORY STRAPS AND WAIST STRAPS
  • FRONT PANEL COMPARTMENT AND COVER

Key Material:

  • WATER REPELLENT DWR FABRIC
  • TREATED LINING SHEET
  • CUSTOM TENSION KERNMANTLE ROPES
  • YKK WEATHER-PROOF ZIPPERS
  • HYPALON®

 

PRODUCTION AND FULFILLMENT

If funded, this would be our third successful project to be fulfilled. With our previous experience, we are confident in our abilities to coordinate mass production with quality. We will be laser focused on executing our plans for manufacturing and delivery, and communicating transparent and timely project updates that you would expect from the pros.

 

TIMELINE

04 / 2017 – Trigger Sourcing

05 / 2017 – Manufacturing

06 / 2017 – Ocean Freight

07 / 2017 – Customs / Staging Delivery

08 / 2017 – Shipping Starts

 

We have been featured in

 

About

Mochibrand® makes the best line of drawstring backpacks. Our exclusive features and innovative designs in the category is second to none, and our latest work pushes the possibilities of the drawstring backpacks even further.  

Keeping the cords balanced and giving your fingers a break since 2011.

© 2017 Chila LLC. All rights reserved. Chila, Mochi brand, the Mochi brand logos, Channel-Anchored Drawstrings™, Easy Pull-Open Handles™, and Load Bearing Center O-Ring™ are trademarks or registered trademarks of Chila LLC.

PATENTED AND PATENTS PENDING.

 

Disclaimer

Mochibrand® is not affiliated with GoPro Inc. GoPro® is a trademark or registered trademark of GoPro, Inc. Mochibrand® is not affiliated with Apple Inc. iPhone® is a trademark or registered trademark of Apple, Inc.

 

Risks and challenges

Transitioning from prototyping and testing to manufacturing phase can be challenging. Coordinating with overseas suppliers and maintaining product quality with remote manufacturing partners is not easily achieved overnight.

We have been coordinating production to delivery, end-to-end, for over three years. With our streamlined process, supply chain relationships and expertise, we expect to sail smoothly through the delivery of the pledge rewards, and we are confident in our abilities to deliver the best rewards possible.

You can expect the actual product to be amazing. Our company was founded here by exceeding expectations and delivering great crowdfunding experience, and because we want to blow our backers away with great products, we may occasionally ask for forgiveness for taking extra steps, and extra measures, in order to ensure great quality.

We are grateful and proud to be part of this community, and we uphold the highest standard in every step of the process, to create the highest value to the backers and the best possible rewards, because without the backers, none of this would be possible.

story:
Weather@Point  is a small portable personal weather station you can carry around throughout your day and get accurate real-time measurements for temperature, atmospheric pressure, UV, ambient light and humidity right to your mobile device .

 

 

 

Simply plug it in, open the Weather@Point  App and real-time measurements will appear on your device at the blink of an eye. Weather@Point  doesn't use a battery or internet connection. It is powered by your device's battery and is extremely energy efficient so you don't have to worry about recharging. Works with light port adapter for iPhone users.

Weather@Point has four sensors that measure temperature, humidity, UV radiation and atmospheric pressure built into a standard four pole audio jack.

These four sensors calculate the data and display that information on the screen of your device.

The entire device is encased in durable housing made from  aluminum and titanium. It is built to last!

 

With Weather@Point  you'll have  your own personal weather station that can fit in the palm of your hand! That’s great news if you enjoy outdoor activities like hiking, cycling, hunting or fishing - because you don't need an internet connection to get an accurate weather report.

 

No need to rely on weather forecasts and apps anymore. The fact is that weather stations can be dozens of miles away so their measurements are not always accurate. Weather@Point gives you real time on spot weather measurements . You can read them in your app and easily share on cloud platform.

Weather@Point  lets you know the maximum amount of time you should be exposed to the UV rays in the specific weather conditions in your area, helping you avoid sun damage and other serious long term consequences of excessive UV exposure. Enjoy the outdoors with the confidence... It is strongly recommended that you re-measure the UV Index at least every 60 minutes when necessary. Just like in Sci-Fi movies!

 

Light meter

Weather@Point  now has a built-in light measuring sensor with added meter options in to our application. Gather information about natural as well as artificial light anytime. Use it to measure and set lights at your home, office, store, lab, factory, greenhouse, etc. This information is also invaluable for photographers and videographers and helps them make perfect images or videos anytime and anywhere.

 

Key-Ring

Weather@Point  comes with an opening for a key-ring so you'll always have it close by.

 

Waterproof

Did you drop Weather@Point  in water? No worries, Weather@Point is built to last.

 

 

We are making a free Weather@Point  App that is compatible with iOS and Android. But that's not all! This would work on iOS and Android as an API, providing the information from Weather@Point. Collected data can be stored in your App or shared on Cloud platform.

At this moment we have completed our 4th version of the Weather@Point prototype and entered manufacturing stage for the first series of units that are estimated to begin shipping to backers by May 2017.

We are already producing the first series of Weather@Point devices for our first backers. Below are some photos and videos from our manufacturing process.

 
 

 

We invested a lot of resources into making the prototype and manufacturing our first iteration to deliver to our original Kickstarter backers.  Now our goal is to set up a second production series while improving the product, app and cloud storage for taking and sharing measurements. In order to  accomplish this we’ll need materials for housing, components and factory time.

This is where you come in. Your contributions  will be used for sensors, resistors, materials for housing, tooling and manufacturing .

We have already sourced all the components and have found reputable manufacturers with proven successful track records and are already in the process of manufacturing the first hundred units that will be available as the early bird perks.

 

 

 

 

Weather@Point  is designed to measure temperature, humidity, UV radiation, ambient light and atmospheric pressure of your environment with your mobile device.

Tech specs - keeping it simple

  • Dimensions: 54.9mm x 11mm

  • Weight:17 grams

  • 4 passive sensors

  • Power: No battery needed

Temperature and humidity sensor (low power consumption):

  • Temperature Accuracy: @25°C ±0.3 °C
  • Temperature Operating Range (Ta): -40 to +125°C (-40ºF to 257ºF)
  • Humidity Operating Range (RH): 0 to 100%
  • Input current on any pin: -10 to +10mA
  • Storage Temperature (Tstg): -40 to 125 (-40ºF to 257ºF)
  • Relative Humidity Accuracy: @25°C (20%RH to 80%RH) ±2%
  • Measuring Time: (from 33 to 75%RH) 5ms
  • Communication: I²C protocol

Barometric pressure sensor (low power consumption):

  • Absolute accuracy: (p=950 - 1100hPa) ± 1 hPa
  • Relative accuracy pressure: (950 - 1050 hP) ± 0.12 hPa (equivalent to ± 1m)
  • Operation range: 300 - 1100 hPa
  • Interface: I²C and SPI
  • Measuring Time: 5.5msec
  • Resolution of data Pressure: 0.18Pa Temperature 0.01K

Ultraviolet (UV) index, and ambient light sensor (low power consumption):

  • Integrated UV index sensor
  • I²C interface
  • Integrated ambient light sensor
  • Accurate lux measurements with IR correction algorithm
  • Operating temperature –40 to +85 °C

We care about the quality of our products, first and foremost. To make sure all Weather@Point work as they are supposed to, we are going to test each unit individually. We will test the devices personally in our HQ before shipping them to customers.

Press:

  

   

 

Background 

 Project Creator 

Staying in New York City or anywhere else on the Globe, climate affects your daily routine. Whether its avoiding rain on your way to the subway, dodging blizzards, or hiding from the sun when you’re in the park. Weather reports are often inaccurate and leave you guessing. This lead us to come up with the idea for Weather@Point. We wanted a way to make our everyday activities easier to plan and achieve.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We carefully selected our manufacturer and component suppliers. They all have proven track records working with trusted colleagues. Despite this confidence there is always a risk that we are not satisfied with the end result as we are dedicated to delivering the highest quality product possible. In such a case an additional iteration and improvement of the manufacturing process might be necessary. This rather unlikely scenario would cause a slight delay in the delivery time.

 

FAQ:

Q:  Will Weather@Point waste a lot of my phone battery

A: The short answer is no.Energy consumption is an important topic for us. Not only due to environmental concerns but also regarding the convenience of long battery life. 
Weather Point uses the headphone interface on your mobile device, however the power drawn by Weather Point is only a fraction of the power used to drive your regular headphones. 
The impedance of Weather Point at 25º C is around 400 000 Ohm. That leads to a power consumption of about 40 µW. To put that in perspective: The iPhone 6's battery has a capacity of 6.9Wh. If that battery would only drive this 40µW load, that battery would last 136250 hours. 
That’s around 15.5 years of nonstop weather measurement. Of course the power consumption of the iPhone itself is much higher than that. 
However this example should show that the power drawn by Weather Point has almost no impact on your battery life.


Q:  How long does it take for accurate reading.

A:   The data from the Weather@Point reads instantly.  The device is using sensors to measure weather components, so it is necessary to keep it out of cases, handsets or any other source of different temperatures and environmental conditions  to get accurate measurements,

Q: Why our Kickstarter campaign was delayed.

A: Developing innovative and disruptive products is challenging. Some of our original team had a difficult time dealing with these challenges and had some personal and professional issues that prevented them from seeing this through.  We've made personnel changes and persisted with the development of the product. We didn't want to rush a product to market that wasn't ready. We've made several iterations, tested them and now were ready to rock!


Q:  Why do we have different delivery times for different perks.

A:   Will have a small stock after delivery of Kickstarter rewards


Q:  Why there are different looks of device on different photos…

A:  We had 3rd series developed and run on our 3rd as of now, so updates and changes were implemented


Q:  How waterproof is it?

A:  It is waterproof when in its housing, it's fine if it gets rained, splashed or dropped in a puddle but it is not designed for diving.
story_txt:
Weather@Point  is a small portable personal weather station you can carry around throughout your day and get accurate real-time measurements for temperature, atmospheric pressure, UV, ambient light and humidity right to your mobile device .   Simply plug it in, open the Weather@Point  App and real-time measurements will appear on your device at the blink of an eye. Weather@Point  doesn't use a battery or internet connection. It is powered by your device's battery and is extremely energy efficient so you don't have to worry about recharging. Works with light port adapter for iPhone users.Weather@Point has four sensors that measure temperature, humidity, UV radiation and atmospheric pressure built into a standard four pole audio jack.These four sensors calculate the data and display that information on the screen of your device.The entire device is encased in durable housing made from  aluminum and titanium. It is built to last! With Weather@Point  you'll have  your own personal weather station that can fit in the palm of your hand! That’s great news if you enjoy outdoor activities like hiking, cycling, hunting or fishing - because you don't need an internet connection to get an accurate weather report. No need to rely on weather forecasts and apps anymore. The fact is that weather stations can be dozens of miles away so their measurements are not always accurate. Weather@Point gives you real time on spot weather measurements . You can read them in your app and easily share on cloud platform.Weather@Point  lets you know the maximum amount of time you should be exposed to the UV rays in the specific weather conditions in your area, helping you avoid sun damage and other serious long term consequences of excessive UV exposure. Enjoy the outdoors with the confidence... It is strongly recommended that you re-measure the UV Index at least every 60 minutes when necessary. Just like in Sci-Fi movies! Light meterWeather@Point  now has a built-in light measuring sensor with added meter options in to our application. Gather information about natural as well as artificial light anytime. Use it to measure and set lights at your home, office, store, lab, factory, greenhouse, etc. This information is also invaluable for photographers and videographers and helps them make perfect images or videos anytime and anywhere. Key-Ring Weather@Point  comes with an opening for a key-ring so you'll always have it close by. WaterproofDid you drop Weather@Point  in water? No worries, Weather@Point is built to last.  We are making a free Weather@Point  App that is compatible with iOS and Android. But that's not all! This would work on iOS and Android as an API, providing the information from Weather@Point. Collected data can be stored in your App or shared on Cloud platform.At this moment we have completed our 4th version of the Weather@Point prototype and entered manufacturing stage for the first series of units that are estimated to begin shipping to backers by May 2017.We are already producing the first series of Weather@Point devices for our first backers. Below are some photos and videos from our manufacturing process. 
 
 
We invested a lot of resources into making the prototype and manufacturing our first iteration to deliver to our original Kickstarter backers.  Now our goal is to set up a second production series while improving the product, app and cloud storage for taking and sharing measurements. In order to  accomplish this we’ll need materials for housing, components and factory time.This is where you come in. Your contributions  will be used for sensors, resistors, materials for housing, tooling and manufacturing .We have already sourced all the components and have found reputable manufacturers with proven successful track records and are already in the process of manufacturing the first hundred units that will be available as the early bird perks.    Weather@Point  is designed to measure temperature, humidity, UV radiation, ambient light and atmospheric pressure of your environment with your mobile device.Tech specs - keeping it simple
Dimensions: 54.9mm x 11mm
Weight:17 grams
4 passive sensors
Power: No battery needed
Temperature and humidity sensor (low power consumption):
Temperature Accuracy: @25°C ±0.3 °C
Temperature Operating Range (Ta): -40 to +125°C (-40ºF to 257ºF)
Humidity Operating Range (RH): 0 to 100%
Input current on any pin: -10 to +10mA
Storage Temperature (Tstg): -40 to 125 (-40ºF to 257ºF)
Relative Humidity Accuracy: @25°C (20%RH to 80%RH) ±2%
Measuring Time: (from 33 to 75%RH) 5ms
Communication: I²C protocol
Barometric pressure sensor (low power consumption):
Absolute accuracy: (p=950 - 1100hPa) ± 1 hPa
Relative accuracy pressure: (950 - 1050 hP) ± 0.12 hPa (equivalent to ± 1m)
Operation range: 300 - 1100 hPa
Interface: I²C and SPI
Measuring Time: 5.5msec
Resolution of data Pressure: 0.18Pa Temperature 0.01K
Ultraviolet (UV) index, and ambient light sensor (low power consumption):
Integrated UV index sensor
I²C interface
Integrated ambient light sensor
Accurate lux measurements with IR correction algorithm
Operating temperature –40 to +85 °C

story:
Mission

Many people have a passion for firearms as pastime, profession, and simple appreciation to collect. Some of the areas we are striving to make better in our communities are:

  • Safer hunters
  • Bringing a more profound understanding and appreciation for firearms and firearm safety.
  • Giving our law enforcement a close, convenient, clean facility to train in.
  • Give non-PAL/RPAL holders a window into a hobby they didn't even know they loved yet

 

What We Have

Progress:

  • We have sourced the suppliers for building the range lanes themselves
  • Awaiting response on business loans for lease of structure
  • Firearms for use in basic training
  • Construction of boardrooms and Pro shop is awaiting financing

 

    What You Can Do

    Anything helps! We understand that not everybody can get involved financially. If this is the case, please share this on social media accounts to help us reach our goal!

story:
Keep warm. Stay dry. Breathe easy.

Patented Skrēn Facemasks revolutionize how you enjoy the outdoors, even during frigid winter temps.   

Aren't you tired of uncomfortable facemasks that get wet and don't allow you to breathe easily? 

Whether you're a pro skier or just enjoy jogging outdoors, you know how hard it is to focus on your performance when you have to fiddle with your facemask every two minutes. 

Skrēn Facemasks help you have more fun with an innovative 3-band design and breathable, moisture wicking material.  

 

 

 

 

Versatile, Flexible, Comfortable.

Skrēn moves with you.

 

You deserve a facemask that perfectly fits your unique features. With Skrēn's  patented 3-band design, you have the power to CHOOSE whether you want your entire face or just one area protected.  

FINALLY, no more wet masks! The breathing hole for your mouth means your mask never gets wet. 

 

 

More than just a winter facemask! 

Skrēn is also designed for year round wear.  

  • MULTI-SEASON WEAR: Designed in 3 fabric weights, so you can stay calm and cool when things heat up
  • SUPERIOR PROTECTION: Skrēn Facemasks have a UPF50 protection rating
  • HEALTHIER LUNGS: Limits your exposure to dust in the air when you're ATVing
  • VENTILATE: Low profile head bands keep you cool 

 

What We're Made Of:

All Season, Innovative & Eco-Friendly Materials

 

Winter weight

Banish scratchy facemasks! You won’t believe how soft our special polyester/spandex blend feels against your face. Especially when you remember it’s made out of recycled plastic bottles. Our winter weight mask is just right for keeping you warm but not overheated. 
● STAY WARM: The close fit traps warm air, even when you move

● STAY DRY: Breath escapes through open nose & mouth areas

● STAY COMFORTABLE: Unique soft-brushed fabric

● STAY PROTECTED: Innovative fabric rated UPF 50+

Sizes XS-XL available in Black and Dark Shadow.
 
 

Recycled poly/spandex available in Black and Dark Shadow in sizes XS-XL.  

Sizes M and L are also available in the below prints. If Skrēn Facemasks meets our funding goal, we'll be able to offer all sizes in the winter weight prints in the next production run.  

Print designs  clockwise, starting top left:

                                  Black Paisley, Game Screen, Mary Jane and Nebula

                                             

 

Mid-Weight 
Perfect when you want protection in the Spring or Fall, our mid-weight fabric is crafted from a bamboo/cotton/spandex blend. 


● SWEAT-WICKING: Bamboo has natural sweat-wicking abilities, which keeps you comfortable when your body heats up

● SUN PROTECTION: Our soft fabric also provides UPF 50+ protection from the sun 

● COMFORTABLE: Spandex allows your facemask to stretch to perfectly fit your face

● DURABLE: Your facemask will keep its shape over time thanks to Spandex’s stretch

Mid-Weight Skrēn masks are available in Black and Fawn (flesh colored). 

Summer Weight
Keep your cool with Skrēn. Our summer weight mask is woven from an incredible polyester/spandex blend that feels cool on your face with the same amazing properties of the mid weight fabric. You won’t know how you survived intense heat before it!

Summer-Weight​ masks are available in Golden Suns and Abstract in sizes​ S - L. 

 

       

 

Skrēn Ships in Compostable Shipping Bags!

We're committed to protecting the environment so we can keep enjoying this big, beautiful, blue marble we call home. 

                                             

 

 

 

 

 

 

How Skrēn was born...

Hi, I'm Deirdre...

An avid cyclist, hiker, Nordic skier, snowboarder and dirt biking newbie.  5 years ago, I realized sunscreen wasn't nearly enough to protect my skin. 

 

Working in the skincare industry in the high country of Colorado made me acutely aware of the damage I was doing to my skin. Thanks to all my time on the slopes, my face was being exposed to the sun more than normal.​ I knew this would lead to premature skin aging and put me at a higher risk for skin cancer. 
Around the same time, I noticed A LOT of my clients aging prematurely. And even worse, too many of my clients were coming in with skin cancer on their face.
I tried just about every facemask on the market but nothing kept me covered while still allowing me to breathe properly.
It was time to take matters into my own hands. 
I knew I wanted a facemask that was:
● Breathable

● Protective

● Comfortable

● And looked good 


From there, Skrēn was born!
 

 

With Skrēn, I’m motivated to get outside more, stay outside longer, and have more fun! All without worrying about my skin. 
 
After 3 years of product testing, use of ​Skrēn delivered clean dermatology checkups from every tester. Even testers with previously existing conditions didn’t see their skin worsen thanks to Skrēn.
 M​y skin started showing fewer signs of aging once I stopped constantly exposing myself to harsh elements.​ When my clients ask me how to keep their skin looking youthful, the #1 thing I recommend is PROTECTION.
 
Skrēn is now ready for mass production.
My dream is to make Skrēn available worldwide so everyone can enjoy the outdoors while staying protected. ​With ​Skrēn​, you can focus on what’s most important… having fun!
I'm thrilled to make the outdoors accessible to anyone who experiences skin issues or just wants to be more comfortable playing outside. 
But Skrēn needs your help.
 
                                                          Our Funding Goal
Skrēn needs to raise $7,000 to cover the manufacturing costs for our first production run. This covers:
● Fabric

● Sublimation

● Cutting and sewing

● Marketing


Why Flexible Funding?
Even if we don't reach our funding goal, we’re able to cover some manufacturing costs. We’re also moving ahead with first-run production before the end of our campaign. With our current timeline, we’re aiming to ship Skrēn within 6 weeks of the launch date. 
What Do I Get?
As a supporter of Skrēn, you choose which Skrēn Facemask package works best for you. Whether you’d prefer a winter-weight, mid-weight or summer-weight mask, you’ll benefit from Skrēn’s ultimate protection. 
The most adjustable mask on the market!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Well, it's been quite a challenge to get to this point.  Finding the right fabric and finding a manufacturer that could sew that masks correctly has taken me 5 years! I have finally found my perfect manufacturing partner.  Currently I have enough fabric to make and ship 500 masks approximately 6 weeks from the launch of this campaign. 

Since the Skrēn Facemask in the only one of it's kind, some people may find it challenging to put on correctly. This is why we created a "How to Wear" video that will be included in you survey email.  

Once you get the hang of it, you'll wonder how you ever used a typical facemask! 

 

Think this is an awesome idea but don't need a facemask?

We still need your help! Share this project with friends, family or anyone you think might appreciate a better mask and better protection! 

Earn money promoting Skrēn 

We also have an affiliate referral program connected to this campaign via kickbooster.me.

That's right! You can earn money by helping us promote Skren. Just sign up at kickbooster.me, where you'll also learn how much you can earn. Then, share our campaign on your Instagram and/or Facebook page!

Thank you all so much for your support along the way to this point. 

I really couldn't have done it without you!
