story:
It's been a beautiful campaign! We're now taking orders over on our website. Head over to www.cinchpopuptents.com to check it out :-) 

 

 

Meet the pop-up tent that has revolutionised camping, making it smarter, cooler and hassle free. Our fourth-generation CINCH! POP-UP has everything that has made it such a crowdfunding favourite and much, much more. In 2018, industry-leading quality, world-beating hugeness and technological innovation are joined by a dozen user-inspired design changes including…

  • Panoramic inner doors, allowing you to use every inch of the inner tent space as your living area
  • A completely enclosed groundsheet, meaning every Cinch is no-bug zone
  • Smartphone controlled interior LED lighting system

 

Our newest innovation is a super-versatile pop up living area that provides standing room for the tallest of campers, multi-tent connectivity, solar power mounting, heat regulation and LED lighting. A place to stretch out, relax and share some time, it pitches in seconds and makes any campsite a home. Perfect for completing the Cinch campsite setup, or even as a standalone retreat for beach-trips or live events.

 

This year’s solar power pack is true world-beater, pulling enough juice from the sun to power your most demanding gadgets.

  • CUTTING EDGE TECHNOLOGY Pulling in a whopping 21 watts of power, our panels are strong and smart enough to charge your USB gadgets straight from the sun, with innovative technology allowing the panel to manage environmental conditions and deliver the best charge.
  • BIG POWER Our portable power pack punches in at 13,000MAH - the equivalent of six full iPhone 7 charges. It comes with fast charging technology, 2 regular USB and even a type C port, ready for the latest laptops and phones.
  • COMPLETE INTEGRATION All-new rooftop ports store the solar panel inside the tent, keeping it dry, secure and accessible. With no need for external ports, your Cinch is 100% sealed off from the outside world. Higher power pockets in the inner tent also mean shorter wires and much less fiddling.

 

‘KEEPS THE KIDS IN BETTER MOODS WITH BETTER SLEEP’ - Customer Survey

Simmering Summer seasons are what camping is all about - if only it wasn’t for the hot, stuffy, airless mornings that leave you feeling like a bowl of lobster bisque. Fear not: our Climate Control Canopy spells the end of the 6AM stickies. This lightweight radiant barrier stretches easily over the tent, leaving your interior significantly cooler and deliciously darker - perfect for a refreshing morning lie in, a place to chill in the afternoon, or even a creche for baby camps. The two sides of this year’s Climate Control Canopy provide extra-strength cover against the elements - keep it cooler with the silver or dim the lights with the dark side.

 

Our new colour coded takedown system means that packing up the Cinch is easier than ever. It's down within a minute, you don't need to be Hulk Hogan and we're with you all the way with how-to videos.

 

You no longer have to compromise on space - The Cinch holds the title for world's biggest pop up, pushing the boundaries in two, three and four people berths. Our huge internal living area is even bigger this year, with the addition of widescreen doors, allowing you to utilise every square centimetre of living space. Add that to the two large entranceways which double up as storage areas, pockets galore, two windows and a completely enclosed groundsheet and you have the most versatile pop-up on the planet. A standing tent can be packed down inside a minute-and-half into a disc-shaped rucksack, ready for the road. Full specifications below.

Night time is just as important as day when you’re camping, and just as fun. That’s why we’ve kitted out the Cinch with a complete exterior lighting system and - NEW FOR 2018 - Interior LED. Lining the ceiling of the inner tent, our LED setup sparkles, glints and illuminates in 365 colours at the touch of a smartphone. Can’t find your tent in the dark on the way back home? Illuminate it! Need to set the mood for romance? Phone it in! On the outside you can expect LED tent pegs and light-reflective guylines and the complete lighting system is made even-more-complete by the addition of two pop up lanterns which can be hung from numerous points around the tent.

The Cinch brings the weatherproofing prowess of high spec dome tent to the world of the pop up for the first time. Check out our feedback below to see front-line reports of the Cinch in action.

  • Double-skinned to prevent condensation
  • Fully enclosed groundsheet means that the outside stays outside - no bugs, no sand, no water.
  • Double-taped heat-sealed seams prevent damp
  • Outer layer is made from 4000HH fabric – three-times the industry standard in waterproofing
  • Cinch ventilation system creates continual circulation of fresh air, without compromising on insulation.

We’ve spent almost a decade perfecting our pop-up and this year is no different. The 2018 Cinch  features refinements inspired by our fabulous crowdfunders and the way they camp plus design expertise plus plus inspiration. Here’s some of this year’s biggest changes:

Size was our first consideration when designing the Cinch range. Why should you have to compromise on space, for the convenience of a pop-up? Why not have both? Our tents have a huge internal living area, with two large porches that double up as storage areas. The tent then packs down into a disc-shaped rucksack containing the complete kit and, weighing in at just 7kg for the 2-man Cinch.

 

Cook, eat or relax outside your tent whilst sheltering from the elements, with the optional extended canopy.

  • Increases space by a further 75%
  • Folds down into a small carry bag
  • Lightweight and Waterproof
  • Comes with a charming little light

 

 

So what's a footprint? It's a separate groundsheet that's cut-to-size that you place underneath your Cinch! to provide extra protection. It means that you can pack your tent away without the base being dirty, meaning you don't have to take the campsite home with you and extending your tent's lifespan. It's much easier to clean and less fiddly than unpacking and wiping down your tent when you get home. It's not essential by any means – but it's a great extra, and we introduced it after lots of requests from our backers.

There are so many ways to camp - a day on the beach, roadtrip roughing it on the side of the highway, a weeklong family get-together or the complete Glastonbury experience - all require different setups. Our complete kit prepares you for every one of them, with adventure-proof combinations ready to go whenever you are.

Take the POD to keep out of the sun when you’re lakeside, mix the Cinch with the extended canopy for a week in Provence or connect your gang’s Cinches together with the HUB for the ultimate festival base camp. With added solar power and climate control, we’ve always got your back. 

 

 

 

We know that quite a lot of people have never used crowdfunding before and that it can be a bit confusing. The bottom line with us is that when you click ‘get this perk,’ we will get you your product. We’re a small (and smart) company and we use crowdfunding as a way to raise the money we need to share our incredible product with people around the world. Your investment is safe. This is our third campaign and we’ve delivered thousands of tents across the face of the globe. In the very few occasions when uniting customer and tent has proved absolutely impossible, we’ve offered a full refund. We’re little guys, with big ideas, and each one of you matters to us.

 

We’ve been making the Cinch since 2009, when innovator Jake Jackson saw a better way to camp. In a market flooded with disposable, cheaply-built pop-ups that packed down like a troop of monkeys into a teacup, his idea was both simple and ambitious. A tent to make camping smart, fun and easy without sucking away your time, money and sanity.

The first Cinch was born in Jake’s garage (his mum’s, actually) - a reliable pop-up with a porch and a painstaking labour of love he worked on for so long that that his friends wondered where he’d disappeared to. It wasn’t long before he was making tents for them, and then their friends, and their friends’ friends, always refining, improving and amending. 

Since launching to the world in 2014 the Cinch has gone on to redefine expectations of the pop up, evolving to incorporate all of the weather-proofing, durability and quality of a high-spec dome tent, adding modern technologies in solar power, LED and heat-regulating materials and creating functionality and versatility with the extended canopy, the pop up living area and modular interiors.

This wouldn’t have been possible without the help of the incredible Cinch community, whose support and feedback has shaped the product we make today. From Portland to Peterborough, Iceland to Indonesia and Singapore to Syracuse, the crowdfunding community have backed us from day one, propelling the Cinch to every corner of the globe.

Now we’re back, with a smarter Cinch than ever before and a complete kit that is ready for every adventure. Become part of our story and help us change camping forever. We can’t do it without you!

 

 

Good tents come in large packages, and we've developed a trusted network of international couriers who provide safe, swift and cost-effective delivery. With control centres in the USA, Europe, Australia and China, we've been able to negotiate great shipping rates for countries with a large Cinch community and you’ll see this when you go to click through a perk and look at the delivery rates. 

Our ambition is to ship to every country in the world (we've notched up 65!) but the rules of shipping are different for every locality and we might need your help to ship to places that are new to us. If you can't find your country on the shipping list - or you see the "$200" sign - then get in contact with us and we'll try to rustle up a gang of your compatriots to drive shipping prices down. Please also note that the only places we can guarantee no customs fees are: the USA, Europe and Australia.

Time-conscious backers should also take heed: we don't recommend that you buy the Cinch for a particular date in the future. All of the stops are pulled out to provide you with an accurate estimated date of delivery but the vicissitudes of international production mean that our best efforts are sometimes scuppered. We honour every order, hell or high water, and we're better at it than ever. In cases where it is impossible to get you a tent we refund your order, no question. The Cinch is an investment in camping for the long-term, but we don't want you to be left hanging for an important camping date; if that means we lose your custom then we'd rather that than we disappoint you. 

The Cinch! is the world's smartest pop-up tent, and that’s a claim we don’t make lightly – but naturally it sets the bar very high indeed. We’ve spent years developing and refining the idea, and we’ve worked extremely hard to get the product ready for Indiegogo, so we’re not prepared to execute it poorly. In our last crowdfunding campaign we exceeded all expectations, with a record-beating production run. Fulfilling it made us better at what we do than ever before, nevertheless, every project has risks - here are the big three:

MANUFACTURING

When man meets machine, things can go wrong, but we have six years’ experience in manufacturing the tent and have developed robust contingency plans for all eventualities. Our long-term relationships with trusted manufacturers means that we can rely on their excellence in quality, speed and flexibility and to double down on checks, members of the Cinch team personally oversee all the most important stages of the manufacturing process.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS

One of the things that makes the Cinch special is attention to detail, as we aim to make each edition as near-perfect as we can. As such we make minor adjustments to the design as production goes forward and though this can set our timescale back, our philosophy is that we'd rather bring you the very best product possible than rush things. This year's developments are, as always, supported by the Cinch community and sit on top of an already-incredible tent - check out the 2017 feedback for yourself. If we see the opportunity to improve the tent in any area we'll let you know exactly how, when and why these changes will be made and how (if at all) they will affect the timeline. 

FULFILMENT

2017 was our biggest year yet and, in terms of production, every day was a school day. We learned an enormous amount about spreadsheet gremlins, customs fees, lost shipments and much more. We bring all of this knowledge to bear from the beginning of this project - and boy are we glad. Unpredictable situations - a supplier missing a deadline, a breakdown of machinery, a change of customs law - are all things that can cause a delay. To minimise the possibility of any setbacks, we have a team of people ready to step in to a situation, we have backup factories at the ready, and we always have a personal contact for you, so that you can follow the project all the way through to your door.

What comes with my tent?

A lot! The Cinch comes equipped with an inner and outer LED lighting system, light reflective guys, canopy setup (though not the extended canopy), torches, mirrors and all the Cinch smarts. We’re even throwing in a free Climate Control Canopy for Indiegogo-ers. However, other items, such as the solar power pack, are sold separately. We totally recommend it, but some people prefer to camp without it and we want people to camp how they want to.

Is the tent waterproof?

It certainly is! One of the problems with disposable pop up tents is that they’re quite flimsy and prone to leak in the rain. The Cinch has a Hydrostatic Head (HH) rating of 4000, four times the industry standard for waterproofing. It isn’t just the HH rating that keeps a tent waterproof though and so we’ve equipped the Cinch with double-taped heat-sealed seams and a complete groundsheet system (with a HH rating of 12000!).

Unlike most pop-up tents the Cinch is also double-skinned, meaning that there are two layers of fabric between you and the outside world. When the rain comes this means that the outer layer doesn’t have to contend with any condensation coming from inside the tent and this really helps keep everything nice and dry.

How does the tent do in the wind?

"Our faithful Cinch has got us through the long night of wind and rain. It has taken a battering in the wind all day. Definitely our top purchase of 2017.”

We’ve added extra pegging points along the base - combine these with the extra guy ropes and you can really fasten the Cinch to the ground and get ready for the worst the wind has to throw at you.

Is the tent difficult to fold up?

Pop up tents huh? Everyone has a story of being bested by a pop up – the primitive noises, the incandescent rage. Stuffed into the boot of the car and taken home to be burned for all time and ever. We’re putting an end to those stories. There’s definitely a knack to putting the Cinch down but once you’ve got it it’s an, ahem, Cinch! Our 2018 model features a colour coded takedown system and we’ve even added a little wiggle room in the bag so you don’t have to Schwarzenegger it back in and we’re with you all the way with videos and instructions. 

Is there mosquito/fly netting?

Our 2018 Cinch pop-up is completely impregnable to beasties, featuring a double-groundsheet system, meshed vents and dual-screen doors. You can let in as much of the outdoors as you like whilst keeping safe from creatures great and small. 

Can you stand up in the tents?

That depends how tall you are. Pop-up Tents in general aren’t necessarily designed for campers to stand up in, however our tents are very spacious and have plenty of head room. Below are the height sizes for each of the tents. Depending on your height, you may be able to stand in the four man. 

2 Man                      1.15m
3 Man                      1.2m
4 Man                      1.6m

You CAN, however, stand up in the new Cinch POD! One of the motivations for designing it was to provide you with a place to stand up tall and survey your land. 

How many guy lines do I need to peg out?

As many as you need. There are 20 guy lines available on the tent, so if there’s no wind, just peg the tent base and you’re ready to go. We advise that you peg the guy lines out according to the weather: if it’s windy, you can peg out all 20 guy lines to really stabilise your tent

Is the Cinch a four season tent?

A ‘four season’ or ‘winter’ tent is a tent that is prepared to tackle heavy snowfalls and wind and this is typically achieved with an extra-rigid exoskeleton and steeply angled sides. The things that allow these tents to cope in extreme conditions also make the tent a lot bulkier and heavier and this isn’t the way we’ve gone with our design. However, whilst we’d only recommend specialist equipment in truly extreme conditions, the Cinch is equipped for some really bad weather – with a HH rating of 4000, double taped seams, an extra-thick bathtub style groundsheet, extra pegging points and guy ropes galore it’s ready for all but the very worst stuff. Note also that a four season tent doesn’t provide especial protection against cold weather – most of your warmth comes from other equipment like your sleeping bag, your mat and your clothing.  

Does the tent come with the Solar Power Pack or is it an added extra?

We totally recommend the Solar Power Pack but some people would rather camp without it and so we sell the two separately.

Can you use the extended canopy on both sides of the tent?

The extended canopy is compatible with either entrance to the tent, which means you can choose which end to set up in. Though you’re free to add an extended canopy to both ends of the tent, we only really recommend having one because you’ll struggle to use the solar power pack and you’ll cover a few too many of the guy lines.

Is the tent suitable for backpacking or bike touring?

This is entirely up to you and how you envisage your trip. The weight and bulk of your equipment can be paramount to your packing concerns and we recommend that you take some time to envisage how you might incorporate the Cinch into your setup, the weight you think you’re capable of carrying comfortably and whether the rewards the tent offers are worth the extra weight (they are). Customers who have managed to fit the Cinch into their pack (or their group’s pack) say that it pays back in comfort, features and convenience. 

Why isn’t it a four-woman tent?

Unfortunately, as a small company, we’re at the mercy of search engine returns and that means we have to market our products using the industry’s accepted terminology. We definitely think it’s time for a change though and we’ll be looking to become more person-able as we become better known.
story_txt:
It's been a beautiful campaign! We're now taking orders over on our website. Head over to www.cinchpopuptents.com to check it out :-) 
 





 Meet the pop-up tent that has revolutionised camping, making it smarter, cooler and hassle free. Our fourth-generation CINCH! POP-UP has everything that has made it such a crowdfunding favourite and much, much more. In 2018, industry-leading quality, world-beating hugeness and technological innovation are joined by a dozen user-inspired design changes including…

Panoramic inner doors, allowing you to use every inch of the inner tent space as your living area
A completely enclosed groundsheet, meaning every Cinch is no-bug zone

Smartphone controlled interior LED lighting system
 Our newest innovation is a super-versatile pop up living area that provides standing room for the tallest of campers, multi-tent connectivity, solar power mounting, heat regulation and LED lighting. A place to stretch out, relax and share some time, it pitches in seconds and makes any campsite a home. Perfect for completing the Cinch campsite setup, or even as a standalone retreat for beach-trips or live events. This year’s solar power pack is true world-beater, pulling enough juice from the sun to power your most demanding gadgets.

CUTTING EDGE TECHNOLOGY Pulling in a whopping 21 watts of power, our panels are strong and smart enough to charge your USB gadgets straight from the sun, with innovative technology allowing the panel to manage environmental conditions and deliver the best charge.

BIG POWER Our portable power pack punches in at 13,000MAH - the equivalent of six full iPhone 7 charges. It comes with fast charging technology, 2 regular USB and even a type C port, ready for the latest laptops and phones.

COMPLETE INTEGRATION All-new rooftop ports store the solar panel inside the tent, keeping it dry, secure and accessible. With no need for external ports, your Cinch is 100% sealed off from the outside world. Higher power pockets in the inner tent also mean shorter wires and much less fiddling.
 ‘KEEPS THE KIDS IN BETTER MOODS WITH BETTER SLEEP’ - Customer SurveySimmering Summer seasons are what camping is all about - if only it wasn’t for the hot, stuffy, airless mornings that leave you feeling like a bowl of lobster bisque. Fear not: our Climate Control Canopy spells the end of the 6AM stickies. This lightweight radiant barrier stretches easily over the tent, leaving your interior significantly cooler and deliciously darker - perfect for a refreshing morning lie in, a place to chill in the afternoon, or even a creche for baby camps. The two sides of this year’s Climate Control Canopy provide extra-strength cover against the elements - keep it cooler with the silver or dim the lights with the dark side. Our new colour coded takedown system means that packing up the Cinch is easier than ever. It's down within a minute, you don't need to be Hulk Hogan and we're with you all the way with how-to videos. You no longer have to compromise on space - The Cinch holds the title for world's biggest pop up, pushing the boundaries in two, three and four people berths. Our huge internal living area is even bigger this year, with the addition of widescreen doors, allowing you to utilise every square centimetre of living space. Add that to the two large entranceways which double up as storage areas, pockets galore, two windows and a completely enclosed groundsheet and you have the most versatile pop-up on the planet. A standing tent can be packed down inside a minute-and-half into a disc-shaped rucksack, ready for the road. Full specifications below.Night time is just as important as day when you’re camping, and just as fun. That’s why we’ve kitted out the Cinch with a complete exterior lighting system and - NEW FOR 2018 - Interior LED. Lining the ceiling of the inner tent, our LED setup sparkles, glints and illuminates in 365 colours at the touch of a smartphone. Can’t find your tent in the dark on the way back home? Illuminate it! Need to set the mood for romance? Phone it in! On the outside you can expect LED tent pegs and light-reflective guylines and the complete lighting system is made even-more-complete by the addition of two pop up lanterns which can be hung from numerous points around the tent.The Cinch brings the weatherproofing prowess of high spec dome tent to the world of the pop up for the first time. Check out our feedback below to see front-line reports of the Cinch in action.
Double-skinned to prevent condensation
Fully enclosed groundsheet means that the outside stays outside - no bugs, no sand, no water.
Double-taped heat-sealed seams prevent damp
Outer layer is made from 4000HH fabric – three-times the industry standard in waterproofing
Cinch ventilation system creates continual circulation of fresh air, without compromising on insulation.
We’ve spent almost a decade perfecting our pop-up and this year is no different. The 2018 Cinch  features refinements inspired by our fabulous crowdfunders and the way they camp plus design expertise plus plus inspiration. Here’s some of this year’s biggest changes:Size was our first consideration when designing the Cinch range. Why should you have to compromise on space, for the convenience of a pop-up? Why not have both? Our tents have a huge internal living area, with two large porches that double up as storage areas. The tent then packs down into a disc-shaped rucksack containing the complete kit and, weighing in at just 7kg for the 2-man Cinch. Cook, eat or relax outside your tent whilst sheltering from the elements, with the optional extended canopy.
Increases space by a further 75%
Folds down into a small carry bag
Lightweight and Waterproof
Comes with a charming little light
  So what's a footprint? It's a separate groundsheet that's cut-to-size that you place underneath your Cinch! to provide extra protection. It means that you can pack your tent away without the base being dirty, meaning you don't have to take the campsite home with you and extending your tent's lifespan. It's much easier to clean and less fiddly than unpacking and wiping down your tent when you get home. It's not essential by any means – but it's a great extra, and we introduced it after lots of requests from our backers.There are so many ways to camp - a day on the beach, roadtrip roughing it on the side of the highway, a weeklong family get-together or the complete Glastonbury experience - all require different setups. story:
Short Summary (this mission has raised a total of £910 adding together both online and cash contributions. Thank you so much for your support God will replenish your pocket in hundred folds. With just 3days to go, is not too late to make your donation)

Abisinuola Mission India 2014-

Hello to all my friends and family.

It is with great pleasure that I take this chance to offer you to become a valuable sponsor of ' My Mission India 2014' organised by ROC in association with City Praise Centre Gravesend. 

The team I'm going with will be involved in evangelism in churches, schools, colleges and  public places. There is also indoor and outdoor crusade, visit to the clinics, orphanage etc. We also have medical outreach teams and youth outreach teams. I will be working with Citykids pastor and our focus will be to bring smiles to children faces.

The cost of the trip is £1,400 per person including flight and accommodation, excess fund will be donated on your behalf to the Carmel Minitries in India. Sponsors will be able to follow me on Facebook, Netlog and Tweeter. I will be uploading and updating you on our journey. Most of all, I need your prayers, encouragements and sponsorship for this mission to come. 

I hope my trip to India will enable me to continue in my quest to help less privileged not only in Asia, but also in Africa and Europe.

I am looking forward to your positive contribution.

What I will Need

As little as £5.00 goes a long way. You can donate through PayPal to : Togetherness.community@gmail.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help

get the word out!

It is with great pleasure that I take this chance to offer you to become a valuable sponsor of ' My Mission India 2014' organised by ROC in association with City Praise Centre Gravesend. 
The team I'm going with will be involved in evangelism in churches, schools, colleges and  public places. There is also indoor and outdoor crusade, visit to the clinics, orphanage etc. We also have medical outreach teams and youth outreach teams. I will be working with Citykids pastor and our focus will be to bring smiles to children faces.
The cost of the trip is £1,400 per person including flight and accommodation, excess fund will be donated on your behalf to the Carmel Minitries in India. Sponsors will be able to follow me on Facebook, Netlog and Tweeter. I will be uploading and updating you on our journey. Most of all, I need your prayers, encouragements and sponsorship for this mission to come. 
I hope my trip to India will enable me to continue in my quest to help less privileged not only in Asia, but also in Africa and Europe.
I am looking forward to your positive contribution.


What I will Need
As little as £5.00 goes a long way. You can donate through PayPal to : Togetherness.community@gmail.com


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help
get the word out!

story:
Ulysses Lopez's race bike was stolen!

Ulysses Lopez is a sophmore at San Rafael HS. He races on their mountain bike team. His race bike was stolen and he cannot afford a replacemnt at this time. 

Let's show him that the cycling community is stronger than any scummy bike thieves are! 

I'm aiming to get him a new race bike AND a new townie so he does not have to leave his race bike locked up around town to get stolen again. 

We need to come up with $4,000 to make it happen.

This is chump change compared to the good we're doing for this young man. Mike's Bikes in San Rafael is giving us a screaming deal on the bikes. Now we need to do our part as a community. You know what's even MORE rad? We're getting the young man an upgrade over the bike he was on previously. How's that for awesome?! 

100% of the money recieved will go towads replacing his bike and getting the townie.

Getting Ulysses back on track and in time for his next race (March 10th) will make his asperations a reality!

We'll post photos of him on the new bike, shredding it at the race - it's just the right thing to do!

You don't have to donate a lot - just kick in SOMETHING. It feels good! THANK YOU FOR READING! NOW DONATE!

story:
Short Summary

A Inviita, projecto vencedor do Vodafone BigApps 2014, é uma startup portuguesa prestes a lançar uma aplicação gratuita que pretende inspirar e simplificar o planeamento de uma viagem.

Fomos recentemente seleccionados para estar presentes, já no dia 13 de Maio, no concurso do Travel Innovation Summit Europe da Phocuswright, um dos concursos de inovação mais aclamados no mercado do Travel, em Dublin.

Estamos muitos orgulhosos com esta oportunidade mas de momento a nossa startup é self-funded e precisamos de ajuda para conseguir marcar presença no evento e trazer o prémio connosco!

Os bilhetes para demonstrar e marcar presença no evento custam-nos 8000€ e decidimos iniciar uma campanha crowdfunding para que com a ajuda de todos consigamos colocar esta startup Portuguesa nos olhos do mundo! :)

Com a vossa contribuição podem ajudar-nos a colocar a Inviita nos olhos do mundo e a levar uma startup Portuguesa para o infinito, e mais além!

Obrigada :)


Inviita is a portuguese startup, winner of the contest Vodafone Big Apps, and is about to launch a free mobile application that will inspire & simplify the way we plan our trips!

Inviita was selected to participate in the Travel Innovation Summit from Phocuswright, which will happen in Dublin, on May 13. This event is one of the most acclaimed innovation contests in the Travel industry worldwide.

We’re very proud of this opportunity, but our startup is currently self-funded so we cannot afford the entrance fees needed for us to participate. To present and fight for the prize we need to pay 8000€, so we decided to launch a crowdfunding campaign and ask for a little contribution from all of our friends, family and relatives.

With your contribution, you can help us to put Inviita in the eyes of the world and to lead a Portuguese startup to infinity, and beyond!

Thank you! :)

story:
Short Summary

I'm Emily Gerkin, here's some fast facts to introduce you to both myself and my cause

  • I'm currently 18 years old, but will turn 19 en route to San Diego! 
  • I'm finishing up my freshman year at NC State studying Statistics 
  • I'm overwhelmingly passionate about affordable housing and Bike & Build
  • There is no city or county anywhere in the United States where a worker making the minimum wage can afford a fair market rate one-bedroom apartment.
  • The cost of rent and utilities for a typical two-bedroom apartment increased 41% from 2000 to 2009.
  • Families with children represent 23 percent of the homeless.

In the past 10 years, Bike & Build has: 

  • Donated more than $4 million
  • Built for more than 120,000 hours
  • Pedaled over 6 million miles
  • Involved more than 1750 young adults in spreading awareness for affordable housing

You're donation will help to not only change the lives of those it monetarily benefits, but will change mine as well! 

What I Need & What You Get

What I'm asking for:

  • My fundraising goal has been set at $4,500 and every dollar helps
  • Please consider donating as much or as little as is possible for you
  • Support, prayers, and super sick encouraging emails 

What you get:

  • A heart felt thank you note written on some fancy stationary 
  • A number of memorable things up for grabs for different donation amounts, check it out! 
  • That heart warming feeling of knowing you did a good thing
  • Awesome karma? 
  • My eternal love 

 

The Impact

On my trip I will:

  • Bike 3,609 miles
  • Participate in 14 build days
  • Address numerous communities on the issue of affordable housing

Bike & Build has:

  • Donated more than $4 million
  • Built for more than 120,000 hours
  • Pedaled over 6 million miles
  • Involved more than 1750 young adults in spreading awareness for affordable housing

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't considering a financial contribution, here's a few other ways you can help!

  • Get involved with affordable housing in your communtiy
  • Spread the word about Bike & Build 
  • Send me lots of love, support, and fundraising ideas

story:
Short Summary

Jek'O Trike is a flexible and "mutant" Electric-Pedal Trike.

We would like to fill all the cities around the world of a new eco-friendly vehicle with pedal assisted electric motors!

We're making the frame that will be universal (compatible) with many types of bodies (that's why it's "mutant":)), we will start with an old style three weels Morgan  bodywork, but many others have already been designed:

  • I'm an Architect and Designer with experience in mechanic design.
  • It's pure passion for a different way to imagine our "short city travels" and commuting.
  • The average speed in the city is about 10 km/h, with an electric-pedal assisted veichle the top speed is of 25km/h, they aren't bulky, without pollution and fun!

You can help us to realize our dream to produce this veichle for commuting and free time in many ways, even pre-ordering your first one!

 


What We Need & What You Get

Hello folks, ready for a ride?

  • We need to produce the mold for the first bodies, it's quite expensive.
  • We will produce the bodywork in fiberglass and alluminium!
  • We also need some specilized work in carbon fiber for the frame.
  • We want to produce a special circuit board to control the electric power (the project and the prototype is ready and working)
  • We are happy to start selling even without body (you can run it even without bodywork), the bodywork is always an optional.

 

The Impact

Thanks to your help we will be able to work to an high stadard level and start selling soon:

  • We have BIG AMBITIONS, we want to start a series of exciting products.
  • Imagine your town be filled of silent, funny, fast and ecologic electric pedal cars!
  • Our prices will be very reasonable so to allow everyone to get one!

Other Ways You Can Help

Other kind of helps that can be appreciated:

  • Make noise about our campaing!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • WE ARE LOOKING FOR WORLDWIDE RESELLER AND AGENTS!
  • WE ARE LOOKING FOR WORLDWIDE BUSINESS PARTNERS

story:
LYPEN PRONOUNCED: LA - PEN 

Remember when you were younger and your parents bought you that one toy that you really loved? That one toy that you didn't want anyone else to play with? 

You didn't want anyone else to have it so much that you tried to hide it from public. You would hold it in your hands and admire it all to yourself. 

Now that I think of it... It sounds like I'm describing Gollum from Lord of the Rings.

What you felt when you were younger is what you will feel when you hold the LYPEN in your hands. Everything from the weight & feel of the pen to how it looks in person will leave you itching to keep it in your hands. 

Hi guys, 

My name is Mark Anthony and by day I'm a Full-time watchmaker for Swiss brands & by night I'm a Full-time martial arts instructor. 

From putting together pen designs that I liked & eliminating things I didn't like, I came up with the LYPEN. 

When I first brought home the prototype, my girlfriend had to threaten me with the you-know-what while going to bed because I didn't want to part with it.


STRONG & INDESTRUCTIBLE - MADE OUT OF A SOLID TITANIUM

I was sick and tired of the pens on the market. Flimsy & pathetic. If I did find a pen, there was something that I didn't like about it. I just couldn't find the perfect pen. One thing was for sure, the foundation of the LYPEN was going to be Titanium.

The LYPEN is so strong that I'm able to suspend my whole weight on it (how many pull-ups can you do?...)

MINIMALISTIC & DISCREET- KEEPING IT STUPID SIMPLE

 

I'm a huge fan of minimalistic design. I didn't want a pen that screamed out at me. I needed something that felt luxurious but also sturdy. I didn't want a BMW car that ran on a Volkswagen Beetle Engine. I needed something that looked and lived up to it's name.

LYPEN WITH CAP OFF
LYPEN WITH CAP SECURELY PRESSED ON BACK
DIMENSIONS: 
  Length is 5.5 Inches  
  Width is 0.43 inches 
  Weighs 1.16oz without a refill

FITS ALL FISHER, PARKER, & PILOT REFILLS- SCREW IN & OUT


I know there are a lot of pen enthusiasts out there that like specific refills. So to cover a broad spectrum of pen enthusiasts and to keep them happy, I've managed to fit any Parker, Fisher, and Pilot refills within the LYPEN.

HOW? 
  Within the LYPEN barrel, I utilized a screw that can lengthen/shorten the distance within barrel so I can adjust the space within the body to fit the actual refills.

NEED TO BEAT SOMEONE IN? NO WORRIES- LYPEN COMES WITH A FUNCTIONAL PRECISION CUT TIP


  • Minimalistic
  • Discrete
  • Hassle-free
  • 50% lighter than steel pens
  •  Indestructible
  •  Durable (i.e. how many pulls can you do on it?)
  • Last for Generations to come (will you live long enough to explain it to your grandkid's kid?)
  • Rust & Stain Free
  • Can withstand extreme temperatures
  • Fits All Parker, Fisher, & Pilot Refills (possibly more too)
  • Tungsten Steel Tip lets you break LOTS of things (i.e. glass, window, cup, shitty neighbor's gnomes, your archenemies' iPhone screen, your ex-girlfriends stupid Kindle)

FAQs

Q. How much is Shipping outside of the USA?

A. We've added a flat $10 fee for shipping ANYWHERE outside of the USA. 

That means if you live in a ditch in West Bumble, we'll still get it out to you :)

Please add $10 flat shipping fee to your order in the "Additional Gift" section at checkout.

Q. How does the pen cap attach to the pen? It does not look like a screw-on cap
A.  It's pressure-cap type. So you can cap it on the back of the pen!

For a picture example, take a look at the main picture for the LYPEN 

The first LYPEN is with the cap on. The second LYPEN below it is with the cap off and attached on the back.

Q. What Grade Titanium is the LYPEN?

A. The LYPEN uses TC4 Grade Titanium. We are currently experimenting with TC5.

Q. Does this pen accept the Hi-Tec-C Refill?

A. With some tweaking, yes! :)

Q. How many pull-ups did you really do?

A. I did about 10. I think I set a world-record on pull-ups with a pen.

Q. What happened with the Kickstarter campaign?

A. We originally thought Kickstarter was cool. Unfortunately, they weren't. 

They originally confirmed that we were perfectly within their guidelines and then the next second, slammed the hammer on us.

You can read the whole contradictory issue here: https://lypen.com/what-happened-to-kickstarter/

Q. Someone keeps mentioning you on Twitter about the LYPEN and another pen, what's up with that?

A. They're cool people. They thought that we were reselling the pen from another company when in fact, we are not. 

Everyone is entitled to their own opinion. Everyone who originally backed us on Kickstarter agrees that it is a completely different pen. 

Indiegogo has confirmed as well.

Q. Will you really fly out to me? I live in Australia

A. Hey! Who doesn't like to travel? :)

story:
Hi,

I am going to tell you a bit more about myself and my product.We are indo Fijians migrated to USA from Fiji Island in 1999 with my family of two children (who are now adults) and a lovely wife under green card lottery system. Indo-Fijians are Fijians whose ancestors came from India and various parts of South Asia and South-East Asia.They are mostly descended from indentured laborers, girmitiyas or girmit, brought to the islands by Fiji's British colonial rulers between 1879 and 1916 to work on Fiji's sugar cane plantations.

Our life changed when the first coup happened in Fiji in 1987 and that put Fiji back by 30 years and lots of hardship made us take  the opportunity to migrate to USA. When we were preparing to migrate to USA, we thought we would be going to the capitol of USA Washington DC, we did not know that there was another state, Washing state but knew our final destination was Seattle. At the end of our 12 hour flight we landed on the land of opportunity and our life was back to the starting point again but this time everything was new, high rise buildings that we never saw before, multiple freeway lanes and we stood there alone. We found peace in ourselves knowing that more than 300 million people call this home and sure we could find our place as well.  During our 14 years of living in USA we have had our fair share of the ups and down in our life. I have been laid off 4 times and my wife once in the name of restructuring, downsizing, moving the corporate office and recession but we never lost living, taking care of our monthly financial commitments and believed from day one that all this is temporary and better days are yet to come. We see that vision in our Empowerment Bottle product and will work towards our goal tirelessly to achieve it. 


Every day, millions of people feel insecure walking in their own neighborhoods or going about their business. I am a King County Metro bus driver. One night, while I was driving my regular route, a female passenger disembarked and asked if I could wait there with the bus until she got to her car. It was only eight in the evening. Later, I saw a female university student run from my bus to her apartment. I drove slowly to be sure I could see her get home safely, but it didn't seem like enough.

It really got me thinking. What is the world coming to if women can’t even feel safe enough to walk from a bus to their car?

We bus drivers deal with various safety concerns on our routes. All transit operators have at some point been thrust into a fearful situation where we have to protect our self and our passengers, but what about our passengers when they’re no longer on the bus? I wondered what I could do to provide people in transit with a protective tool that would make them feel safe, something they can carry with them easily—maybe something they already carry with them!

A water bottle instantly came to mind. People carry water bottles all the time—during exercise, hiking, going places alone, on their way home from work or to work, in their bag, or even by their side while sleeping.

Water bottles also help reduce the amount of waste people produce, making them better for our environment. So, I decided to design a fully functional water bottle with built-in tools for self-defense.

Ultimately, I want to give the gift of security and self-confidence to people who fear potential attackers. I discussed the idea with family members, friends, and coworkers, and, after receiving positive responses, I decided to bring my idea to Indiegogo.

Experience Empowerment’s Design.The Empowerment Bottle is made of single-wall food-grade 304 stainless steel, and can hold 16 ounces of water. But the true purpose of its design is hidden inside: aside from being a fully functional water bottle that will keep your drinking water cool throughout the day, it has a spring-loaded 2 ounce pepper spray canister and a piercing warning whistle built into it. On the handle, there is a metal piece attached, which can be used to strike your attacker if you are unable to use the pepper spray or whistle. And for night time visibility attached is a reflective tape. 

As shown in the prototype schematics below, the pepper spray and whistle are stored next to the water canister in a square chamber that is totally sealed off from the water container, and are accessible in a second to the bottle’s carrier.  



The tools in this bottle are specifically made and included to give everyone who carries an Empowerment Bottle the feeling of positive energy and safety that will allow them to live a freer, happier life.  

The Empowerment Bottle is lined with a BPA-free plastic, so there is no metallic aftertaste. Its ergonomic, compact shape is designed to fit in your hand and in every standard cup holder. The Empowerment Bottle is also leak-proof! It should be noted that the Empowerment Bottle is not dishwasher safe due to the pepper spray, but quick and easy hand-washing is perfectly safe for you and your bottle.  

Where will the funds go?  The money raised from this will be primarily put toward constructing a working prototype from my schematics and 3-D animation. Working with prototype maker to enhance my design and bring out the best product that delivers top quality of everything it is designed to offer. Once I have a working prototype, it will go toward the production of the first run of Empowerment Bottles, including the bottles that will be given out to backers. I am reaching out to successful business entrepreneurs who have had great experience in the production of similar product and are willing to provide professional guidance and references.Please note that this type individual components have not been packaged together in a bottle to date and this is truly a new innovation we are developing.

A portion of the funds will also go toward market research in order to determine how to best target my niche audience. I intend to move into entrepreneurship with the Empowerment Bottle, so I will also be putting funds toward business plan writing, marketing both the Empowerment Bottle and my business, website design and hosting, back-end maintenance, and going into business. 

To wrap all the above in a dollar amount, we are looking at approximately $17,500 to get started. I have already spent $5,000.00 to protect my design as patent pending, domain name, marks for logo, slogan and  bottle name, domain name and web development.It was designed in Washington and will be manufactured in China in consideration of reducing the cost of the bottle that will eventually be paid by the consumers.


How much will the Empowerment Bottle cost? 
The final selling price of the Empowerment Bottle will be between $29.99 and $34.99 but it will largely depend on the production cost. Indiegogo backers have the opportunity to get one for $30 regardless of the final cost as your help means a lot to me, along with my thanks, website acknowledgment, and other merchandise, for helping me on the way to getting the Empowerment Bottle into the hands of people who need it.  

Please check out the reward levels on the right to see how you can contribute !  

Is the Empowerment Bottle patented? Yes

Patent pending receipt:

Trademark, Logo and Slogan mark have also been submitted to the USPTO office for registration

FAQ

What about a warranty? Because the Empowerment Bottle contains moving parts, we are providing a one-year warranty. If your bottle breaks, we will replace it or give you a full refund of its cost.

How much water does the Empowerment Bottle hold? 500 ml.

Is There Glass In It To Break If I Drop It? - No. Empowerment Bottles are constructed from stainless steel and hard plastic and are very hard-wearing!

Does it come in any other sizes -As of now we want to stay on our vision on the purpose of the empowerment bottle to empower you so that it stands for what we created and can be carried in a variety of carrying components.We will revisit this subject once we are in business and look at the demand on the market and customer feedback's/reviews

Will you ship the empowerment bottle worldwide?                                                       No, it can only be sold and shipped in USA 

How much will it cost me in shipping within USA?                                                        Its free to you, we are paying for it as your contribution means a lot to us

USA: States that do not have restrictions on pepper spray products for self defense use:

Alabama (AL), Arizona (AZ), Arkansas (AR), Colorado (CO), Connecticut (CT), Delaware (DE), Florida (FL), Georgia (GA), Idaho (ID), Illinois (IL), Indiana (IN), Iowa (IA), Kansas (KS), Kentucky (KY), Louisiana (LA), Maine (ME), Maryland (MD), Minnesota (MN), Mississippi (MS), Missouri (MO), Montana (MT), Nebraska (NE), Nevada (NV), New Hampshire (NH), New Jersey (NJ), New Mexico (NM), North Carolina (NC), North Dakota (ND), Ohio (OH), Oklahoma (OK), Oregon (OR), Pennsylvania (PA), Rhode Island (RI), South Carolina (SC), South Dakota (SD), Tennessee (TN), Texas (TX), Utah (UT), Vermont (VT), Virginia (VA), Washington (WA), West Virginia (WV),Wyoming (WY)

USA: States where its legal but has restrictions 

Alaska,Arkansas,California,Delaware,District Of Columbia, Hawaii,Illinois,Massachusetts,Michigan,New Jersey,Nevada,New York,North Carolina,Rhode Island,South Carolina,Wisconsin

(Check with your local law enforcement department for specific laws about the possession and use of pepper spray products in your city or county)

I live outside USA, can I still support your campaign without the water bottle in the perks?                                                                                                                      Yes, We need all the financial help we can get. Thank you

When Will I Receive My Empowerment bottle order? We expect to be able to deliver your perks package by November, 2014.

 

Media: We love talking about Empowerment Bottle and empowering at every opportunity 

Contact asmku@inbox.com to request press information.
story_txt:
Hi,I am going to tell you a bit more about myself and my product.We are indo Fijians migrated to USA from Fiji Island in 1999 with my family of two children (who are now adults) and a lovely wife under green card lottery system. Indo-Fijians are Fijians whose ancestors came from India and various parts of South Asia and South-East Asia.They are mostly descended from indentured laborers, girmitiyas or girmit, brought to the islands by Fiji's British colonial rulers between 1879 and 1916 to work on Fiji's sugar cane plantations.Our life changed when the first coup happened in Fiji in 1987 and that put Fiji back by 30 years and lots of hardship made us take  the opportunity to migrate to USA. When we were preparing to migrate to USA, we thought we would be going to the capitol of USA Washington DC, we did not know that there was another state, Washing state but knew our final destination was Seattle. At the end of our 12 hour flight we landed on the land of opportunity and our life was back to the starting point again but this time everything was new, high rise buildings that we never saw before, multiple freeway lanes and we stood there alone. We found peace in ourselves knowing that more than 300 million people call this home and sure we could find our place as well.  During our 14 years of living in USA we have had our fair share of the ups and down in our life. I have been laid off 4 times and my wife once in the name of restructuring, downsizing, moving the corporate office and recession but we never lost living, taking care of our monthly financial commitments and believed from day one that all this is temporary and better days are yet to come. We see that vision in our Empowerment Bottle product and will work towards our goal tirelessly to achieve it. Every day, millions of people feel insecure walking in their own neighborhoods or going about their business. I am a King County Metro bus driver. One night, while I was driving my regular route, a female passenger disembarked and asked if I could wait there with the bus until she got to her car. It was only eight in the evening. Later, I saw a female university student run from my bus to her apartment. I drove slowly to be sure I could see her get home safely, but it didn't seem like enough.It really got me thinking. What is the world coming to if women can’t even feel safe enough to walk from a bus to their car?We bus drivers deal with various safety concerns on our routes. All transit operators have at some point been thrust into a fearful situation where we have to protect our self and our passengers, but what about our passengers when they’re no longer on the bus? I wondered what I could do to provide people in transit with a protective tool that would make them feel safe, something they can carry with them easily—maybe something they already carry with them!A water bottle instantly came to mind. People carry water bottles all the time—during exercise, hiking, going places alone, on their way home from work or to work, in their bag, or even by their side while sleeping.Water bottles also help reduce the amount of waste people produce, making them better for our environment. So, I decided to design a fully functional water bottle with built-in tools for self-defense.Ultimately, I want to give the gift of security and self-confidence to people who fear potential attackers. I discussed the idea with family members, friends, and coworkers, and, after receiving positive responses, I decided to bring my idea to Indiegogo.Experience Empowerment’s Design.The Empowerment Bottle is made of single-wall food-grade 304 stainless steel, and can hold 16 ounces of water. But the true purpose of its design is hidden inside: aside from being a fully functional water bottle that will keep your drinking water cool throughout the day, it has a spring-loaded 2 ounce pepper spray canister and a piercing warning whistle built into it. On the handle, there is a metal piece attached, which can be used to strike your attacker if you are unable to use the pepper spray or whistle. And for night time visibility attached is a reflective tape. As shown in the prototype schematics below, the pepper spray and whistle are stored next to the water canister in a square chamber that is totally sealed off from the water container, and are accessible in a second to the bottle’s carrier.  The tools in this bottle are specifically made and included to give everyone who carries an Empowerment Bottle the feeling of positive energy and safety that will allow them to live a freer, happier life.  The Empowerment Bottle is lined with a BPA-free plastic, so there is no metallic aftertaste. Its ergonomic, compact shape is designed to fit in your hand and in every standard cup holder. The Empowerment Bottle is also leak-proof! It should be noted that the Empowerment Bottle is not dishwasher safe due to the pepper spray, but quick and easy hand-washing is perfectly safe for you and your bottle.  Where will the funds go?  The money raised from this will be primarily put toward constructing a working prototype from my schematics and 3-D animation. Working with prototype maker to enhance my design and bring out the best product that delivers top quality of everything it is designed to offer. Once I have a working prototype, it will go toward the production of the first run of Empowerment Bottles, including the bottles that will be given out to backers. I am reaching out to successful business entrepreneurs who have had great experience in the production of similar product and are willing to provide professional guidance and references.Please note that this type individual components
have not been packaged together in a bottle to date and this is truly a new
innovation we are developing.A portion of the funds will also go toward market research in order to determine how to best target my niche audience. I intend to move into entrepreneurship with the Empowerment Bottle, so I will also be putting funds toward business plan writing, marketing both the Empowerment Bottle and my business, website design and hosting, back-end maintenance, and going into business. To wrap all the above in a dollar amount, we are looking at approximately $17,500 to get started. I have already spent $5,000.00 to protect my design as patent pending, domain name, marks for logo, slogan and  bottle name, domain name and web development.It was designed in Washington and will be manufactured in China in consideration of reducing the cost of the bottle that will eventually be paid by the consumers.How much will the Empowerment Bottle cost? The final selling price of the Empowerment Bottle will be between $29.99 and $34.99 but it will largely depend on the production cost. Indiegogo backers have the opportunity to get one for $30 regardless of the final cost as your help means a lot to me, along with my thanks, website acknowledgment, and other merchandise, for helping me on the way to getting the Empowerment Bottle into the hands of people who need it.  Please check out the reward levels on the right to see how you can contribute !  Is the Empowerment Bottle patented? YesPatent pending receipt:Trademark, Logo and Slogan mark have also been submitted to the USPTO office for registrationFAQWhat about a warranty? Because the Empowerment Bottle contains moving parts, we are providing a one-year warranty. Thank youWhen Will I Receive My Empowerment bottle order? We expect to be able to deliver your perks package by November, 2014. Media: We love talking about Empowerment Bottle and empowering at every opportunity Contact asmku@inbox.com to request press information.

story:
WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING -

 

INTRODUCING: X-PAK PRO & X-PAK ONE -

The X-PAK (pronounced cross-pack) are unisex, multipurpose, multi-functional everyday gear for the urban dwellers with an active lifestyle. Designed to adapt to your daily activities and carry needs. With superb organizational features, it combines top quality material, components and craftsmanship.

A unique vertically integrated rolltop design to change the way you look and carry. A true balance and purity of form and function. 

 

 

The X-PAK PRO:

The larger of the two styles to fit up to a 13" laptop, and organizational features to meet all your carry needs. With two independent compartments, and a capacity of 10L to 17L when expanded, the bag can be used for work, travel or for leisure. The ultimate all-arounder for the city and beyond.

 

The X-PAK ONE:

A more compact size from its bigger sibling, but packing numerous features in its smaller form. A highly versatile bag that can transform to your needs and lifestyle; from a shoulder bag, hand bag, waist pack to a bike pack. Volume capacity of 4L to 7L when expanded.

 

COLOR OPTIONS -

Choose from two color options, BLACK or WHITE, for both the X-PAK ONE and X-PAK PRO.

 

Interior Lining/Fabric Color:

For the interior fabric, we purposely chose brighter/lighter colors for our lining. While black tends to be the more common color, we took inspiration from the iconic MA-1 fighter pilot jacket (aka bomber jacket). An orange liner was used to help promote visibility during rescue missions in the event of a plane crash. While our bags are not reversible like the jackets, it may help to see your belongings better in the dark. 

X-PAK PRO FEATURES -

The X-PAK PRO is the larger size of the two styles available. Packed with features in a clean, minimalistic design. 

 

X-PAK ONE FEATURES -

Don't let the smaller size fool you. The X-PAK ONE is a much more versatile bag than is bigger sibling. It can be carried over shoulder or cross-body, and via hand using the optional Handle Grip (see Add-On Details section), which is the same as the PRO. But, the X-PAK ONE can also be worn around your waist or convert to a bike pack using the optional Bike Strap (see Add-On Details section) as well, to become adapt to your lifestyle and needs. 

 

ADD-ON DETAILS -

1) External Compression Straps w/ Buckle Release Points

Our compression straps are designed specifically for use with the X-PAK collection to secure items outside of the bag. Such as yoga mats, camera tripods and more. 

Made using custom aluminum hooks, durable 0.75" (20mm) nylon webbings and high quality buckles from ITW Nexus.

 

2) Removable Handle Grip

Besides the shoulder, both X-PAX PRO and X-PAX ONE are designed to be carried by hand using the detachable handle grip.

The Handle Grip can be attached to the multi-purpose attach points that wraps around the main body of both X-PAK PRO and X-PAK ONE.

 

3) Bike Pack Strap Kit

The X-PAK ONE can convert to a bicycle pack by attaching it to the handle bar using the Bike Pack Strap Kit.

The velcro straps provide quick and easy process to attach the bag on the handle bar. In addition, the Stem Tube Strap gives a more secure fit with less movement while riding the bike.

 

FEATURES & SPEC COMPARISON -

Height Comparison:

X-PAK PRO

X-PAK ONE

Expands To Your Needs:

Increase storage capacity for both X-PAK PRO and X-PAK ONE by expanding the outer shell (rolltop) to its maximum size. X-PAK PRO will add another 7L, while the X-PAK ONE will add 3L more.

 

Multiple Configuration:

By creating two separate compartments and integrating a foldable outer shell, the X-PAK can expand in size to meet your carry needs. And giving it three unique looks to fit your style, preference and carry needs. From a rolled/folded closure, center buckled or expanded for maximum capacity. 

 

Feature Comparison:

A side-by-side comparison of the key features and specs of the two models, X-PAK ONE and X-PAK PRO.

 

MATERIAL & COMPONENT DETAILS -

X-PAK's are built using top-grade materials and components from tried-and-tested industry leaders in their respective fields.

The fabric used for the front outer shell compartment is produced in the USA. It is unique in that it is 4 layers laminated together instead of just one layer with PU coating, like many backpacks in the market. 

The layers are: DWR water repellant coating, woven nylon face fabric for abrasion resistance, X-Ply polyester yarn insert for bias stability and tear strength, clear film for waterproof and stretch control, and woven polyester backing for seam strength and durability.

Also using high-quality YKK zippers and plastic parts, combined with ITW's modern, durable yet lightweight buckles. 

And the main body is constructed using a more rugged and abrasion resistant, 1680D ballistic nylon, which is similar to that of many travel luggages made of fabric (vs plastic casing). 

We carefully designed and sourced each and every aspect of our bags.

At the same time, we did not want to ruin the aesthetics by unnecessary branding. To keep with our intention of producing a clean, minimalistic style in its most efficient and purest form, there are no eye-catching logos on our bags. Just hidden in places for only you, the backers, to see. Can you find them all?

 

ABOUT US -

 

Who We Are:

We are a small team of industry professionals and part-time dreamers, based in Los Angeles.

We design products that add comfort, efficiency and joy into the daily pace of our hectic lifestyles. Driven by our love and interest for technical soft goods and accessories.

Our goal is to design modern gears with acute attention to details, that are efficient and adaptable anywhere from the grocery store to the edges of the globe.

With over three decades of combined experiences in product design and development, we are finally putting our expertise together to launch our new Carrywear™ line to fill the niche in the market segment for those looking for that perfect go-to everyday, anywhere gear.

 

The Journey:

We certainly didn't get to this point of launching our project overnight. 

Since summer of 2016, we've been planning, designing, then to sampling and producing multiple prototypes, improving and revising each time, to perfect our bags to be the ultimate x best that it can be.

 

PRODUCTION TIMELINE -

Since inception in summer of 2016, we have been working closely with the same manufacturing partner overseas. They have vast experience and skilled craftsmen to produce high quality soft goods products. With their support, we have gone through countless rounds of sampling and prototypes to get to where we are today.

For this reason, they know our bags. But, more importantly, they know our high standards for quality and craftsmanship required. And they are now ready to start production once we give the green light.

Based on our years of experience in working with oversea partners and the logistics involved to ship across the Pacific, below is our projected timeline. We will do our utmost best to keep to this schedule and notify any issues and/or delays that may occur along the way.

 

WARRANTY -

We stand behind the quality of our bags with a Limited Lifetime Warranty. This warranty applies for the duration of the original purchaser. If you discover a material or manufacturing defect, we will replace or repair the item at our discretion.

This warranty does not cover any products that have suffered any damage, including but not limited to, misuse, loss, accidents, or any modification made to the product. Please also note that general wear and tear is not considered a material or manufacturing defect, and is therefore not covered by this warranty.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES -

Each member of our team has first hand experience in our fields, from design, supply chain, production, to cross border logistics. We have done everything within our scope to be fully prepared for this launch to make our vision come to life. 

Unfortunately, there may be unforeseen obstacles and challenges beyond our control that may arise, such as unforeseen production delays, custom issues or freight availability at time of shipping. 

We will be extremely transparent during these situations so that you can be kept up to date with the progress of your pledge. Rest assured, we will do everything in our power to make sure your bag will be well on your way as soon as possible. We have worked long and hard to get here. So you can bet that we are committed to go the extra distance when something unexpected occurs.

Thank you again for your support!

story:
The Superior Hammock itself weighs barely over two pounds, and the entire system is just 6 pounds, much lighter than your average tent.

Plus, you don’t have to worry about all the poles weighing you down while you traverse the wilderness. It’s a better sleep and a better pack.

 

 

After a long day of outdoor adventures, there’s nothing better than a good night’s sleep. Superior Hammock is a unique outdoor sleep system that uses the portability and cloud-like feel of a hammock combined with the insulation of a sleeping bag and the shelter of a tent.

It adds hardly any weight to your pack and it’s super easy to set up. Superior Hammock guarantees great sleep in the great outdoors.

Campers are always looking for ways to lighten their load and avoid lugging a tent around. Plus, sleeping right under the stars isn’t a bad deal. Problem is, most hammocks that enable you to do that don’t offer the insulation you need to actually stay warm throughout the night.

Superior Hammock is actually designed for you to spend the night. No more lying on the cold, hard ground in a bulky tent. Superior Hammock is easy to use, portable, and insulated, keeping you warm and your pack lighter.

Superior Hammock is easy and simple to set up.

Step 1 : Pick your trees and wrap the straps around the trunks.

Step 2 : Connect the carabiners to the straps and tighten for just the right amount of tension. And if you plan on using the tarp, simply connect it to the tarp extension.

 Step 3 : Stake down the sides of the shelter. And you’re ready to sleep!

Check out this quick demonstration video showing how to set up:

 

If you haven't been convinced yet, also take a look at our comparison video below. We compare the setup of traditional tent and Superior Hammock.

 

Superior Hammock keeps you insulated throughout the night outdoors when temperatures can drop unexpectedly. One common problem with sleeping in a hammock outdoor is “Cold Butt Syndrome”. Sure, you can bring along underquilts or sleepings pads to help, but that just adds more fussing, time, weight and cold drafts. Superior Hammock solves this with the integrated 800 Fill premium down.

And breathable, silk-like nylon fabric means you won’t wake up in the night sweating bullets either.

 

It can be difficult to get a good night’s rest knowing that you are exposed to the outdoor pests. Our sheer Bug Net helps keep you fully protected yet still allows you to enjoy the view and atmosphere of the outdoors.

 

                                           

Depending on the weather, sleeping under the stars sometimes just isn’t an option. Superior Hammock works for any camping trip.

Equipped with the handy shelter-tarp, you can use it even when it’s raining or snowing. This shelter can be used exactly like a standard hex tarp. Or it can be used as a super-quick, all-in-one setup attaching directly to the hammock suspension. This is when the setup gets insanely fast.

Simply connect the tarp to the included heavy-duty strap extension and then stake the sides of the tarp into the ground. Set this bad boy up in a flash.

We wanted to share our passion for the great outdoors with the world by creating the best sleeping gear that actually lasts. Superior Hammock can support up to 400lbs of weight and never let you down.

 

                                           

Tents are a pain to set up and once you do, you’re still basically just lying on the cold hard ground.

Superior Hammock feels like you’re sleeping on a cloud. Just go through the simple set up and then all you have to do is lie back and let nature lull you to sleep.

 

Superior Hammock was designed with the absolute highest quality materials and cutting-edge fabrics. Its straps are made with Dyneema, the strongest fiber on earth. It’s 15 times stronger than steel yet light enough to float on water.

It also has a 1,600lb breaking strength, is extremely abrasion-resistant and UV resistant and stretch-resistant.

Guys, I’m so excited about our finalized down blanket (top quilt) design. We barely mentioned in the Kickstarter cause we were still designing the final version. But it turned out way better and more versatile than I ever imagined!

It is a world-class top quilt with ground-breaking features like a double-insulated foot pocket, adjustable length and extra tough bottom for non-sleeping use.

With the snaps, it pairs up with the hammock in some really cool ways. You can create an awesome ‘cacoon’ that still allows a great diagonal lay and truly feels just like your bed at home.

You can even create a little sort of pup-tent or fort by hanging it over the ridgeline. Even pair it up with a second blanket to make a giant rectangle.

Or just use it as a killer top quilt with the super cozy foot pocket. It’s so versatile, there are probably a bunch of uses we haven’t even thought of.

 

However, in our ‘Cold Night’, ‘Trio’ and ‘Ultimate’ packages, we’re including the blanket basically at cost for about $150. This is seriously a steal!

        

 

 

Check out this review of Superior Hammock by Outdoor Hangers:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With your support, we can get Superior Hammock to a larger audience and revolutionize camping forever.

 

 

As outdoor enthusiasts, we’ve always been underwhelmed by the sleeping options out there. We’ve trekked through the trails ourselves and tried many different options, never quite finding one perfect outdoor sleeping solution. We love sleeping right under the stars on our adventures, but we also want to feel cozy and protected. We also wanted crazy fast and simple - that’s how the idea of Superior Hammock was born. As its name implies, we crafted the finest hammock ever produced, to replace a tent, not merely supplement it. And unlike most other camping gear, the Superior Hammock is amazing for every day use in your taking a backyard nap or stopping at a park on a fall day. You'll get way more use from this hammock than almost anything else in your Backpack. We sleep in Superior Hammock ourselves when we’re out in nature, and we think you’ll find it as comfy as we do.

story:
“With Titan, everyone can have fun getting to know the ocean.” --Geneinno Team

Most drones provide a fun way for you capture beautiful outdoor views and while hiking or traveling. But with an underwater drone, anyone can explore the unknown ocean depths! The functionality of a standard, airborne drone expands to meet challenging ocean currents with high-performance motion technology.

Titan is the most affordable underwater drone on the market with the highest available water pressure rating, built to go wherever your underwater adventure takes you. With its powerful 4K 30fps camera and streamlined, game-like control system, Titan can be your eyes under the sea. Able to withstand depths up to 150m (492ft), farther than any other drone to date, you can pilot Titan with an easy to use smartphone/tablet app. Capture stunning underwater images and videos, find plentiful locations to fish, or even carry out accurate technical inspections of underwater equipment. The possibilities are endless!

Whether you are scuba diver, underwater photographer, drone enthusiast, marine naturalist, educator or just want to have fun, Titan is your best choice.

Titan’s built-in camera features a 160° ultra-wide angle lens, creating cinematic 4K videos and spectacular 8MP photos in rich detail and color.

Our smartphone app gives you total control while piloting through a live video feed of your underwater drone.

Red and purple dive filters provide color correction while capturing footage in water at depths of 5m to 21m (15' to 63'), perfect for fresh or salt water that appears different color due to algae.

Powerful LED lights on each side of the camera illuminate the darkest depths of the ocean.

Amazing Footage by Titan, at Palau

We designed Titan with a diving range of up to 150m, so Titan can dive down and unravel the mysteries of the deep blue sea, while you stay high and dry, and enjoy the adventure.

Powered by 6 high-performance thrusters and guided by a precise steering algorithm, Titan commands the speed, endurance, and agility needed to withstand demanding deep dives and strong currents.

Titan’s underside features an accessory extension port that enables exciting add-ons for different diving purposes.

Easily transport Titan in our durable, wear-resistant rolling case.

Now let's see what a real experienced underwater cameraman says:

Titan’s included remote controller uses a 2.4GHz frequency to connect with viewing devices, like your smartphone or tablet. It transmits live footage at 1080p, allowing you to watch epic moments unfold in real-time.

The GeneRov app is designed specifically to assist you knowing the drone‘s precise path at all times. 

Polymer lithium batteries power Titan for up to 4 hours while only requiring 2 hours of charging time, more than enough for a single dive.

Titan’s eye-catching orange and black design, with symmetrical thrusters for balanced thrusting power, has won a prestigious Red Dot Design Award.

                   

Now let's see the depth test that Titan goes down deep water：

 New function - High angel shot and low angle shot both at 60 degree

All things considered, making anything for underwater use is inherently more challenging than making things to be used on land. But our hardworking team is passionate about creating the best underwater drone that can operate in the open ocean as easily as in the stillest freshwater lake. To that end, we have done hundreds of experiments on Titan prototypes in order to eliminate deficiencies and create the highest performing product we can.

We are doing the final round of prototype testing in several freshwater and ocean diving sites to make sure Titan will be ready for consumer use.

It started with a question: if a flying drone can hover in the sky, why can’t we make a drone that dives into the sea? Surely an underwater drone could capture footage even more beautiful and mysterious than any airborne drone could manage.

We founded Geneinno in 2013 and have been devoted to the drone industry ever since. Over the past 5 years, our research and innovations have earned us numerous patents. And the more time we’ve spent learning about and creating drones, the more we’ve come to love them.

Our first underwater drone, Poseidon, was released in 2016 after 8 tests, and its success is due in part to the support of our first followers and fans.

Following the valuable insights gained from our experience with the first drone, we now present to you Titan, an easy-to-control drone to capture all your underwater moments.

We promise to deliver an extraordinary experience to everyone, and Titan is our best product yet.

US warehous in stock, ship out in 3 dayshttps://geneinno.us/products/geneinno-t1

But our hardworking team is passionate about creating the best underwater drone that can operate in the open ocean as easily as in the stillest freshwater lake. To that end, we have done hundreds of experiments on Titan prototypes in order to eliminate deficiencies and create the highest performing product we can.We are doing the final round of prototype testing in several freshwater and ocean diving sites to make sure Titan will be ready for consumer use.It started with a question: if a flying drone can hover in the sky, why can’t we make a drone that dives into the sea?
